h4.p: [06] namo sammaasambuddhaana.m paramatthadassiina.m
[03] siilaadigu.napaaramippattaana.m.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ duve ^a^V0.0165^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0167^ea^ hetuu duve paccayaa saavakassa sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaaya -- parato ca ghoso saccaanusandhi, ajjhatta~nca yoniso manasikaaro. tattha katamo parato ghoso? yaa parato desanaa ovaado anusaasanii saccakathaa saccaanulomo. cattaari saccaani -- dukkha.m samudayo nirodho maggo. imesa.m catunna.m saccaana.m yaa ^a^V0.0166^ea^ desanaa sandassanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikiriyaa {uttaanikiriyaa (ka0)} pakaasanaa -- aya.m vuccati saccaanulomo ghosoti.
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo ajjhatta.m yoniso manasikaaro?
[03] ajjhatta.m yoniso manasikaaro naama yo yathaadesite dhamme bahiddhaa aaramma.na.m anabhiniiharitvaa yoniso manasikaaro -- aya.m vuccati yoniso manasikaaro.

[03] ta.maakaaro yoniso dvaaro vidhi upaayo. yathaa puriso sukkhe ka.t.the vigatasnehe sukkhaaya uttaraara.niyaa thale abhimanthamaana.m bhabbo jotissa adhigamaaya ^a^P0.0002^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu. yoniso aggissa adhigamaaya. evamevassa yamida.m dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggaana.m avipariitadhammadesana.m manasikaroti -- aya.m vuccati yoniso manasikaaro.

[03] yathaa ^a^M0.0168^ea^ tisso upamaa pubbe assutaa ca assutapubbaa ca pa.tibhanti. yo hi koci kaamesu aviitaraagoti...pe0... duve upamaa ayoniso kaatabbaa pacchimesu vutta.m. tattha yo ca parato ghoso yo ca ajjhatta.m yoniso manasikaaro -- ime dve paccayaa. parato ghosena yaa uppajjati pa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sutamayii pa~n~naa. yaa ajjhatta.m yoniso manasikaarena uppajjati pa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati cintaamayii pa~n~naati. imaa dve pa~n~naa veditabbaa. purimakaa ca dve paccayaa. ime dve hetuu dve paccayaa saavakassa sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaaya.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ tattha parato ghosassa saccaanusandhissa desitassa attha.m avijaananto atthappa.tisa.mvedii bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. na ca atthappa.tisa.mvedii yoniso manasikarissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. parato ghosassa saccaanusandhissa desitassa attha.m vijaananto atthappa.tisa.mvedii bhavissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. atthappa.tisa.mvedii ca yoniso manasikarissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. esa hetu eta.m aaramma.na.m eso upaayo saavakassa niyyaanassa, nattha~n~no. soya.m na ca suttassa atthavijaananaaya saha yutto naapi ghosaanuyogena parato ghosassa attha.m avijaanantena sakkaa uttarimanussadhamma.m alamariya~naa.nadassana.m adhigantu.m, tasmaa nibbaayitukaamena sutamayena atthaa pariyesitabbaa. tattha ^a^P0.0003^ea^ pariyesanaaya aya.m anupubbii bhavati so.lasa haaraa, pa~nca nayaa, a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani.
[21] so.lasahaaraa nettii, pa~ncanayaa saasanassa pariye.t.thi.
[22] a.t.thaarasamuulapadaa, kaccaayanagottaniddi.t.thaa..
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ tattha katame so.lasahaaraa?
[03] desanaa vicayo yutti pada.t.thaana.m lakkha.na.m catubyuuho aava.t.to vibhatti parivattano vevacano pa~n~natti otara.no sodhano adhi.t.thaano parikkhaaro samaaropano -- ime so.lasa haaraa.
[21] desanaa ^a^M0.0169^ea^ vicayo yutti, pada.t.thaano ca lakkha.no {pada.t.thaana~nca lakkha.na.m (pii0)}.
[22] catubyuuho ca aava.t.to, vibhatti parivattano..
[21] vevacano ca pa~n~natti, otara.no ca sodhano.
[22] adhi.t.thaano parikkhaaro, samaaropano so.laso -- {so.lasa haaraa (pii0 ka0)}.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ tattha katame pa~nca nayaa?
[03] nandiyaava.t.to tipukkhalo siihavikkii.lito disaalocano a"nkusoti.
[21] pa.thamo nandiyaava.t.to, dutiyo ca tipukkhalo.
[22] siihavikkii.lito naama, tatiyo hoti so nayo..
[21] disaalocanamaaha.msu, catuttho nayala~njako.
[22] pa~ncamo a"nkuso naama {pa~ncama.m a"nkusa.m aahu (pii0 ka0)}, sabbe pa~nca nayaa gataa..
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani?

[03] avijjaa ^a^P0.0004^ea^ ta.nhaa lobho doso moho subhasa~n~naa sukhasa~n~naa niccasa~n~naa attasa~n~naa samatho ^a^V0.0168^ea^ vipassanaa alobho adoso amoho asubhasa~n~naa dukkhasa~n~naa aniccasa~n~naa anattasa~n~naa, imaani a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani. tattha nava padaani akusalaani yattha sabba.m akusala.m samosarati. nava padaani kusalaani yattha sabba.m kusala.m samosarati.
[03] katamaani nava padaani akusalaani yattha sabba.m akusala.m samosarati?
[03] avijjaa yaava attasa~n~naa, imaani nava padaani akusalaani, yattha sabba.m akusala.m samosarati.
[03] katamaani nava padaani kusalaani yattha sabba.m kusala.m samosarati?
[03] samatho yaava anattasa~n~naa, imaani nava padaani kusalaani yattha sabba.m kusala.m samosarati. imaani a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani.
[21] ta.nhaa ^a^M0.0170^ea^ ca avijjaa lobho, doso tatheva moho ca.
[22] cattaaro ca vipallaasaa, kilesabhuumi nava padaani..
[21] ye ca satipa.t.thaanaa samatho, vipassanaa kusalamuula.m.
[22] eta.m sabba.m kusala.m, indriyabhuumi navapadaani..
[21] sabba.m kusala.m navahi padehi yujjati, navahi ceva akusala.m.
[22] ekake nava muulapadaani, ubhayato a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani..

[03] imesa.m a.t.thaarasanna.m muulapadaana.m yaani nava padaani akusalaani, aya.m dukkhasamudayo; yaani nava padaani kusalaani, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa. iti samudayassa dukkha.m phala.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya nirodha.m phala.m. imaani ^a^P0.0005^ea^ cattaari ariyasaccaani bhagavataa baaraa.nasiya.m desitaani.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ tattha dukkhassa ariyasaccassa aparimaa.naani akkharaani padaani bya~njanaani aakaaraani ^a^V0.0169^ea^ niruttiyo niddesaa desitaa etassevatthassa sa"nkaasanaaya pakaasanaaya vivara.naaya vibhajanaaya uttaaniikammataaya pa~n~naapanaayaati yaa eva.m sabbesa.m saccaana.m. iti ekameka.m sacca.m aparimaa.nehi akkharapadabya~njanaaakaaraniruttiniddesehi pariyesitabba.m, ta~nca bya~njana.m atthaputhuttena pana attheva bya~njanaputhuttena.

[03] yo hi koci sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.m vadeyya ``aha.m ida.m dukkha.m paccakkhaaya a~n~na.m dukkha.m pa~n~napessaamii''ti tassa ta.m vaacaavatthukamevassa pucchito ca na sampaayissati. eva.m saccaani. ya~nca ratti.m bhagavaa abhisambuddho, ya~nca ratti.m anupaadaaya parinibbuto, etthantare ya.m ki~nci bhagavataa bhaasita.m sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, sabba.m ta.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m. na ki~nci buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m ^a^M0.0171^ea^ dhammadesanaaya dhammacakkato bahiddhaa, tassa sabba.m sutta.m ariyadhammesu pariyesitabba.m. tattha parigga.nhanaaya aalokasabhaani cattaari ariyasaccaani thaavaraani imaani.

[03] tattha katama.m dukkha.m? jaati jaraa byaadhi mara.na.m sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa. tatthaaya.m lakkha.naniddeso, paatubhaavalakkha.naa ^a^P0.0006^ea^ jaati, paripaakalakkha.naa jaraa, dukkhadukkhataalakkha.no byaadhi, cutilakkha.na.m mara.na.m, piyavippayogavipari.naamaparitaapanalakkha.no soko, laalappanalakkha.no paridevo, kaayasampii.lanalakkha.na.m dukkha.m, cittasampii.lanalakkha.na.m domanassa.m, kilesaparidahanalakkha.no upaayaaso, amanaapasamodhaanalakkha.no appiyasampayogo, manaapavinaabhaavalakkha.no piyavippayogo, adhippaayavivattanalakkha.no alaabho, apari~n~naalakkha.naa pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, paripaakacutilakkha.na.m jaraamara.na.m, paatubhaavacutilakkha.na.m cutopapatti, pa.tisandhinibbattanalakkha.no samudayo, samudayaparijahanalakkha.no nirodho, anusayasamucchedalakkha.no maggo. byaadhilakkha.na.m dukkha.m, sa~njaananalakkha.no samudayo, niyyaanikalakkha.no maggo, santilakkha.no nirodho. appa.tisandhibhaavanirodhalakkha.naa anupaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu, dukkha~nca samudayo ca, dukkha~nca nirodho ca, dukkha~nca maggo ca, samudayo ca dukkha~nca, samudayo ca nirodho ca, samudayo ca maggo ca, nirodho ca samudayo ca, nirodho ca dukkha~nca, nirodho ca maggo ca, maggo ca nirodho ca, maggo ca samudayo ca, maggo ca dukkha~nca.

[03] hetuppabhavaa ^a^P0.0011^ea^ dhammaa dukkha.m, hetusamudayo, ya.m bhagavato vacana.m. aya.m dhammo yo nirodho, ye hi keci sa.myojaniyesu dhammesu assadaanupassino viharanti. kilesaa ta.nhaa pava.d.dhati, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. tattha ya.m sa.myojana.m -- aya.m samudayo. ye sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa ye ca sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti -- ida.m dukkha.m. yaa sa.myojaniyesu dhammesu aadiinavaanupassanaa -- aya.m maggo. parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya byaadhiihi mara.nehi sokehi paridevehi yaava upaayaasehi -- ida.m nibbaana.m. imaani cattaari saccaani.

[22] abhibhuuto maaro vijitasa"ngaamo, upeccagaa sabbabhavaani taadii''ti..
[03] aya.m loko santaapajaato yaava dukkhanti ya.m ta.nhaa sa.mkileso.

[03] ya.m punaggaha.na.m ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhavena bhavassa vimokkhamaaha.msu, sabbete ``avimuttaa bhavasmaa''ti vadaami. ye vaa pana keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa vibhavena bhavassa nissara.namaaha.msu ``anissa.taa bhavasmaa''ti vadaami. aya.m di.t.thisa.mkileso, ta.m di.t.thisa.mkileso ^a^M0.0187^ea^ ca ta.nhaasa.mkileso ca, ubhayameta.m sa.mkileso. ya.m punaggaha.na.m bhavavippahaanaaya brahmacariya.m vussati, yaava sabbaso upaadaanakkhayaa sambhavaa, ida.m nibbedhabhaagiya.m. tassa ^a^P0.0028^ea^ nibbutassa bhikkhuno yaava upaccagaa sabbabhavaani taadiiti ida.m asekkhabhaagiya.m. cattaaro puggalaa anusotagaamii sa.mkileso .thitatto ca pa.tisotagaamii ca nibbedho. thale ti.t.thatiiti asekkhabhuumi.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m?
[21] ``dadato {udaa0 75; dii0 ni0 2.197} pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati.
[22] kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m, raagadosamohakkhayaa sanibbuto''ti..
[03] ``dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatii''ti vaasanaa. ``kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m, raagadosamohakkhayaa sanibbuto''ti nibbedho.

[03] sotaanugatesu dhammesu vacasaa paricitesu manasaanupekkhitesu di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhesu pa~ncaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. idhekaccassa bahussutaa dhammaa honti dhaataa apamu.t.thaa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, so yu~njanto gha.tento vaayamanto di.t.theva dhamme visesa.m pappoti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme visesa.m pappoti, gilaano pappoti. no ce gilaano ^a^V0.0186^ea^ pappoti, mara.nakaalasamaye pappoti. no ce mara.nakaalasamaye pappoti, devabhuuto paapu.naati. no ce devabhuuto paapu.naati, tena dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa paccekabodhi.m paapu.naati.

[03] tatthaaya.m di.t.theva dhamme paapu.naati, aya.m nibbedho. ya.m ^a^P0.0029^ea^ samparaaye paccekabodhi.m paapu.naati, aya.m vaasanaa. imaani so.lasa suttaani sabbasaasana.m atigga.nhanto ti.t.thanti. imehi so.lasahi suttehi navavidho suttanto vibhatto bhavati. so ca pa~n~navato no duppa~n~nassa, yuttassa no ayuttassa, akammassa vihaarissa pakatiyaa loke sa.mkileso ^a^M0.0188^ea^ carati. so sa.mkileso tividho -- ta.nhaasa.mkileso di.t.thisa.mkileso duccaritasa.mkileso. tato sa.mkilesato u.t.thahanto sa.mkileso dhammesu pati.t.thahati, lokiyesu pati.t.thahatiiti. tatthaakusalo di.t.thato sace ta.m siila~nca di.t.thi~nca paraamasati, tassa so ta.nhaasa.mkileso hoti. sace panassa eva.m hoti ``iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissa.m {bhavissaami (pii0)} deva~n~nataro vaa''ti yassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi, etassa micchaadi.t.thisa.mkileso bhavati. sace pana siile pati.t.thito aparaama.t.thassa hi siilavata.m hoti, tassa ta.m siilavato yoniso gahita.m avippa.tisaara.m janeti yaava vimutti~naa.nadassana.m, ta~nca tassa di.t.theva dhamme kaala"nkatassa vaa tamhiyeva vaa pana aparaapariyaayena vaa, a~n~nesu khandhesu eva.m suta.m ``sucarita.m vaasanaaya sa.mvattatii''ti vaasanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m vuccati. tattha siilesu .thitassa viniivara.na.m citta.m, ta.m tato sakkaayadi.t.thippahaanaaya bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti. so accantani.t.tha.m nibbaana.m paapu.naati; yadi vaa saasanantare, accanta.m nibbaana.m paapu.naati, yadi vaa ekaasane cha abhi~n~ne. tattha ^a^P0.0030^ea^ dve puggalaa ariyadhamme paapu.nanti saddhaanusaarii ca dhammaanusaarii ca. tattha dhammaanusaarii uggha.tita~n~nuu, saddhaanusaarii neyyo. tattha uggha.tita~n~nuu duvidho -- koci tikkhindriyo koci mudindriyo. tattha neyyopi duvidho -- koci tikkhindriyo koci mudindriyo. tattha yo ca uggha.tita~n~nuu mudindriyo, yo ca neyyo tikkhindriyo, ime puggalaa asamindriyaa honti. tattha ime puggalaa samindriyaa parihaayanti ca uggha.tita~n~nuto, vipa~ncita~n~nuu neyyato, ime majjhimaa bhuumigataa vipa~ncita~n~nuu hoti. ime tayo puggalaa.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ tattha catutthaa pana pa~ncamaa uggha.tita~n~nuu vipa~ncita~n~nuu neyyo ca, tattha uggha.tita~n~nuu puggalo indriyaani pa.tilabhitvaa dassanabhuumiya.m .thito sotaapattiphala~nca paapu.naati, ekabiijii hoti pa.thamo sotaapanno. tattha vipa~ncita~n~nuu puggalo indriyaani pa.tilabhitvaa dassanabhuumiya.m .thito sotaapattiphala~nca paapu.naati, kola.mkolo ca hoti dutiyo sotaapanno ^a^V0.0187^ea^. tattha neyyo puggalo indriyaani pa.tilabhitvaa dassanabhuumiya.m .thito sotaapattiphala~nca paapu.naati, sattakkhattuparamo ca hoti ^a^M0.0189^ea^, aya.m tatiyo sotaapanno. ime tayo puggalaa indriyavemattataaya sotaapattiphale .thitaa.

[03] uggha.tita~n~nuu ekabiijii hoti, vipa~ncita~n~nuu kola.mkolo hoti, neyyo sattakkhattuparamo hoti. ida.m nibbedhabhaagiya.m sutta.m. sace ^a^P0.0031^ea^ pana taduttari vaayamati, accantani.t.tha.m nibbaana.m paapu.naati. tattha uggha.tita~n~nuu puggalo yo tikkhindriyo, te dve puggalaa honti -- anaagaamiphala.m paapu.nitvaa antaraaparinibbaayii ca upahaccaparinibbaayii ca. tattha vipa~ncita~n~nuu puggalo yo tikkhindriyo, te dve puggalaa honti -- anaagaamiphala.m paapu.nanti asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii ca sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii ca. tattha neyyo anaagaamiphala.m paapu.nanto uddha.msoto akani.t.thagaamii hoti, uggha.tita~n~nuu ca vipa~ncita~n~nuu ca, indriyanaanattena uggha.tita~n~nuu puggalo tikkhindriyo antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, uggha.tita~n~nuu mudindriyo uddha.msoto akani.t.thagaamii hoti. uggha.tita~n~nuu ca vipa~ncita~n~nuu ca indriyanaanattena uggha.tita~n~nuu puggalo tikkhindriyo sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, tikkhindriyo antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, uggha.tita~n~nuu mudindriyo upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti. vipa~ncita~n~nuu tikkhindriyo asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, vipa~ncita~n~nuu mudindriyo sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, neyyo upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, vipa~ncita~n~nuu tikkhindriyo asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti. vipa~ncita~n~nuu mudindriyo sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, neyyo uddha.msoto akani.t.thagaamii hoti. iti pa~nca anaagaamino, cha.t.tho sakadaagaamii, tayo ca sotaapannaati ime nava sekkhaa.

[03] tattha uggha.tita~n~nuu puggalo tikkhindriyo arahatta.m paapu.nanto dve puggalaa honti ubhatobhaagavimutto pa~n~naavimutto ca. tattha uggha.tita~n~nuu puggalo mudindriyo arahatta.m paapu.nanto dve puggalaa honti, .thitakappii {.thitakappi (pii0 ka0) passa pu0 pa0 17} ca pa.tivedhanabhaavo puggalo ca tikkhindriyo so arahatta.m paapu.nanto dve puggalaa honti cetanaabhabbo ca rakkha.naabhabbo ca. tattha vipa~ncita~n~nuu mudindriyo arahatta.m paapu.nanto dve puggalaa honti, sace ceteti na parinibbaayii, no ce ceteti parinibbaayiiti. sace anurakkhati na parinibbaayii, no ce anurakkhati parinibbaayiiti. tattha neyyo puggalo bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto parihaanadhammo ^a^M0.0190^ea^ hoti kammaniyato vaa samasiisi vaa, ime nava arahanto ida.m catubbidha.m sutta.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m asekkhabhaagiya.m. imesu puggalesu tathaagatassa dasavidha.m bala.m pavattati.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^V0.0188^ea^ dasavidha.m? idha buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m appavattite dhammacakke mahesakkhaa devaputtaa yaacanaaya abhiyaataa {atiyaataa (pii0 ka0)} honti ``desetu sugato dhamma''nti. so anuttarena buddhacakkhunaa volokento addasaasi sattaana.m tayo raasiina.m sammattaniyato micchattaniyato aniyato. tattha sammattaniyato raasi micchaasati.m aapajjeyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, asatthuko parinibbaayeyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, samaapatti.m aapajjeyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati. tattha micchattaniyato raasi ariyasamaapatti.m pa.tipajjissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, anariyamicchaapa.tipatti.m pa.tipajjissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. tattha ^a^P0.0033^ea^ aniyato raasi sammaapa.tipajjamaana.m sammattaniyataraasi.m gamissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati, micchaapa.tipajjamaano sammattaniyataraasi.m gamissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. sammaapa.tipajjamaana.m sammattaniyataraasi.m gamissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati, micchaapa.tipajjamaana.m micchattaniyataraasi.m gamissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. ime tayo anuttarena buddhacakkhunaa volokentassa sammaasambuddhassa me sato ime dhammaa anabhisambuddhaati ettavataa ma.m koci sahadhammena pa.ticodissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, viitaraagassa te pa.tijaanato akhii.naasavataaya sahadhammena koci pa.ticodissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yato pana imassa aniyatassa raasissa dhammadesanaa, saa na dissati takkarassa sammaadukkhakkhayaayaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, tathaa ovadito ya.m pana me aniyataraasi saavako pubbenaapara.m visesa.m na sacchikarissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ya.m kho muni naanappakaarassa naanaaniruttiyo devanaagayakkhaana.m dameti dhamme vavatthaanena vatvaa kaara.nato a~n~na.m paara.m gamissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. dhammapa.tisambhidaa. yato panimaa niruttito satta satta niruttiyo naabhisambhuneyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. niruttipa.tisambhidaa. nirutti kho pana abhisamaggarataana.m saavakaana.m tamatthamavi~n~naapayeti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. atthapa.tisambhidaa ^a^P0.0034^ea^. mahesakkhaa devaputtaa upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nhe pucchi.msu ^a^M0.0191^ea^. kaayikena vaa maanasikena vaa paripii.litassa hatthaku.niiti vaa paade vaa kha~nje dandhassa {dantassa (pii0 ka0)} so attho na paribhaajiyatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaa. yamhi ta.m tesa.m hoti tamhi asanta.m bhavatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ya.m hi naasa.m tesa.m na bhavati, tamhi naasa.m tesa.m bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. eva.m samudayassa nirodhaaya dasa akusalakammapathaa. maaro vaa indo vaa brahmaa vaa tathaagato vaa cakkavattii vaa so vata naama maatugaamo bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puriso assa raajaa cakkavattii sakko devaanamindo bhavissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. itissa evaruupa.m bala.m evaruupa.m ~naa.na.m, ida.m vuccati .thaanaa.t.thaana~naa.na.m pa.thama.m tathaagatabala.m ta.m niddisitabba.m. tiihi raasiihi catuuhi vesaarajjehi catuuhi pa.tisambhidaahi ^a^V0.0189^ea^ pa.ticcasamuppaadassa pavattiya.m nivattiya.m bhaagiya~nca. kusala.m kusalavipaakesu ca upapajjati ya~nca itthipurisaana.m. ida.m pa.thama.m bala.m tathaagato eva.m jaanaati.

[03] yesa.m pana sammattaniyato raasi, naaya.m sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa, nibbaanagaaminiiyevaaya.m pa.tipadaa. tattha siyaa micchattaniyato raasi, esaapi na sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa. sakkaayasamudayagaaminiiyevaaya.m pa.tipadaa ^a^P0.0035^ea^ hotu, aya.m tattha tattha pa.tipattiyaa .thito gacchati nibbaana.m, gacchati apaaya.m, gacchati devamanussassa. ya.m ya.m vaa pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjeyya sabbattha gaccheyya, aya.m sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa. ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m yathaabhuuta.m, ida.m vuccati sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa~naa.na.m dutiya.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] saa kho panaaya.m sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa naanaadhimuttaa keci kaamesu keci dukkarakaariya.m keci attakilamathaanuyogamanuyuttaa keci sa.msaarena suddhi.m paccenti keci anajjaabhaavanaati. tena tena caritena vinibandhaana.m sattaana.m ya.m ~naa.na.m yathaabhuuta.m naanaagata.m lokassa anekaadhimuttagata.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ida.m tatiya.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] tattha sattaana.m adhimuttaa bhavanti aasevanti bhaaventi bahuliikaronti. tesa.m kammupasayaana.m tadaadhimuttaana.m. saa ceva dhaatu sa.mvahati. kataraa panesaa dhaatu nekkhammadhaatu baladhaatu kaaci sampatti kaaci micchatta~nca dhaatu adhimuttaa bhavanti. a~n~nataraa uttari na samanupassanti. te tadeva.t.thaana.m mayaa ^a^M0.0192^ea^ jaraamara.nassa abhinivissa voharanti ``idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. yathaa bhagavaa sakkassa devaanamindassa bhaasita.m. ya.m tattha yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m. ida.m vuccati catuttha.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] tattha ya.myeva dhaatu {ya.m yadeva dhaatu.m (ka0)} se.t.thanti ta.m ta.m kaayena ca vaacaaya ca aarambhanti cetasiko. aarambho cetanaa kamma.m kaayikaa ^a^P0.0036^ea^ vaacasikaa aarambho cetasikattaa kammantara.m tathaagato eva.m pajaanaati ``iminaa sattena eva.m dhaatukena evaruupa.m kamma.m kata.m, ta.m atiitamaddhaana.m iminaa hetunaa tassa evaruupo vipaako vipaccati etarahi vipaccissati vaa anaagatamaddhaana''nti. eva.m paccuppannamaddhaana.m pajaanaati ``aya.m puggalo eva.mdhaatuko ida.m kamma.m karoti''. ta.nhaaya ca di.t.thiyaa ca iminaa hetunaa na tassa vipaako di.t.theyeva dhamme nibbattissati, upapajje vaa''ti aparamhi vaa pariyaaye eva.m pajaanaati ``aya.m puggalo evaruupa.m kamma.m karissati anaagatamaddhaana.m, iminaa hetunaa tassa evaruupo vipaako nibbattissati, iminaa hetunaa yaani cattaari ^a^V0.0190^ea^ kamma.t.thaanaani ida.m kamma.t.thaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m ca sukhavipaaka.m'' ...pe0... iti aya.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m hetuso .thaanaso vipaakavemattata.m pajaanaati uccaavacaa hiinapa.niitataa, ida.m vuccati kammavipaaka~naa.na.m pa~ncama.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] tathaa sattaa ya.m vaa kammasamaadaana.m samaadiyantaa tattha eva.m pajaanaati imassa puggalassa kammaadhimuttassa raagacaritassa nekkhammadhaatuuna.m paaripuuri.m gacchanti, tassa raagaanugate su~n~namaanassa pa.thama.m jhaana.m sa.mkilissati, sace puna uttari vaayaamato jhaanavodaanagate maanase visesabhaagiya.m pa.tipada.m anuyu~njiyati. tassa hi jhaanabhaagiya.myeva pa.thamajjhaane .thitassa dutiya.m jhaana.m vodaana.m gacchati, tatiya~nca ^a^P0.0037^ea^ jhaana.m samaapajjitukaamassa somanassindriya.m citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, tassa saa piiti avisesabhaagiya.m tatiya.m jhaana.m aadissa ti.t.thati. sace tassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tathaagatassa catutthajjhaana.m vodaana.m gacchatiyeva, catutthassa jhaanassa haanabhaagiyaa dhammaa, te ca dhammaa yattha pajaayanti yehi catutthajjhaana.m vodaana.m dissati. eva.m ajjhaasayasamaapattiyaa yaa catasso samaapattiyo tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani a.t.tha vimokkhajhaanaaniiti cattaari jhaanaani vimokkhaati. a.t.tha ca vimokkhaa tii.ni ca vimokkhamukhaani. samaadhiiti cattaaro ^a^M0.0193^ea^ samaadhii -- chandasamaadhi viiriyasamaadhi cittasamaadhi viima.msaasamaadhiiti. samaapattiyo catasso ajjhaasayasamaapattiyo iti imesa.m jhaanaana.m vimokkhasamaapattiiti evaruupo sa.mkileso raagacaritassa puggalassa. eva.m dosacaritassa. mohacaritassa. raagacaritassa puggalassa evaruupa.m vodaana.m iti ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m yathaabhuuta.m asaadhaara.na.m sabbasattehi. ida.m vuccati cha.t.tha.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] tattha tathaagato eva.m pajaanaati lokikaa dhammaa lokuttaraa dhammaa bhaavanaabhaagiya.m indriya.m naama.m labhanti. aadhipateyyabhuumi.m upaadaaya bala.m naama.m labhanti thaamagata.m mano manindriya.m ta.m upaadaaya. viiriya.m naama.m labhanti aarambhadhaatu.m upaadaaya. itissa deva evaruupa.m ~naa.na.m imehi ca dhammehi ime puggalaa samannaagataatipi dhammadesana.m akaasi. aakaarato ca vokaarato ca aasayajjhaasayassa ^a^P0.0038^ea^ adhimuttisamannaagataana.m. ida.m vuccati parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m indriyabalaviiriyavemattata.m ~naa.na.m sattama.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] tattha ca tathaagato lokaadiisu ca bhuumiisu sa.myojanaana~nca sekkhaana.m dviihi balehi gati.m pajaanaati, pubbenivaasaanussatiyaa atiite sa.msaare etarahi ca paccuppanne dibbacakkhunaa cutuupapaata.m iti imaani dve balaani dibbacakkhuto abhiniihitaani. so atiitamaddhaana.m dibbassa ^a^V0.0191^ea^ cakkhuno gocaro so etarahi sati gocaro iti attano ca paresa.m ca pubbenivaasa~naa.na.m anekavidha.m naanappakaaraka.m paccuppannamaddhaana.m dibbena cakkhunaa imaani dve tathaagatabalaani, a.t.thama.m pubbenivaaso, navama.m dibbacakkhu.

[03] puna capara.m tathaagato ariyapuggalaana.m jhaana.m vodaana.m nibbedhabhaagiya.m pajaanaati aya.m puggalo iminaa maggena imaaya pa.tipadaaya aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatiiti iti attano ca aasavaana.m khaya.m ~naa.na.m di.t.theka.t.thaana.m catubhuumimupaadaaya yaava navanna.m arahantaana.m aasavakkhayo odhiso sekkhaana.m anodhiso arahantaana.m. tattha cetovimutti dviihi aasavehi anaasavaa kaamaasavena ca bhavaasavena ca, pa~n~naavimutti dviihi aasavehi anaasavaa di.t.thaasavena ca avijjaasavena ca, imaasa.m dvinna.m vimuttiina.m yathaabhuuta.m ^a^P0.0039^ea^ ~naa.na.m, ida.m vuccati aasavakkhaye ~naa.na.m. dasama.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ imesu ^a^M0.0194^ea^ dasasu balesu .thito tathaagato pa~ncavidha.m saasana.m deseti sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m vaasanaabhaagiya.m dassanabhaagiya.m bhaavanaabhaagiya.m asekkhabhaagiya.m. tattha yo ta.nhaasa.mkileso, imassa alobho nissara.na.m. yo di.t.thisa.mkileso, imassa amoho nissara.na.m. yo duccaritasa.mkileso, imassa tii.ni kusalaani nissara.na.m. ki.m nidaana.m? tii.ni imaani {tii.ni hi imaani (pii0)} manoduccaritaani -- abhijjhaa byaapaado micchaadi.t.thi. tattha abhijjhaa manoduccarita.m kaayakamma.m upa.t.thapeti, adinnaadaana.m sabba~nca tadupanibbaddha.m vaacaakamma.m upa.t.thapeti, musaavaada~nca sabbavitatha.m sabba.m vaacamabhaava.m sabbamakkha.m palaasa.m abhijjhaa akusalamuulanti, sucarite sucarita.m musaavaadaa adinnaadaanaa abhijjhaaya cetanaa, tattha byaapaado manoduccarita.m kaayakamma.m upa.t.thapeti, paa.naatipaata.m sabba~nca meta.m aaka.d.dhana.m parika.d.dhana.m nibbaddha.m rocana.m vaacaakamma.m upa.t.thapeti, pisu.navaaca.m pharusavaaca.m micchaadi.t.thi manoduccarita~nca abhijjha.m byaapaada.m micchaadi.t.thi.m payojeti, tassa yo koci micchaadi.t.thi caago raagajo vaa dosajo vaa sabbaso micchaadi.t.thi sambhuuto iminaa kaara.nena micchaadi.t.thi.m upa.t.thapeti, kaamesumicchaacaara.m vaciikamma.m upa.t.thapeti samphappalaapa.m. imaani ^a^P0.0040^ea^ tii.ni duccaritaani akusalamuulaani.

upaparikkhitabbaa. yo yo ca dhammo upadisiyati kusalo vaa akusalo vaa so apaka.d.dhitabbo. sace te yujjanti apaka.d.dhiyamaano natthi upaparikkhitabba.m. dve vaa kilesaa ekena ariyadhammena pahiineyyaati dviihi vaa ariyadhammehi eko vaa kileso pahiiyatiiti.

[03] atha vaa evampi upaparikkhiyamaana.m yujjati, tattha viima.msitabba.m vaa yathaa yujjati tattha viima.msitabba.m vaa, yathaa nanu sakkaa sutta.m niddisitu.m, na hi sutte vicikicchitabba.m. kileso ^a^P0.0076^ea^ ma.m ariyadhammesu desitesu ubhayato upaparikkhitabba.m. kira ye vaa ime kilesaa desitaa ye ca ariyadhammaa desitaa gaathaaya vaa byaakara.nena vaa, ki.m nu kho ime kilesaa imehi ariyadhammehi pahiiyanti, udaahu nappahiiyanti? ime vaa ariyadhammaa imesa.m kilesaana.m pahaanaaya sa.mvattantiiti. ki~ncaapi kusalehi dhammehi akusalaa dhammaa pahaana.m gacchanti. na tu sabbehi ariyadhammehi sabbaakusalaa pahaana.m gacchanti. yathaa mettaa kusalo akusalo ca raago na tu kusalaa mettaa akusalo raagoti kaaretvaa mettaaya raago pahaana.m, byaapaado mettaaya pahaana.m gacchanti. eva.m kilesoti kaaretvaa suttena pahaana.m gacchati. na sutto dhammoti kaaretvaa sabba.m kilesassa pahaanaaya sa.mvattati. ya.m tu suttassa ariyadhammo sa.mkilesapa.tipakkho, so tena pahaana.m gacchatiiti.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ tattha kusale desite sutte byaakara.ne vaa sa.mkilesaa na yujjanti ariyadhammaa vaa, te mahaapadese niddisitabbaavayavena apaka.d.dhitabbaa ^a^M0.0221^ea^. tattha kilesehi ca desitehi ariyadhammesu ca yadipi tena ariyadhammena te kilesaa pahaana.m gacchanti. tatthapi uttari upaparikkhitabba.m. kena kaara.nena ete kilesaa pajahitabbaa, kena kaara.nena ariyadhammaa desitaati? yena yena vaa aakaarena ariyadhammaa desitaa, tena tena pakaarena aya.m kileso .thito. atthi hi eko kileso, tena vaa ariyadhammaa na a~n~nathaa a~n~nathaa pahaatabbo, yathaa di.t.thi raago avijjaa ca dassanena pahaatabbaa. saa ce eva~nca avijjaa bhaavanaaya bhuumi vaa dhammaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. saayeva uddha.mbhaagiya.m asa"nkhatadassanaaya vimuttiyaa animittena cetosamaadhinaa ^a^P0.0077^ea^ amanasikaarena pahiiyati. eva.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m upaparikkhitabba.m. ye dassanena pahaatabbaa kilesaa dassanaakaarena ariyadhammo desito, bhaavanaaya ^a^V0.0222^ea^ pahaatabbaa bhaavanaakaarena ariyadhammo desito, patisevanaa pahaatabbaa patisevanaakaarena ariyadhammo desito, eva.m vinodanapahaatabbaa yaava satta aasavaa kaatabbaa, yaava~n~nathaa. a~n~nathaa hesa dhammo pahaatabbo a~n~nenaakaarena ariyadhammo desito, so ariyadhammo a~n~nathaa pariyesitabbo. yadi aya.m dhammo pariyesato yo ca deseti yena yenaakaarena, so ariyadhammo pariyesitabbo, tenaakaarena kileso pahiiyati. so tattha upaparikkhitabbo. atha na yujjati yadi hi tena suttena vihita.m sutta.m viima.msitabba.m. yathaa yujjati, tathaa gahetabba.m. yathaa na yujjati, tathaa na gahetabba.m, addhaa eta.m bhagavataa na bhaasita.m, aayasmataa vaa duggahita.m, yathaa mahaapadese niddisitabba.m, bhagavataa yathaabhuuta.m desita.m, yo ca dhammo desito kusalo ca akusalo ca tassa dhammassa paccayo pariyesitabbo. na hi paccayaa vinaa dhammo appaccayo uppajjati. tattha ko aakaaro pariyesanaaya?

[03] tattha tathaaruupa.m sahetu sappaccaya.m soya.m dhammo vuttoti ida.m viima.msitabba.m. so ca paccayo tividho -- mudu majjho adhimatto. tattha mudumhi paccaye mududhammo gahetabbo, eva.m satyesa paccayo duvidho para.mparaapaccayo ca samanantarapaccayo ca. so paccayo mudutena byaadhimatta.m pariyesitabba.m. ki.m kaara.na.m? a~n~nataropi paccayo a~n~nehi paccayehi pariyatti.m vaa paaripuuri.m vaa gacchati ^a^P0.0078^ea^. tattha yo dhammo desito, tassa dhammassa ^a^M0.0222^ea^ etena vaa kaara.nena vaa hetu pariyesitabbo. yathaa paccayo hetunaa paccayena ca, so tassa dhammassa nissando pariyesitabbo. yathaa niddi.t.tho adhi.t.thaane padhaana.m pariyesati, so paccayo pariyesitabbo. na hi mudussa dhammassa adhimatto nissando adhimattassa vaa nissandassa mududhammo, atha mudussa mudu majjhaaya majjho adhimattassa adhimatto yujjati, ta.m gahetabba.m, atha na yujjati na gahetabba.m. ya~nca bhagavaa aarabhati dhamma.m desetu.m, ta.myeva dhamma.m majjhantapariyosaana.m deseti, yathaa suttaadhi.t.thaane dhammaa aadimhi niddisati, ta.myeva bahu tassa suttassa pariyosaana.m. tassa hi dhammassa vasena ta.m sutta.m hoti gaathaa vaa byaakara.na.m khuddaka.m mahanta.m vaa, yathaa pana duvidhaa anuruupanti vaa thapanaa ca desanaathapanaa. ruupantipi dhammassa pariyesitabbaa. yathaa ca bhagavataa pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m sa.mvara.na.m desita.m ta.nhaaya niggaha.nattha.m icchaava hoti. deseti yathaa gopaalakopame sutte a~n~nehipi suttehi bhagavaa bhaasati icchaava hoti majjhimanikaaye vitakko aya.m bhagavato desanaanuruupanti iti so dhammo a~n~nesupi veyyaakara.nesu pariyesitabbo. na hi eka.m hi sutte da.t.thabbo. yujjana.m ta.m gahetabba.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m anu~n~naata.m? ya.m ki~nci sutta.m bhagavataa na bhaasita.m ta~nca suttesuyeva ^a^V0.0223^ea^ ndissati, evameta.m dhaaretabba.m. yathaa asukena bhaasitanti, ta.m sutta.m viima.msitabba.m. ki.m nu kho ima.m sutta.m ^a^P0.0079^ea^ anu~n~naata.m khama.m bhagavato udaahu naanu~n~naata.m khama.m, ki~nci ruupa~nca sutta.m bhagavato anu~n~naata.m khama.m ki~nci ruupa~nca naanu~n~naata.m khama.m? ya.m sabbaso anotaaretvaa dasabalo gocara.m deseti, ta.m sabba.m sutta.m bhagavato naanu~n~naata.m khama.m. atthipi so saavako dasabalaana.m gocara.m jaanaati odhiso anodhiso, ta.m pana bala.m sabbaso na jaanaati a~n~nathaa naama savanena, yathaa aayasmataa saariputtena yena braahma.no ovadito, tassa aayasmato natthi indriyabalavematta~naa.na.m, tena puggalaparo {puggalo paropara~nca (pii0)} para~nca ta.m ajaananto sati uttarikara.niiye uppaadito, so bhagavataa apasaadito. yathaava aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhaagineyya.m ovadati anantariyasamannaagato iddhipaa.tihiirena a"nguliyo adiipetvaa ^a^M0.0223^ea^ ya.m sabbesa.m dhammaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m hetuso .thaanaso yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m, tassa aayasmato sa.mvijjate, tena na.m ovadati, ta.m bhagavaa karoti.
[21] ``sacepi dasa pajjote, dhaarayissasi kassapa.
[22] neva dakkhati ruupaani, cakkhu tassa na vijjatii''ti..
[03] api ca kho yathaa duuto raajavacanena sattamanusaasati, eva.m sesaanugo a~n~naataka.m ghosa.m paresa.m deseti. anu~n~naatakhamasutta.m gahetabba.m. ananu~n~naatakhama.m na gahetabba.m.

[03] tattha katamo suttasa"nkaro? pa~ncavidha.m ^a^P0.0080^ea^ sutta.m, sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m vaasanaabhaagiya.m dassanabhaagiya.m bhaavanaabhaagiya.m asekkhabhaagiya.m. a~n~na.m aaraadheyya a~n~na.m deseti a~n~nassa ca suttassa attha.m a~n~namhi sutte niddisati. suttassa vaa hi anekaakaara.m attha.m niddisati. ariyadhammasaadhane attha.m vivarati. vaasanaabhaagiyassa attha.m dassanabhaagiyesu niddisati. orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m attha.m uddha.mbhaagiyesu niddisati. mudumajjhaana.m indriyaana.m adhimattesu suttesu niddisati. iti aya.m sutta.m sambheda.m hetunaa ca nissandena ca phalena ca niddesena ca mudumajjhaadhimattataayapi ca atthena ca bya~njanena ca yo sambhedo, aya.m vuccati suttasa"nkaro. yo asambhedo, aya.m vuccati suttavicayo.
[21] purimaana.m ^a^V0.0224^ea^ akkha.n.da.m, yathaabhuutassa paccayo.
[22] nissando vaasanaasaddhi, anu~n~naa suttasa"nkaro..
[06] therassa mahaakaccaayanassa
[06] suttavicayo naama catutthabhuumi.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0225^ea^ ^a^P0.0081^ea^ katamo haaravibha"ngo? yattha so.lasa haaraa akkharaso bheda.m gacchanti. tattha aadimhi desanaahaaro. tattha aya.m gaathaa kusalaa vaa akusalaa vaa saccaani vaa saccekadeso vaa. ki.m desitanti? sutte viima.msaa desanaahaaro. yathaa ariyasaccaani nikkhepo cattaari saccaani ^a^M0.0224^ea^ saadhaara.naani asaadhaara.naani ca. yaani ca a.t.thaarasa padaani dukkhato satta padaani sa"nkhepena kaayikena cetasikena dukkhena, appiyasampayogena piyavippayogena ca tiihi ca sa"nkhataahi. tattha tii.ni sa"nkhatalakkha.naani tisso dukkhataa uppaado sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, sa"nkhaaradukkhataaya dukkhataa ca sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, vipari.naamadukkhataaya dukkhataati a~n~nathattha.m ca sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, dukkhadukkhataaya ca dukkhataa, imesa.m ti.n.na.m sa"nkhatalakkha.naana.m tiisu vedanaabhuumiisu adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa uppaado sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, sa"nkhaaradukkhataaya ca dukkhataa tayo sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, sukhaa vedanaaya ca vipari.naamadukkhataaya ca dukkhataati a~n~nathatta.m sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, dukkhaavedanaa dukkhadukkhataa ca dukkhataa imamhi imesu navapadesu pa.thamakesu sattasu padesu so.lasasu padesu dukkhaa pariyesitabbaa, ekaadasa dukkhataaya ca lakkha.na.m ^a^P0.0082^ea^ niddese niddi.t.tha.m. paatubhaavalakkha.naa jaatiyaa ca paatubhaavacutilakkha.no cutoti vitthaarena pannarasapadaani kattabbaani, eva.m saadhaara.naani asaadhaara.naani ca sattasu dasasu padesu sa~n~naasa tividhe ca saasanappa.t.thaane a.t.thaarasavidhesu ca suttaadhi.t.thaanesu dasavidhesu ca suttavidheyyesu so.lasavidhesu ca haaresu ekaviisatividhaaya ca pavicayaviima.msaayaati ida.m desita.m. yathaabhuuta~nca desitanti, aya.m vuccati desanaahaaro.
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vicayo haaro?
[21] pada.m pa~nhaa ca pucchaa ca, ki.m pubba.m ki~nca pacchima.m.
[22] anugiiti saa ca vicayo, haaro vicayoti niddi.t.tho..

[03] padanti ^a^V0.0226^ea^ pa.thama.m pada.m. tassa ko attho? ya.m bhagavaa pu.t.tho aayasmataa ajitena ta.m gahetabba.m, katipadaani pu.t.thaani yathaaki.m kenassu nivuto lokoti gaathaa, imaani katipadaani cattaari iti visajjanaaya pucchaa. yattakehi padehi bhagavataa visajjitaani padaani iti pucchaaya ca yaa padaana.m sa"nkaasanaa, ida.m vuccati padanti.

[03] pa~nhaati imaani cattaari padaani. kati pa~nhaa? eko vaa dve vaa taduttari vaa imaani cattaari padaani eko pa~nho, atthaanuparivatti bya~njana.m hoti, sambahulaanipi padaani ekamevattha.m pucchati. imaani cattaari padaani anuparivattiini ta.m bya~njanena eko pa~nhova hoti. kenassu ^a^P0.0083^ea^ nivuto lokoti ^a^M0.0225^ea^ loka.m sandhaaya pucchati, kenassu nappakaasati kissaabhilepana.m bruusiiti ta.myeva pucchati. ki.msu tassa mahabbhayanti ta.myeva pucchati. eva.m atthaanuparivatti bya~njana.m eko pa~nho hoti, so pa~nho catubbidho eka.msabyaakara.niiyo vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa.tipucchaabyaakara.niiyo .thapaniyoti. tattha cakkhu aniccanti eka.msabyaakara.niiyo, ya.m anicca.m ta.m dukkhanti vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo, siyaa anicca.m na cakkhu, yaanipi aayatanaani ca na cakkhu, taanipi aniccanti na cakkhuyeva, aya.m vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo, ya.m cakkhu ta.m cakkhundriya.m neti pa.tipucchaabyaakara.niiyo, ta.m cakkhu tathaagatoti .thapaniyo. a~n~natra cakkhunaati .thapaniyo pa~nho. ida.m pa~nha.m bhagavaa ki.m pucchito, lokassa sa.mkileso pucchito. ki.m kaara.na.m? tividho hi sa.mkileso ta.nhaasa.mkileso ca di.t.thisa.mkileso ca duccaritasa.mkileso ca. tattha avijjaaya nivutoti avijja.m dasseti, jappaati ta.nha.m dasseti, mahabbhayanti akusalassa kammassa vipaaka.m dasseti, sota.m naama sukhavedaniiyassa kammassa dukkhavedaniiyo vipaako bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatiiti bhagavaa visajjeti, catuuhi yo padehi avijjaaya nivuto lokoti...pe0... eva.m vuccati.
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ taduttari pa.tipucchati, savanti sabbadhi sotaati gaathaa, cattaari padaani pucchati ta.m bhagavaa dviihi padehi visajjeti.
[21] yaani ^a^P0.0084^ea^ sotaani lokasmi.m, sati tesa.m nivaara.na.m.
[22] sotaana.m sa.mvara.m bruumi, pa~n~naayete pidhiiyare..

[03] imaani cattaari padaani dviihi padehi visajjeti. ida.m padanti pucchito, tassa sa.mkili.t.thassa ^a^V0.0227^ea^ lokassa vodaana.m pucchito, sotaani cha ta.nhaakaayaa bahulaadhivacanena niddi.t.thaa bhavanti sabbehi aayatanehi. taani sotaani kena nivaariyantiiti pariyu.t.thaanapahaana.m pucchati, kena sotaa pidhiiyareti anusayasamugghaata.m pucchati. tattha bhagavaa chasu dvaaresu satiyaa deseti, yo hi sampajaano viharati satidovaarike ca tassa indriyaani guttaani sambhavanti. tattha guttesu indriyesu yaa yaa vipassanaa, saa saa tesa.m tesa.m sotaana.m tassaa ca avijjaaya yo loko nivuto accantapahaanaaya sa.mvattati. eva.m sotaani pihitaanipi bhavanti tato uttari pucchati.
[03] pa~n~naa ^a^M0.0226^ea^ ca sati ca naamaruupassa kho tassa bhagavanta.m pu.t.thumaagamma kattheta.m upasammati imaani cattaari padaani bhagavaa ekena padena visajjeti.
[21] yameta.m pa~nha.m apucchi {pucchase pa~nha.m (pii0 ka0) passa su0 ni0 1043}, ajita ta.m vadaami te...pe0....
[22] vi~n~naa.nassa nirodhena, ettheta.m upasammati..

[03] iminaa pa~nhena ki.m pucchati? anupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu.m pucchati, ta.m bhagavaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa visajjeti. tattha ^a^P0.0085^ea^ pa.thamena pa~nhena sa.mkilesa.m pucchati. dutiyena pa~nhena vodaana.m pucchati. tatiyena pa~nhena sopaadisesanibbaanadhaatu.m pucchati. catutthena pa~nhena anupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu.m pa.tipucchati tato uttari pa.tipucchati.
[21] ye ca sa"nkhaatadhammaase, ye ca sekhaa {sekkhaa (ka0) passa su0 ni0 1044} puthuu idha.
[22] tesa.m me nipako iriya.m, pu.t.tho pabruuhi maarisa..

[03] imaani cattaari padaani pucchati. kati ca pana te pa~nhe sa"nkhaatadhammaa ca arahantaa sekkhaa ca? ki.m pubba.m ki~nca pacchimanti ayamattho. tattha katara.m pa.thama.m pucchati, katara.m pacchaa? arahanta.m pa.thama.m pucchati. sekkhadhamme tattha kena padena sa"nkhaatadhammaati arahanto gahitaa, puthuuti sekkhaa gahitaa. tesa.m me nipakoti saadhaara.na.m pada.m bhagavanta.m pucchati. tassa saadhaara.naani ca asaadhaara.naani ca pa~nhesu pucchitabbaani. ta.m bhagavaa visajjeti. na tathaa pu.t.tha.m, pa.thama.m pu.t.tha.m, ta.m pacchaa visajjeti. ya.m pacchaa pucchita.m pa.thama.m visajjeti. ki~nca ida.m pucchita.m visuddhaana.m visujjhantaana~nca kaa iriyaati ida.m pucchi, ta.m kaamesu naabhigijjheyya. manasaanaavilo siyaati pariyu.t.thaanaani vitakkena ca bhagavaa nivaareti, dve pana vitakkaanaavilataaya ^a^V0.0228^ea^ pariyu.t.thaana.m, yathaa niivara.nesu niddi.t.tha.m. kusalaa sabbadhammesuuti arahanta.m visajjeti.

[03] kenassu tarati oghanti gaathaa, imaani cattaari padaani. cattaaroyeva pa~nhaa. ki.m ^a^P0.0086^ea^ kaara.na.m, na hi ettha atthaanuparivatti bya~njana.m {yathaanuparivatthivajja.m (pii0 ka0)} yathaa pa.thama.m ajitapa~nhesu, tassa na eka.msena bahuuni visajjanaani, bahukaa pa~nhaa, ekova na caapi, sabbe pucchati, pubbe visajjito, yathaa catuttho ajitopa~nhe, ya.m ^a^M0.0227^ea^ ettha yathaabhuuta.m pariyesanaapadabandhena visajjanaayo eva.m yathaabhuuta.m pariyesati. yo puna ettha ya.m eva.m pucchati tattha ayamaakaaro pucchanaaya.m antoja.taa bahija.taati gaathaa {sa.m0 ni0 1.29} pucchitavisajjanaaya maggitabbaa. katha.m visajjitaati bhagavaati visajjeti? siile pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~noti gaathaa. tattha cittabhaavanaaya samathaa, pa~n~naabhaavanaaya vipassanaa. tattha eva.m anumiiyati, ye dhammaa samathena ca vipassanaaya ca pahiiyanti, te ime antoja.taa bahija.taa. tattha visajjana.m samathena raago pahiiyati, vipassanaaya avijjaa. ajjhattavatthuko raago antoja.taa, baahiravatthuko raago bahija.taa. ajjhattavatthukaa sakkaayadi.t.thi, aya.m antoja.taa. ekasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani ca baahiravatthukaani bahija.taa, yaa hi ajjhattavatthukaa yaa di.t.thibhaagiyena bhavissati, aya.m ja.taa. tathaa sa.mkhittena yaa kaaci ajjhattavatthukaa ta.nhaa ca di.t.thi ca, aya.m antoja.taa. yaa kaaci baahiravatthukaa ta.nhaa ca di.t.thi ca, aya.m bahija.taa.

[03] yathaa devataa bhagavanta.m pucchati ``catucakka.m navadvaara''nti gaathaa {sa.myuttanikaaye}. tattha bhagavaa visajjeti ``chetvaa naddhi.m varatta.m caa''ti gaathaa, ida.m bhagavaa dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m visajjeti. imaaya visajjanaaya bhagavaa anumiiyati ^a^P0.0087^ea^ kilese ettha purimaaya gaathaaya niddisitabbena. ta.m hi catucakkanti cattaaro vaa hatthapaadaa. navadvaaranti nava va.namukhaani. yathaa catucakkanti cattaaro upaadaanaa, upaadaanappaccayaa bhavo, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho. navadvaaranti nava maanavidhaa, maanajaatikaaya hi dukkha.m seyyenamhi paraso tii.ni tikaani pu.n.na.m. tikena sa.myutta.m hi pa~ncakaamagu.niko raago. tattha naddhiiti ta.nhaa visajjiiyati. varattanti maana.m visajjeti, icchaa lobho ca paapakoti pa~ncakaamagu.niko raago. tattha visamalobho paapakoti niddisiyati samuulata.nhanti. a~n~naa.namuulakaa ta.nhaati a~n~naa.namuulakaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaaya ca di.t.thiyaa ca pahaana.m. ye ca puna a~n~nepi keci catucakkayogena teneva kaara.nena ca yujjanti, sa.msaaragaamino dhammaa sabbe niddisitabbaa. tatthaaya.m gaathaa visajjanaa pucchaaya ^a^V0.0229^ea^ ca visajjanaaya sameti {sama.mti (pii0)}. ya.m yadi sandena atha saha byaakara.nena anugiitiya.m ca so vicayoti bhagavaa yattakaani padaani nikkhipati, tattakehi anugaayati.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ a.t.thahi ^a^M0.0228^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu duuteyya.m gantumarahati {kaatumarahati (pii0 ka0) passa a0 ni0 8.16}. imaani a.t.tha padaani nikkhittaani. chahi padehi bhagavaa anugaayati.
[21] ``yo ve na byathati {byaathati (ka0)} patvaa, parisa.m uggavaadini.m.
[22] na ca haapeti vacana.m, na ca chaadeti saasana.m..
[21] ``asandiddhi.m ca bha.nati, pucchito na ca kuppati.
[22] sa ve taadisako bhikkhu, duuteyya.m gantumarahatii''ti..

[03] tattha pana bhagavaa yattakaani padaani nikkhipati, tattakehi anugaayati. sattahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato kalyaa.namitto piyo garubhaavaniiyoti vitthaarena, ida.m bhagavaa sattahi padehi anugaayati. iti bahussutavaa anugaayati, appatarakatha.m pada.m vaa nikkhepo, bahussutavaa nava padaani nikkhepo, appatarikaa anugiitiyaa bahutarikaa anugaayati. aya.m vuccati te anugiiti ca vicayo, aya.m ^a^P0.0088^ea^ vicayo naama haaro.
[03] tattha katamo yuttihaaro?
[21] sabbesa.m haaraana.m, yaa bhuumii yo ca gocaro tesa.m.
[22] yuttaayutti parikkhaa, haaro yuttiiti niddi.t.tho..
[03] haaraana.m so.lasanna.m yathaa desanaa yathaa vicayo yo ca niddisiyati, aya.m niddeso. aya.m pucchaa suttesu na yujjatiiti yaa tattha viima.msaa, aya.m yutti.

[03] yathaa hi sahetuu sappaccayaa sattaa sa.mkilissanti, atthi hetu atthi paccayo sattaana.m sa.mkilesaaya, sahetuu sappaccayaa sattaa visujjhanti, atthi hetu atthi paccayo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa. siilavataa, aananda, puggalena na veyyaakara.niyaa kinti me vippa.tisaaro uppaadeyya...pe0... abyaakara.na.m kattabba.m, aya.m visuddhiyaa maggo. tassa hetu ko paccayo, siilakkhandhassa ^a^V0.0230^ea^ cattaari cattaari hetu ca paccayo ca. sappurisasa.msevo yo ca patiruupadesavaaso ca, aya.m upaadaapaccayataa sappaccayo. ya.m poraa.nakamma.m assa vipaako paccayo, taaya paccayaaya attasammaapa.nidhi, aya.m ^a^M0.0229^ea^ hetu. iti siilakkhandho sahetu sappaccayoti ida.m lokika.m siila.m.

[03] ya.m pana lokuttara.m siila.m, tassa tii.ni indriyaani paccayo -- saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m samaadhindriya.m -- aya.m paccayo. satindriya~nca pa~n~nindriya~nca hetu. pa~n~naaya nibbedhagaaminiyaa, ya.m siila.m jaayati. sotaapannassa ca siila.m tenaaya.m hetu aya.m paccayo. ya.m puna samaadhino passaddhi ca piiti ca paamojja.m paccayo. ya.m sukha.m hetu tena samaadhikkhandho sahetu sappaccayo. ya.m ^a^P0.0089^ea^ samaahito yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m pa~n~naa. tassa paratoghoso ajjhatta.m ca yoniso manasikaaro hetu ca paccayo ca, iti ime tayo khandhaa sahetuu sappaccayaa eva.m satta pa~n~naa. sattabyaakara.niisu ca suttesu na yujjati. aya.m yuttihaaro. so catuusu mahaapadesesu da.t.thabbo.
[03] 47^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m pada.t.thaana.m?
[21] dhamma.m deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa ya.m pada.t.thaana.m.
[22] iti yaava sabbadhammaa, eso haaro pada.t.thaano..

[03] tattha pa~ncakaamagu.naa kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. yesa.m kesa~nci kaamaraago uppajjati uppanno vaa uppajjissati vaa, etesu yepi pa~ncasu ruupesu aayatanesu naa~n~natra etehi kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaananti. vuccate, tena pa~nca kaamagu.naa kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. pa~ncindriyaani ruuparaagassa pada.t.thaana.m. manindriya.m bhavaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. pa~ncakkhandhaa sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. ekasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani di.t.thiraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. kaamadhaatu kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. aruupadhaatu aruuparaagassa pada.t.thaana.m. sukhasa~n~naa kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. byaapaadasa~n~naa byaapaadassa pada.t.thaana.m. asampaja~n~nataa sammohassa pada.t.thaana.m. nava aaghaatavatthuuni byaapaadassa pada.t.thaana.m. navavidha.m maana.m {navamaana.m vidhamaanassa (pii0 ka0)} maanassa pada.t.thaana.m. sukhaa vedanaa raagaanusayassa pada.t.thaana.m. dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tighaanusayassa pada.t.thaana.m. adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa avijjaanusayassa pada.t.thaana.m. attavaadupaadaana~nca musaavaado ca lobhassa pada.t.thaana.m. paa.naatipaato ca pisu.navaacaa ca pharusavaacaa ca byaapaadassa pada.t.thaana.m. micchatta~nca samphappalaapo ca mohassa pada.t.thaana.m. bhava.m bhoga~nca ^a^V0.0231^ea^ vokaaro aha.mkaarassa pada.t.thaana.m. baahiraana.m pariggaho ^a^M0.0230^ea^ mama.mkaarassa ^a^P0.0090^ea^ pada.t.thaana.m. kaayassa sa"nga.m {kaayava"nka.m (pii0)} di.t.thiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. kaayikadoso dosassa pada.t.thaana.m. kaayikakaasaavo lobhassa pada.t.thaana.m. yo yo vaa pana dhammo yena yena aaramma.nena uppajjati saccaadhi.t.thaanena vaa dhammaadhi.t.thaanena vaa anusayanena vaa, so dhammo tassa pada.t.thaana.m. tena saaramma.nena so dhammo uppajjati.

[03] yathaa manusso purimassa padassa pada.t.thaana.m alabhanto dutiya.m pada.m uddharati, so pacchaanupada.m sa.mharati. yadi pana yo na dutiyapadassa pada.t.thaana.m labhati, apara.m pada.m uddharati. tassa yo ceso paccayo bhavati. eva.m dhammo kusalo vaa akusalo vaa abyaakato vaa pada.t.thaana.m alabhanto na pavattati. yathaa payuttassa dhammassa yonilaabho {yoniso laabho (pii0)}, aya.m vuccati pada.t.thaano haaro.
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo lakkha.no haaro?
[21] vuttamhi ekadhamme, ye dhammaa ekalakkha.naa tena.
[22] sabbe bhavanti vuttaa, so haaro lakkha.no naama..

[03] yesa~nca susamaaraddhaa, nicca.m kaayagataasatiiti gaathaaya vuttaaya kaayagataasatiyaa vuttaa vedanaagataa cittagataa dhammagataa ca sati catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m ekena satipa.t.thaanena. na hi citta.m ekasmi.m vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyaa pavattati, naanaasu gatiisu pavattati, kaayagataasatiyaa vuttaaya vuttaa vedanaagataa cittadhammagataa ca. na hi kaayagataasatiyaa bhaavitaaya satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m na gacchanti. eva.m ^a^P0.0091^ea^ tassadisesu dhammesu vuttesu sabbadhammaa vuttaa ca bhavanti.

[03] sacittapariyodaapana.m, eta.m buddhaana saasananti gaathaa cetasikaa dhammaa vuttaa, citte ruupa.m vutta.m. ida.m naamaruupa.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m. tato sacittapariyodaapanaa ya.m ya.m odapeti, ta.m dukkha.m. yena odapeti, so maggo. yato odapanaa, so nirodho. cakkhu.m ca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, tattha sahajaataa vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa phasso manasikaaro ete te dhammaa ekalakkha.naa uppaadalakkha.nena. yo ca ruupe nibbindati, vedanaaya so nibbindati, sa~n~naasa"nkhaaravi~n~naa.nesupi so nibbindati. iti ^a^M0.0231^ea^ ye ekalakkha.naa dhammaa, tesa.m ekamhi dhamme niddi.t.the sabbe dhammaa niddi.t.thaa honti, aya.m vuccati lakkha.no haaro.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0232^ea^ katamo catubyuuho haaro?
[21] nirutti adhippaayo ca, bya~njanaa desanaaya ca.
[22] suttattho pubbaaparasandhi, eso haaro catubyuuho..

[03] tattha katamaa nirutti, saa katha.m pariyesitabbaa {passitabbaa (pii0 ka0)}? yathaa vutta.m bhagavataa ekaadasahi a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu khippa.m dhammesu mahatta.m paapu.naati, atthakusalo ca hoti, dhammakusalo ca hoti, niruttikusalo ca hoti, itthaadhivacanakusalo ca hoti, purisaadhivacanakusalo ca, vipurisaadhivacanakusalo ca, atiitaadhivacanakusalo ca, anaagataadhivacanakusalo ca, paccuppannaadhivacanakusalo ca. ekaadhippaayena kusalo naanaadhippaayena kusalo. kimhi ^a^P0.0092^ea^ desita.m, atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m. itthaadhivacanena purisaadhivacanena vipurisaadhivacanena sabba.m yathaasutta.m niddi.t.tha.m. ta.m bya~njanato niruttikosallato yo ya.m suttassa suniruttidunniruttita.m avekkhati, ida.m eva.m niropayitabba.m. idampi na niropayitabba.m. ida.m vuccate niruttikosalla.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m adhippaayakosalla.m? yathaadesitassa suttassa sabbassa vaara.m gacchati imena bhagavataa desitabbanti. yathaa ki.m appamaado amata.m pada.m, pamaado maccuno padanti gaathaa. ettha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye asiitimeva aaka"nkhanti te appamattaa viharissanti, aya.m adhippaayo.
[21] yogassa kaala.m na nivattati yaa ca, so na tattha paapintave bhavanti.
[22] vedanaamaggaisinaa {vedanaamagga.m isinaa (pii0)} pavedita.m, dhutarajaasavaa dukkhaa pamokkhaataa..

[03] ettha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye dukkhe naassaadakaa {dukkhena saadhakaa (pii0)}, te viiriyamaarabhissanti dukkhakkhayaayaati. aya.m tattha bhagavato adhippaayo. iti gaathaaya vaa byaakara.nena vaa desite iminaa suttena saadhakaa, yo ^a^M0.0232^ea^ eva.m dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjatiiti so adhippaayo, aya.m vuccati desanaadhippaayo.

[03] tattha katamo pubbaaparasandhi? ya.m ^a^P0.0093^ea^ gaathaaya.m vaa suttesu vaa padaani asiiti taani bhavanti eva.m vaa evameti tassaa gaathaaya suttassa vaa yaani purimaani padaani yaani ca pacchimakaani ^a^V0.0233^ea^, taani samosaaretabbaani. eva.m so pubbaaparena sandhi ~naayati. yaa ekaa samaaraddhaa gaathaa dve tii.ni vaa tassa mekadese bhaasitaana.m abhaasitaahi gaathaahi aniddi.t.tho attho bhavati tadupadhaaritabba.m. ya.mva sabbaa {ya.m vattabba.m (pii0)} itissa pariyesamaanassa pariyesanaa ka"nkhaa, tassa vaa puggalassa pa~n~nattiina.m apare pariyesitabba.m. ida.m vuccate pubbaaparena sandhi. kosallanti vatthuto nidaanakosalla.m. bya~njanato niruttikosalla.m. desanaadhippaayakosalla.m. pubbaaparena sandhikosalla.m. tattha tassa gaathaa pariyesitaa nidaana.m vaa. upalabbhitu.m na attho niddisitabbo vatthuto nidaanakosalla.m atthakosalla.m imehi catuuhi padehi attho pariyesiyanto yathaabhuuta.m pariyi.t.tho hoti. atha ca sabbo vatthuto vaa nidaanena vaa yo adhippaayo bya~njano nirutti sandhi ca anuttaro eso pubbaaparena eva.m suttatthena desitabba.m. aya.m catubyuuho haaro.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo aava.t.to haaro?
[21] ekamhi pada.t.thaane, pariyesati sesaka.m pada.t.thaana.m.
[22] aava.t.tati pa.tipakkhe, aava.t.to naama so haaro..

[03] yathaa ki.m unna.laana.m pamattaananti gaathaayo. ya.m pamaado, ida.m kissa pada.t.thaana.m? kusalaana.m dhammaana.m osaggassa. kusaladhammosaggo pana kissa pada.t.thaana.m ^a^P0.0094^ea^? akusaladhammapa.tisevanaaya. kissa pada.t.thaana.m, kusaladhammapa.tisevanaaya? kissa pada.t.thaana.m, kilesavatthupa.tisevanaaya? iti pamaadena mohapakkhiyaa di.t.thi avijjaa chandaraagapakkhiyaa. tattha ta.nhaa ca di.t.thi cattaaro aasavaa ta.nhaa kaamaasavo ca bhavaasavo ca di.t.thaasavo ca avijjaasavo ca. tattha citte atthiiti di.t.thi cetasikesu niccanti pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu ajjhaavahanena kaamaasavo, upapattiisu aasatti bhavaasavo. tattha ruupakaayo ^a^M0.0233^ea^ kaamaasavassa bhavaasavassa ca pada.t.thaana.m. naamakaayo di.t.thaasavassa avijjaasavassa ca pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] tattha alliyanaaya ajjhattavaahana.m kaamaasavassa lakkha.na.m. patthanaganthanaabhisa"nkhaarakaayasa"nkhaara.na.m bhavaasavassa lakkha.na.m, abhiniveso ca paraamaaso ca di.t.thaasavassa lakkha.na.m. appa.tivedho dhammesu asampaja~n~naa ca avijjaasavassa lakkha.na.m. ime cattaaro aasavaa cattaari upaadaanaani. kaamaasavo kaamupaadaana.m, bhavaasavo bhavupaadaana.m, di.t.thaasavo di.t.thupaadaana.m, avijjaasavo attavaadupaadaana.m, imehi catuuhi upaadaanehi pa~ncakkhandhaa. tattha avijjaasavo citte pahaatabbo, so citte cittaanupassissa pahiiyati. di.t.thaasavo dhammesu pahaatabbo, so dhammesu ^a^V0.0234^ea^ dhammaanupassissa pahiiyati. bhavaasavo aasattiyaa pahaatabbo, so vedanaasu vedanaanupassissa pahiiyati. kaamaasavo pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu pahaatabbo, so kaaye kaayaanupassissa pahiiyati. tattha kaayaanupassanaa dukkhamariyasacca.m bhajati. vedanaanupassanaa pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m paccayo sukhindriyassa ^a^P0.0095^ea^ dukkhindriyassa somanassindriyassa domanassindriyassa upekkhindriyassa, sattakilesopacaaro tena samudaya.m bhajati. citte cittaanupassanaa nirodha.m bhajati. dhammesu dhammaanupassanaa magga.m bhajati. tenassa catuusu ca dassanena tasseva sabbe pahiiyanti, yena niddi.t.thaa pa.thama.m unna.laana.m pamattaana.m tesa.m va.d.dhanti aasavaa. jaanato hi passato aasavaana.m khayo dukkha.m samudayo nirodho maggo hi akusalaa dhammaa. eva.m pariyesitabbaa. yaava tassa akusalassa gati tato pa.tipakkhena akusale dhamme pariyesati tesa.m kilesaana.m haarena aava.t.tati. aya.m vuccate aava.t.to haaro. eva.m sukkaapi dhammaa pariyesitabbaa. akusaladhamme aagamissa.
[03] tattha aava.t.tassa haarassa aya.m bhuumi sati upa.t.thaanaa ca vipallaasaa ca cattaari ~naa.naani sakkaayasamuppaadaayagaaminii ca pa.tipadaa sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vibhatti haaro? ya.m ki~nci vibhajjabyaakara.niiya.m vuccati vibhatti haaro. yathaa ki.m aagantvaa ca puna puggalo hoti, no vaagata.m ^a^M0.0234^ea^ na paribhaasati {no vaa na paribhaasati (pii0), na taavaaya.m paribhaasi (ka0)} paripucchataaya pa~nhaaya atiyana.m ekassa ki~nci -- aya.m vuccate vibhatti haaro.

[03] tattha katamo parivattano haaro. ya.m ki~nci pa.tipakkhaniddeso, aya.m vuccati parivattano haaro. yathaa vutta.m ^a^P0.0096^ea^ bhagavataa sammaadi.t.thikassa purisapuggalassa micchaadi.t.thi nijji.n.naa hotiiti vitthaarena sabbaani magga"ngaani. aya.m vuccate parivattano haaro.
[03] tattha katamo vevacano haaro?
[21] vevacanehi anekehi, eka.m dhamma.m pakaasita.m.
[22] sutte yo jaanaati suttaviduu, vevacano naama so haaro..

[03] yathaa aayasmaa saariputto ekamhi vatthumhi vevacanena naanaavuttena bhagavataa pasa.msito ``mahaapa~n~no saariputto haasapa~n~no javanapa~n~no''ti ida.m pa~n~naaya vevacana.m. yathaa ca maggavibha"nge ^a^V0.0235^ea^ niyyaanattho ekameka.m magga"nga.m vevacanehi niddi.t.tha.m. eva.m avijjaaya vevacanaa. eka.m akusalamuula.m tadeva santa.m tesu tesu janapadesu tena tena pajaananti. na hi anena tadevapi aalapiyanti a~n~na.m bhajati. sabbakaamajahassa bhikkhunoti kaamaa aalapitaa. yassa nitthi.n.no sa"nkoti teyeva kaame sa"nkaati aalapati. su.namaanassa puretara.m rajjanti teyeva kaame rajjanti aalapati. eva.m suttamhi yo dhammo desiyati tassa pariye.t.thi ``katamassa dhammassa ida.m naama.m katamassa ida.m vevacana''nti. sabba~n~nuu hi yesa.m yesa.m yaa nirutti hoti, yathaagaami tena tena desetiiti tassa vevacana.m pariyesitabba.m. aya.m vevacano haaro.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo pa~n~natti haaro? cattaari ^a^P0.0097^ea^ ariyasaccaaniiti sutta.m niddisati, nikkhepapa~n~natti. yaa samudayapa~n~natti. kaba.liikaare aahaare atthi chando atthi raago yaava pati.t.thita.m. tattha vi~n~naa.na.m pabhavapa~n~natti.m pa~n~napeti. kaba.liikaare aahaare natthi chando...pe0... samugghaati pa~n~natti.

[03] tassa kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccatiiti pahaanapa~n~natti.m pa~n~napeti. ta.nhaa yassa purakkhataa pa~n~naa ^a^M0.0235^ea^ parivattati gaathaa manaapapa~n~natti.m pa~n~napeti. eva.m pana manaapapa~n~nattiiti ekadhamma.m bhagavaa pa~n~napeti. na hi ta.nhaa dukkhasamudayoti kaaretvaa sabbattha ta.nhaasamudayo niddisitabbo. yathaa uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti vinodeti pajahatiiti pa.tikkhepapa~n~natti. eva.m sabbesa.m dhammaana.m kusalaana~nca akusalaana~nca ya~ncassa dhammakkhetta.m bhavati, so ceva dhammo tattha pavattati. tadavasi.t.thaa dhammaa tassaanuvattakaa honti. saa duvidhaa pa~n~natti -- paraadhiinapa~n~natti ca saadhiinapa~n~natti ca. katamaa saadhiinapa~n~natti? samaadhi.m, bhikkhave {passa sa.m0 ni0 3.5}, bhaavetha, samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ``ruupa.m anicca''nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m saadhiinapa~n~natti paraadhiinapa~n~natti ca, saa pa~n~natti pa~n~naaya ca siilassa ca, yathaa cattaari jhaanaani bhaavetha. tassa atthi samaadhindriya.m muduuni cattaari indriyaani taani catuparaadhiinaani, tii.ni aveccappasaadeti ^a^P0.0098^ea^ paraadhiina.m samaadhindriya.m cattaari indriyaani paraadhiinaati catuusu ariyasaccesu aparaadhiina.m pa~n~nindriya.m satipa.t.thaanesu sammappadhaanesu viiriyindriya.m. iti sake pada.t.thaane sake khettasaadhiino so dhammo, so ca tattha pa~n~naapetabbo. tassa pa.tipakkhaa nighaato niddisitabbo. etthaaya.m anekaakaarapa~n~natti kena kaara.nena aya.m dhammo pa~n~nattoti. aya.m vuccate pa~n~natti.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0236^ea^ katamo otara.no haaro? chasu dhammesu otaaretabba.m. katamesu chasu? khandhesu dhaatuusu aayatanesu indriyesu saccesu pa.ticcasamuppaadesu. natthi ta.m sutta.m vaa gaathaa vaa byaakara.na.m vaa. imesu channa.m dhammaana.m a~n~natarasmi.m na sandissati. ettaavataa esa sabbaa desanaa yaa taa khandhaa vaa dhaatuyo vaa aayatanaani vaa saccaani vaa pa.ticcasamuppaado vaa, tattha pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m vedanaakkhandho raagadosamohaana.m pada.t.thaana.m. tattha tisso vedanaayo tassa sukhaaya vedanaaya somanasso savicaaro, dukkhaaya vedanaaya domanasso savicaaro, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya upekkho savicaaro. ya.m puna tattha vedayita.m ida.m dukkhasacca.m, khandhesu sa"nkhaarakkhandho tattha kaayo pamatta.m saupavattati, ta~nca sa"nkhaaragato dvidhaa ca bhava"ngotara.na.m kamma.m tii.ni ca sa"nkhaaraani ^a^P0.0099^ea^ pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaraa vaa apu~n~naa vaa aane~njaa vaa hetu sabbasaraagassa no viitaraagassa, dosassa abhisa"nkhaaraani ca aviitaraago ceteti ca pakappeti ca, viitaraago ^a^M0.0236^ea^ pana ceteti ca no abhisa"nkharoti, ya.m u.nha.m vajira.m ka.t.the vaa rukkhe vaa a~n~nattha vaa patanta.m bhindati ca .dahati ca, eva.m saraagacetanaa ceteti ca abhisa"nkharoti ca. yathaa sata.m vajira.m na bhindati na ca .dahati, eva.m viitaraagacetanaa ceteti na ca abhisa"nkharoti. tattha pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m eko khandho anindriyasariira.m sa~n~naakkhandho.

[03] tattha dhaatuuna.m a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo. tattha yaa ruupii dasa dhaatuyo, taasu desiyamaanaasu ruupakkhandho niddisitabbo, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m. yepi ca cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa manodhaatusattamaa, tattha vi~n~naa.nakkhandho ca niddisitabbo, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m. dhammadhaatu pana dhammasamosara.naa, so dhammo hetunaa ca nissandena ca phalena ca kiccena ca vevacanena ca yena yena upalabbhati, tena tena niddisitabbo. yadi vaa kusalaa yadi vaa akusalaa yadi vaa abyaakataa yadi vaa asa"nkhataa. dvaadasanna.m aayatanaana.m dasa aayatanaani ruupaani ta.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m niddisitabba.m. ruupakkhandho ca manaayatana~nca vi~n~naa.nakkhandhena niddisitabba.m, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m. dhammaayatana.m naanaadhammasamosara.na.m. tattha ye dhammaa indriyaana.m indriyesu niddisitabbaa, ye anindriyaana.m anindriyesu niddisitabbaa. pariyaayato ca ^a^P0.0100^ea^ otaaretabbaa. yathaa saa dhammadhaatu tathaa dhammaayatana.m pariyesitabba.m. yaayeva hi dhammadhaatu tadeva dhammaayatana.m anuuna.m anadhika.m.

[03] tattha pa.ticcasamuppaado atthi tividho, atthi catubbidho, atthi duvidho. tattha tividho pa.ticcasamuppaado hetuphalanissando. avijjaa sa"nkhaaraa ta.nhaa upaadaana.m ca aya.m hetu, vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V0.0237^ea^ naamaruupa.m sa.laayatana.m phasso vedanaa ca aya.m paccayo, yo bhavo aya.m vipaako, yaa jaati mara.na.m aya.m nissando.

[03] katha.m catubbidho hetu paccayo vipaako nissando ca? avijjaa ca ta.nhaasa"nkhaaraa ca upaadaana.m ca -- aya.m hetu. vi~n~naa.na.m naamaruupassa paccayo. naamaruupa.m upapajjati, tathaa upapannassa sa.laayatana.m phasso vedanaa ca -- aya.m paccayo. yo bhavo aya.m vipaako. yaa jaati yaa ca jaraamara.na.m -- aya.m nissando.

[03] katha.m duvidho pa.ticcasamuppaado? avijjaa sa"nkhaaraa ta.nhaa upaadaana.m -- aya.m samudayo. vi~n~naa.na.m naamaruupa.m sa.laayatana.m phasso vedanaa bhavo jaati mara.na~nca ^a^M0.0237^ea^ -- ida.m dukkha.m. ya.m pana avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho imaani tappa.tipakkhena dve saccaani. tasmaa pa.ticcasamuppaado yena aakaarena niddi.t.tho, tena tena niddisitabbo.

[03] tathaa baaviisati indriyaani. dvaadasa indriyaani cakkhundriyaani cakkhundriya.m yena domanassindriya.m, ida.m dukkha.m. purisindriya.m ca di.t.thiyaa ca ta.nhaapada.t.thaana.m. yato puriso purisakaana.m ta.m eva.m kaatabbataa. atha ajjhatta.m saarajjati. aya.m aha.mkaaro ta.m yasaa saaratto bahiddhaa pariyesati, aya.m mama.mkaaro eva.m itthii, tattha ^a^P0.0101^ea^ sukhindriya.m ca somanassindriya.m ca purisindriyassaanuvattakaa honti. tassa adhippaayaparipu.n.naa lobhadhammaa kusalamuule pava.d.dhenti. tassa ce ayamadhippaayo na paaripuuri.m gacchati. tassa dukkhindriya.m ca domanassindriya.m ca vattati. doso ca akusalamuula.m pava.d.dhati. sace pana upekkhaa bhaaveti upekkhindriyassa anuvattakaamaa bhavati. amoho ca kusalamuula.m pava.d.dhati. iti satta indriyaani kilesavatthumupaadaaya ananvemaani avamaani sabbassa vedanaa itthindriya.m purisindriya.m. tattha a.t.tha indriyaani saddhindriya.m yaava a~n~naataavino indriya.m, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa. dasanna.m pa~n~nindriyaana.m kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. manindriya.m bhavaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. pa~n~nindriyaani ruuparaagassa pada.t.thaana.m. itthindriya.m ca purisindriya.m ca satta pa~n~nattiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. tattha yena yena indriyena yutta.m vaa gaathaaya otaaretu.m sakkoti, tena tena niddisitabbo. eva.m khandhesu dhaatuusu aayatanesu saccesu pa.ticcasamuppaadesu aya.m otara.no haaro.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo sodhano haaro? yo gaathaa ekena aarambho bhaasissanti. tattha ekissaa bhaasitaaya avasi.t.thaasu bhaasitaasu so attho na niddisitabbo. ki.m kaara.na.m? na hi ^a^V0.0238^ea^ taava so attho bhaasito, so abhaasito na sakkaa niddisitu.m. yathaa ^a^P0.0102^ea^ ki.m appamaado amata.m padanti gaathaa ayamekaa gaathaa niddisitabbaa. ki.m kaara.na.m, atthikkhaataava imassa aarambhassa anabhaasita.m?
[21] eva.m {eta.m (pii0) passa dha0 pa0 22} visesato ~natvaa, appamaadamhi pa.n.ditaa.
[22] appamaade pamodanti, ariyaana.m gocare rataati..

[03] ida.m ^a^M0.0238^ea^ abhaasita.m. imissaapi gaathaaya bhaasitaaya attho niddisitabbo. ki.m kaara.na.m, atthi tattha avasi.t.tha.m? te jhaayino {dha0 pa0 23} saatatikaa, nicca.m da.lhaparakkamaati gaathaa, eva.m imaa gaathaayo upadhaaritaa yadaa bhavanti, tadaa attho niddisitabbo. eva.m assutapubbesu suttesu byaakara.nesu vaa ekuddeso bhaasito. yaa viima.msaa tulanaa ida.m atthi kicca.m, ida.m sutta.m bhaasita.m tassa vevacana.m niddi.t.tha.m vaa na vaati. tattha yaa viima.msaa, aya.m vuccate sodhano haaro.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo adhi.t.thaano haaro? ekattataa ca vemattataa ca. tattha kitapa~n~natti ca kiccapa~n~natti ca. saa ekattataa ca vemattataa ca yathaa pa~n~natti ekavevacanena vemattataa pajaanaatiiti pa~n~naa, saa ca aadhipateyya.t.thena pa~n~natti. ya.m anomattiya.t.thena pa~n~nattanti. ta.m anomattiya.t.thena pa~n~naabala.m. tanubhuutaa ^a^P0.0103^ea^ gocarattavasaa sevasati tiisu ratanesu anussati buddhaanussati dhammaanussati sa"nghaanussati avipariitaanussara.nataaya. sammaadi.t.thi dhammaana.m pavicayena dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo abhiniihaarato abhi~n~naati. sa"nkhepena maggaa kaa vatthu avikopanataaya ekattaa, yathaa u.nhena sa.msa.t.tha.m u.nhodaka.m, siitena sa.msa.t.tha.m siitodaka.m khaarodaka.m gu.lhodakanti, ida.m ekattataa vemattataa ca.

[03] atthi ^a^V0.0239^ea^ puna dhammo naanaadhammasa"nghato ekato yathaaruupa.m cattaaro vaaretabbaa, ta~nca ruupanti ekattataa. pathaviidhaatu aapo tejo vaayodhaatuuti vemattataa. eva.m sabbaa catasso dhaatuyo ruupanti ekattataa, pathaviidhaatu aapo tejo vaayodhaatuuti vemattataa. pathaviidhaatuuti lakkha.nato ekattataa, sa.mki.n.navatthuto vemattataa. ya.m ki~nci kakkha.lalakkha.na.m, sabba.m ta.m pathaviidhaatuuti ekattataa. kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa chavi cammanti vemattataa. eva.m sabba.m catasso dhaatuyo ruupanti ekatta.m. saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaati vemattataa.

[03] atthi puna dhammo vemattataa a~n~no naama.m labhati. yathaa kaayaanupassanaaya navasa~n~naa viniilakasa~n~naa uddhumaatakasa~n~naa, aya.m asubhasa~n~naa, yaa ekattataa aaramma.nato vemattato, saa eva.m sa~n~naavedanaasu aadiinava.m samanupassato tathaadhi.t.thaana.m samaadhindriya.m ca saayeva ^a^M0.0239^ea^ dhammesu tattha sa~n~naabhaavanaa viiriyindriya.m ca dhammesu dhammaanupassanaa citte attasa~n~na.m pajahato pa~n~nindriya.m ca citte cittaanupassanaa. (iti) {( ) natthi pii0 potthake} yo koci ~naa.napacaaro sabbaso ^a^P0.0104^ea^ pa~n~naaya gocaro pa~n~naa, aya.m vemattataa, yathaa kaamaraago bhavaraago di.t.thiraagoti vemattataa ta.nhaaya. iti ya.m ekattataaya ca vemattataaya ca ~naa.na.m viima.msanaa tulanaa. aya.m adhi.t.thaano haaro.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo parikkhaaro haaro? sahetu sappaccaya.m vodaana~nca sa.mkileso ca, ya.m tadubhaya.m pariye.t.thi, sa parikkhaaro haaro. iti dhammaana.m sahetukaana.m hetu pariyesitabbo, sappaccayaana.m paccayo pariyesitabbo.

[03] tattha ki.m naanaakara.na.m, hetussa ca paccayassa ca? sabhaavo hetu, parabhaavo paccayo. parabhaavassa paccayo hetupi, sabhaavassa hetuyaa parabhaavassa kassaci paccayo avutto hetu, vutto paccayo. ajjhattiko hetu, baahiro paccayo. sabhaavo hetu, parabhaavo paccayo. nibbattako hetu, pa.tiggaahako {pariggaahako (ka0)} paccayo. nevaasiko hetu, aagantuko paccayo. asaadhaara.no hetu, saadhaara.no paccayo. ekoyeva hetu, aparaaparo paccayo.

[03] hetussa upakara.na.m samudaanetabbo. samudaana.m hetu, tattha duvidho hetu. duvidho paccayo -- samanantarapaccayo ca paramparapaccayo ca. hetupi duvidho -- samanantarahetu ca paramparahetu ca. tattha katamo paramparapaccayo? avijjaa naamaruupassa paramparapaccayo, vi~n~naa.na.m samanantarapaccayataaya paccayo. yadi aadimhi avijjaanirodho bhavati naamaruupassa nirodhopi. tattha samanantara.m ki.m kaara.na.m paramparapaccayo samanantarapaccayo samuddaanito, aya.m paccayato. tattha ^a^P0.0105^ea^ katamo paramparahetu? vijaanantassa paramparahetutaaya hetu, a~n~naakaaro samanantarahetutaaya hetu. yassa hi ya.m samanantara.m nibbattati, so tassa hetupi jaatinirodhaa bahi aakaaranirodho, aakaaranirodhaa da.n.danirodho, da.n.danirodhaa kha.n.danirodho. eva.m hetupi dvidhaa so taahi passitabbo.

[03] pa.ticcasamuppaado ^a^M0.0240^ea^ yathaa avijjaapaccayo tassa puna ki.mpaccayo, ayoniso manasikaaro. so kassa paccayo sa"nkhaaraana.m, iti paccayo ca samuppanna.m ca tassa ko hetu avijjaayeva ^a^V0.0240^ea^. tathaa hi purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati. tattha avijjaanusayo avijjaapariyu.t.thaanassa hetu purimaa hetu pacchaa paccayo, saapi avijjaasa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo catuuhi kaara.nehi sahajaatapaccayataaya samanantarapaccayataaya abhisandanapaccayataaya pati.t.thaanapaccayataaya.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ katha.m sahajaatapaccayataaya avijjaasa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo? ya.m citta.m raagapariyu.t.tha.m, tattha avijjaapariyu.t.thaanena sabba.m pa~n~naaya gocara.m hanti. tattha sa"nkhaaraa tipaccaya.t.thikaa addhaabhuumikaaramahattassa {laddhaa bhuumikaramahattassa (pii0 ka0)} aya.m avijjaasahasamuppanna.m vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepullatamaapajjantii catuuhi kaara.nehi pa~n~naa pahiiyati. katamehi catuuhi? anusayo pariyu.t.thaana.m sa.myojana.m upaadaana.m. tattha anusayo pariyu.t.thaana.m jaati pariyu.t.thitaa sa.myujjati sa.myuttaa upaadiyati upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo. eva.m ^a^P0.0106^ea^ te sa"nkhaaraa tividhaa uppannaa bhuumigataa naasa~n~nattha aya.m maggena viniitattaayaati {vinibhattaaya (pii0), vinibhattataaya (ka0)} te thaamagataa apativiniitaatipi te sa"nkhaaraati vuccati, eva.m sahetusamuppanna.t.thena atthi meva paccayaa sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo niddi.t.tha.m apanetvaa kusala.m akusala.m kusalo ca akusalo ca pakkhipitabbo, vipaakadhammaa apanetvaa vacaniiya.m avacaniiya.m vacaniiya~nca avacaniiya~nca pakkhipitabba.m, bhavaapevirittaa, sabbasutta.m parikkhipitabba.m.

[03] dasa tathaagatabalaani cattaari vesaarajjaani pu~n~naani ana~n~naakata.m avijjaa samanantarapaccayataaya sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo yena cittena saha samuppannaa avijjaa tassa cittassa samanantaracitta.m samuppannanti, tassa ya.m samanantaracitta.m samuppannanti, tassa pacchimassa cittassa purimacitta.m hetupaccayataaya paccayo, tena avijjaa hetu tena cittena upaadaana.m anokaasakataa ~naa.na.m na uppajjanti. yaa tassa appamaadaa dhaatu abhijjhaabhisanditaa tahi.m vipallaasaa uppajjanti ``asubhe subha''nti ``dukkhe sukha''nti, tattha sa"nkhaaraa uppajjanti rattaa du.t.thaa muulassa cetanaa raagapariyu.t.thaanena byaapaadapariyu.t.thaanena avijjaapariyu.t.thaanena di.t.thivipallaaso vatthuniddese niddisitabbo ^a^M0.0241^ea^, ya.m vipariitacitto vijaanaati aya.m cittavipallaaso, yaa vipariitasa~n~naa upagga.nhaati aya.m sa~n~naavipallaaso. ya.m vipariitadi.t.thi abhinivisati aya.m di.t.thivipallaaso. a.t.tha ^a^P0.0107^ea^ micchattaani va.d.dhanti, tii.ni akusalaani ayoniso manasikaare uppanna.m vi~n~naa.na~nca vijja~nca karonti. iti pubbaaparante akusalaanaataritaro sa"nkhaaraa vuddhi.m vepullata.m gacchanti. te ca mahataa ca appa.tividitaa ponobhavikaa {ponobbhavikaa (ka0)} sa"nkhaaraa bhavanti. iti eva.m avijjaa sahajaatapaccayataaya sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo samanantarapaccayataaya ca.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^a^V0.0241^ea^ abhisandanaakaarena avijjaa sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo? saa avijjaa te sa"nkhaare abhisanneti parippharati. seyyathaapi naama uppala.m vaa paduma.m vaa ta.m udake va.d.dha.m assa, siitena vaarinaa abhisanna.m parisandana.m vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepullata.m aapajjati. eva.m abhisandana.t.thena avijjaa sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo.

[03] katha.m pati.t.thahana.t.thena avijjaa sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo? te sa"nkhaaraa avijjaaya.m nissaaya vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepullata.m aapajjanti. seyyathaapi naama uppala.m vaa paduma.m vaa pathavi.m nissaaya pathavi.m pati.t.thaaya vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepullata.m aapajjati. ete sa"nkhaaraa avijjaaya.m pati.t.thitaa avijjaaya.m nissaaya vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepullata.m gacchanti. eva.m pati.t.thahana.t.thena avijjaa sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo.

[03] puna raagasahagatassa kammassa vipaakena pa.tisandhimhi bhavo nibbattati, ta.m kammassa {kaamassa (pii0)} sabba.m abhinivi.t.tha.m a~n~naa.navasena ponobhavikaa sa"nkhaaraati vuccanti, evampi avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa atthi. puna ^a^P0.0108^ea^ pa~ncasu ye ca sekkhaa puggalaa, ye ca asa~n~nisamaapatti.m samaapannaa, ye ca bhavagataa, ye ca antogataayeva sa.msedajaa, ye ca vaa pana a~n~no hi koci anaagaamibhuutaa na cetenti na ca patthenti, tesa.m ki.m paccayaa sa"nkhaaraa. puna raagaa atthi tesa.m sa"nkhaaraani upaadaanaani cittamanussarantiyeva avipakkavipaakasamuuhataa asamucchinnapaccayaa tesa.m puna ca gato bhavati. evampi hi avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa. puna saa te na upaadaanaa napi sa"nkhaaraa atthi, puna tesa.m satta anusayaa asamuuhataa asamucchinnaa tadaaramma.na.m bhavati. vi~n~naa.nassa pati.t.thaaya vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m. evampi avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa. puna saa ya.m ki~nci kamma.m aacayagaami sabba.m ta.m avijjaavasena abhisa"nkhariyati ^a^M0.0242^ea^ ta.nhaavasena ca alliiyati a~n~naa.navasena ca tattha aadiinavampi na jaanaati. tadeva vi~n~naa.nabiija.m bhavati, saayeva ta.nhaasineho bhavati. saayeva avijjaa sammohoti. evampi avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa vattabbaa. iti imehi aakaarehi avijjaa sa"nkhaaraana.m paccayo.

[03] tattha avijjaaya hetu ayoniso manasikaaro paccayo hoti. tattha abhicchedo aya.m tattha tatiya.m bala.m {phala.m (pii0)} nivatti, aya.m pa.tisandhi. tattha punabbhavo yo avecchedo asamugghaatana.t.thena aya.m anusayo. yathaa ^a^P0.0109^ea^ pa.taaka.m vaa saa.taka.m vaa dve janaa pii.lesu ca ekaa vaa bala.m vaa assa nivaa.tassesu, na pana pii.lesu soseyya. tattha ya.m sinehaa aapodhaatu anupullanaa sosetabbaa. u.nhadhaatumaagamma sace puna ta.m aakaase nikkhipeyya ta.m ussaavena yebhuyyatara.m sinehamaapajjeyya, ^a^V0.0242^ea^ na hi anaagamma tejodhaatu.m parisesa.m gaccheyya. evameva bhavaggaparamaapi samaapatti na anuruupassa samugghaataaya sa.mvattati. te hi aalayanti sammasanti, na ca ta.nhaaya ta.nhaapahaana.m gacchanti. tattha so asamugghaato. avijjaaya anusayo ca cittassa sampalibodho, ida.m pariyu.t.thaana.m. yathaabhuuta.m vi~n~naa.nassa appa.tivedho aya.m avijjaaaasavo avijjaavi~n~naa.nabiija.m bhavati. ya.m biija.m so hetu na samucchijjati, asamucchijjanto pa.tisandehati. pa.tisandahanto na samugghaata.m gacchati. asamugghaata.m citta.m pariyonahati, pariyonaddhacitto yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, iti sa~n~naa.nassa saasavattho, avijjattho, hetuattho, avacchedattho, anivattiattho, phalattho pa.tisandhiattho, punabbhavattho, asamugghaatattho, anusayattho, pariyu.t.thaanattho, apa.tivedhanattho. ettaavataa avijjaaya khetta.m niddi.t.tha.m bhavati. aya.m vuccate parikkhaaro naama haaro.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo samaaropano haaro? uggha.titamhi ^a^P0.0110^ea^ tamhi santa~nceva ca na.m vitthaara.m pana vattabba.m. vitthaaravidha.m citta~n~naa aya.m samaaropano haaro. tattha naamaniddeso upagha.takaa {uggha.takaa (pii0)} vatthuniddeso vevacana.m vatthubhuuto vitthaaro. yathaa ki.m, yaa bhikkhuuna.m vattato {nivattato (pii0)} pahaatabbo, aya.m upagha.tanaa.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0243^ea^ katamo samaaropano? ki~nci na vattabba.m, ruuparaaga.m vaa naamavantapahaatabba.m {naamamantapahaatabba.m (ka0)}. yaava vi~n~naa.nanti vitthaarena kaatabbaani. avijjaa taa opammena pa~n~naapetabbaa, aya.m samaaropano. nissitacittassa ca mattiko ca nissayo ta.nhaa ca di.t.thi ca. tattha di.t.thi avijjaa ta.nhaa sa"nkhaaraa. tattha di.t.thipaccayaa ta.nhaa ime avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa. tattha nissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m ida.m sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m yaava jaraamara.na.m, ida.m sa.mkhittena bhaasite avasi.t.tha.m paropayati.

[03] anissitassa {passa udaa0 74} calita.m natthiiti tassa eva.m di.t.thiyaa ta.nhaaya ca pahaana.m tattha di.t.thiavijjaanirodhaaya bhuuta.m vi~n~naa.na.m saraaga.t.thaaniyesu dhammesu ta.m ta.m dhamma.m upecca a~n~na.m dhamma.m dhaavati makka.topamataaya, atha khvassa parittesu dhammesu saraaga.t.thaaniyesu chandaraago natthi kuto tato calanaa, adhimattesu sattesu citta.m nivessayati ta.m apati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m anaahaara.m nirujjhati vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho yaava jaraamara.nanirodho. aya.m samaaropano.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0111^ea^ raagavasena vi~n~naa.nassa calita.m sapariggaho, tasmi.m calite asati yo parikilesopacaaro ^a^V0.0243^ea^ tividho aggi pa.tippassaddho bhavati. tenaaha calite asante passaddhi hoti. tattha ya.m samaaropanaa passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. yaava vimuttitamiti ~naa.nadassana.m bhavati. so aasavaana.m khayaa ca vimutti no upapajjati. tassa upapattissa aagatigatiyaa asantiyaa nevidha na hura.m na ubhayamantarena. esevanto dukkhassaati anupaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu. idamassa suttassa majjhe samaaropita.m pa.ticcasamuppaade ca vimuttiya.m ca yogo na ca eta.m tassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajjanti. aya.m vuccate samaaropano haaro. na ca sa.mkilesabhaagiyena suttena sa.mkilesabhaagiyo ye ca dhammaa samaaropayitabbaa naa~n~ne. eva.m vaasanaabhaagiye nibbedhabhaagiye, aya.m samaaropano haaro. ime so.lasa haaraa.
[06] suviirassa mahaakaccaayanassa jambuvanavaasino pe.takopadese
[03] pa~ncamaa bhuumi.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ buddhaana.m ^a^V0.0244^ea^ ^a^P0.0112^ea^ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ bhagavantaana.m saasana.m tividhena sa"ngaha.m gacchati, khandhesu dhaatuusu aayatanesu ca. tattha pa~ncakkhandhaa ruupakkhandho yaava vi~n~naa.nakkhandho. dasa ruupaaayatanaani cakkhu ruupaa ca yaava kaayo pho.t.thabbaa ca, aya.m ruupakkhandho. tattha cha vedanaakaayaa vedanaakkhandho cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa yaava manosamphassajaa vedanaa, aya.m vedanaakkhandho. tattha cha sa~n~naakaayaa sa~n~naakkhandho, ruupasa~n~naa yaava dhammasa~n~naa ime cha sa~n~naakaayaa, aya.m sa~n~naakkhandho. tattha cha cetanaakaayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho, ruupasa~ncetanaa yaava dhammasa~ncetanaa ime cha cetanaakaayaa, aya.m sa"nkhaarakkhandho. tattha cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m yaava manovi~n~naa.na.m ime cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa, aya.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho. ime pa~ncakkhandhaa.

[03] tesa.m kaa pari~n~naa? anicca.m dukkha.m sa~n~naa anattaati esaa etesa.m pari~n~naa. tattha katamo khandhattho? samuuhattho khandhattho, pu~njattho khandhattho, raasattho khandhattho. ta.m ^a^P0.0113^ea^ yathaa dabbakkhandho vanakkhandho daarukkhandho aggikkhandho udakakkhandho vaayukkhandho iti eva.m khandhesu sabbasa"ngahova eva.m khandhattho.

[03] tattha a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo cakkhudhaatu ruupadhaatu cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu...pe0... manodhaatu dhammadhaatu manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu. etaayo a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo. taasa.m pari~n~naa anicca.m dukkha.m sa~n~naa anattaati esaa etaasa.m pari~n~naa. tattha ko dhaatuattho? vuccate avayavattho dhaatuattho. avayavoti cakkhu no pasaado cakkhudhaatu. eva.m pa~ncasu dhaatuusu puna raagavavacchedattho dhaatuattho. vavacchinnaa hi cakkhudhaatu. eva.m pa~ncasu punaraaha ekantipakatyatthena dhaatuatthoti vuccate. ta.m yathaa, pakatiyaa aya.m puriso pittiko semhiko vaatiko sannipaatikoti eva.m pakaticakkhudhaatu dasanna.m piyaa ca sabbesu indriyesu...pe0... visabhaagattho dhaatuattho.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0245^ea^ dvaadasaayatanaani katamaani? cha ajjhattikaani cha baahiraani. cakkhaayatana.m yaava manaayatananti ajjhattika.m, ruupaayatana.m yaava dhammaayatananti baahira.m. etaani dvaadasa aayatanaani. etesa.m kaa pari~n~naa? anicca.m dukkha.m sa~n~naa anattaati, esaa etesa.m pari~n~naa. api ^a^P0.0114^ea^ ^a^M0.0245^ea^ ca dvidhaa pari~n~naa ~naatapari~n~naa ca pahaanapari~n~naa ca. tattha ~naatapari~n~naa naama anicca.m dukkha.m sa~n~naa anattaati, esaa ~naatapari~n~naa. pahaanapari~n~naa pana chandaraagappahaanaa, esaa pahaanapari~n~naa. tattha katamo aayatanattho? vuccate aakaarattho aayatanattho. yathaa suva.n.naakaro dubba.n.naakaro, yathaa dviihi tehi aakaarehi te te gaavaa utti.t.thanti. eva.m etehi cittacetasikaa gaavaa utti.t.thanti kammakilesaa dukkhadhammaa ca. punaraaha aayadaanattho aayatanattho. yathaa ra~n~no aayadaanehi aayo bhavati, eva.m aayadaanattho aayatanattho.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ cattaari ariyasaccaani dukkha.m samudayo nirodho maggo ca. dukkha.m yathaa samaasena dhammaacariya.m maanasa~nca, samudayo samaasena avijjaa ca ta.nhaa ca, nirodho samaasena vijjaa ca vimutti ca, maggo samaasena samatho ca vipassanaa ca.

[03] tattha sattati.msa bodhipakkhikaa dhammaa katame? cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa yaava ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, evamete sattati.msa bodhipakkhikaa dhammaa. ye dhammaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m paccekabuddhaana.m saavakaana.m ca nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantiiti, so maggo cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati, sammappadhaana.m...pe0... iddhipaada.m...pe0... indriyaani...pe0... balaani...pe0... tattha ko indriyattho? indattho ^a^P0.0115^ea^ indriyattho, aadhipateyyattho indriyattho, pasaadattho indriyattho, asaadhaara.na.m kassa kiriyattho indriyattho anavapariyattho balattho, thaamattho balattho, upaadaayattho balattho, upatthambhanattho balattho.
