[03] tattha katame satta bojjha"ngaa? satisambojjha"ngo yaava upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. tattha katamo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? sammaadi.t.thi yaava sammaasamaadhi. tattha a.t.tha"ngiko maggoti khandho siilakkhandho ca samaadhikkhandho ca pa~n~naakkhandho ca. tattha yaa ca sammaavaacaa yo ca sammaakammanto yo ca sammaaaajiivo, aya.m siilakkhandho. yaa ca sammaasati yo ca sammaavaayaamo yo ca sammaasamaadhi, aya.m samaadhikkhandho. yo ca sammaasa"nkappo yaa ca sammaadi.t.thi, aya.m pa~n~naakkhandho. eva.m taayo tisso sikkhaa. eva.m tiihaakaarehi dasa padaani...pe0....

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0246^ea^ ^a^M0.0246^ea^ yogaavacaro siilakkhandhe .thito dosa.m akusala.m na upaadiyati, dosaanusaya.m samuuhanati, dosasalla.m uddharati, dukkhavedana.m parijaanaati, kaamadhaatu.m samatikkamati. samaadhikkhandhe .thito lobha.m akusala.m na upaadiyati, raagaanusaya.m samuuhanati, lobhasalla.m uddharati, sukhavedana.m parijaanaati, ruupadhaatu.m samatikkamati. pa~n~naakkhandhe .thito moha.m akusala.m na upaadiyati, avijjaanusaya.m samuuhanati, mohasalla.m di.t.thisalla~nca uddharati, adukkhamasukhavedana.m ^a^P0.0116^ea^ parijaanaati, aruupadhaatu.m samatikkamati. iti tiihi khandhehi tii.ni akusalamuulaani na upaadiyati, cattaari sallaani uddharati, tisso vedanaa parijaanaati, tedhaatuka.m samatikkamati.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa avijjaa? ya.m catuusu ariyasaccesu a~n~naa.nanti vitthaarena yathaa so paa.nasajjesu katha.mkathaa kaatabba.m. tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m? cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa phasso manasikaaro, ida.m naama.m. tattha katama.m ruupa.m? caatumahaabhuutika.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupassa pa~n~natti.m. iti purimaka~nca naama.m ida~nca ruupa.m tadubhaya.m naamaruupanti vuccati. tattha cha.laayatananti cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani, cakkhu ajjhattika.m aayatana.m yaava mano ajjhattika.m aayatana.m. phassoti cha phassakaayaa cakkhusamphasso yaava manosamphassoti phasso. cha vedanaakaayaa vedanaa. ta.nhaati cha ta.nhaakaayaa ta.nhaa. upaadaananti cattaari upaadaanaani kaamupaadaana.m di.t.thupaadaana.m siilabbatupaadaana.m attavaadupaadaananti upaadaana.m. bhavoti tayo bhavaa kaamabhavo ruupabhavo aruupabhavo. tattha katamaa jaati? yaa pa.thama.m khandhaana.m pa.thama.m dhaatuuna.m pa.thama.m aayatanaana.m uppatti jaati sa~njaati okkanti abhinibbatti khandhaana.m paatubhaavo, aya.m jaati. tattha ^a^P0.0117^ea^ katamaa jaraa? jaraa naama ya.m ta.m kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa pavivitta.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m viva.n.nata.m bhaggo ta.m jaraa hiiyanaa pahiiyanaa aayuno haani sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paribhedo upanaaho paripaako, aya.m jaraa. tattha katama.m mara.na.m? mara.na.m naama ya.m tasmi.m tasmi.m sattanikaaye tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m cuti cavanataa mara.na.m kaala"nkiriyaa uddhumaatakaana.m bhedo kaayassa jiivitindriyassa upacchedo, ida.m mara.na.m. iti purimikaa ca jaraa ida~nca mara.na.m tadubhaya.m jaraamara.na.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0247^ea^ andhakaaratimisaa yathaabhuuta.m appajaananalakkha.naa avijjaa sa"nkhaaraana.m pada.t.thaana.m ha. abhisa"nkhara.nalakkha.naa sa"nkhaaraa, upacayapunabbhavaabhiropanapaccupa.t.thaanaa. te vi~n~naa.nassa pada.t.thaana.m. vatthu savi~n~nattilakkha.na.m vi~n~naa.na.m, ta.m naamaruupassa pada.t.thaana.m. anekasannissayalakkha.na.m naamaruupa.m, ta.m sa.laayatanassa pada.t.thaana.m. indriyavavatthaapanalakkha.na.m sa.laayatana.m, ta.m phassassa pada.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0247^ea^. sannipaatalakkha.no phasso, so vedanaaya pada.t.thaana.m. anubhavanalakkha.naa vedanaa, saa ta.nhaaya pada.t.thaana.m. ajjhosaanalakkha.naa ta.nhaa, saa upaadaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. aadaanaparihananalakkha.na.m upaadaana.m, ta.m bhavassa pada.t.thaana.m ^a^P0.0118^ea^. naanaagativikkhepalakkha.no bhavo, so jaatiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. khandhaana.m paatubhaavalakkha.naa jaati, saa jaraaya pada.t.thaana.m. upanayaparipaakalakkha.naa jaraa, saa mara.nassa pada.t.thaana.m. aayukkhayajiivitauparodhalakkha.na.m mara.na.m, ta.m dukkhassa pada.t.thaana.m. kaayasampii.lanalakkha.na.m dukkha.m, ta.m domanassassa pada.t.thaana.m. cittasampii.lanalakkha.na.m domanassa.m, ta.m sokassa pada.t.thaana.m. socanalakkha.no soko, so paridevassa pada.t.thaana.m. vaciinicchaara.nalakkha.no paridevo, so upaayaasassa pada.t.thaana.m. ye aayaasaa te upaayaasaa.

[03] nava padaani yattha sabbo akusalapakkho sa"ngaha.m samosara.na.m gacchati. katamaani nava padaani? dve muulakilesaa, tii.ni akusalamuulaani, cattaaro vipallaasaa. tattha dve muulakilesaa avijjaa ca bhavata.nhaa ca, tii.ni akusalamuulaani lobho doso moho ca. cattaaro vipallaasaa {a0 ni0 4.49} -- ``anicce nicca''nti sa~n~naavipallaaso cittavipallaaso di.t.thivipallaaso, ``dukkhe sukha''nti sa~n~naavipallaaso cittavipallaaso di.t.thivipallaaso, ``anattani attaa''ti sa~n~naavipallaaso cittavipallaaso di.t.thivipallaaso, ``asubhe subha''nti sa~n~naavipallaaso cittavipallaaso di.t.thivipallaaso.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ tattha avijjaa naama catuusu ariyasaccesu yathaabhuuta.m a~n~naa.na.m, aya.m avijjaa. bhavata.nhaa naama yo bhavesu raago saaraago icchaa mucchaa patthanaa nandii ajjhosaana.m apariccaago, aya.m bhavata.nhaa.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0119^ea^ katamo lobho akusalamuula.m?

[03] lobho naama so tesu tesu paravatthuusu paradabbesu para.t.thaanesu parasaapateyyesu parapariggahitesu ^a^M0.0248^ea^ lobho lubbhanaa icchaa mucchaa patthanaa nandii ajjhosaana.m apariccaago, aya.m lobho akusalamuula.m. kasseta.m muula.m? lobho lobhajassa akusalassa kaayakammassa vaciikammassa manokammassa ca, tathaa yathaa ta.msampayuttaana.m cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m muula.m.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0248^ea^ katamo doso akusalamuula.m?
[03] so sattesu aaghaato akkhanti appaccayo byaapaado padoso anatthakaamataa cetaso pa.tighaato, aya.m doso akusalamuula.m.
[03] kasseta.m muula.m?
[03] dosajassa kaayakammassa vaciikammassa manokammassa sampayuttaana~nca cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m muula.m.
[03] tattha katamo moho akusalamuula.m?

[03] ya.m catuusu ariyasaccesu anabhisamayo asampajjaggaaho appa.tivedho moho muyhanaa sammoho sammuyhanaa avijjaa tamo andhakaaro aavara.na.m niivara.na.m chadana.m acchadana.m {avecchadana.m (pii0 ka0)} apasacchaagamana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, aya.m moho akusalamuula.m.
[03] kasseta.m muula.m?
[03] mohajassa akusalassa kaayakammassa vaciikammassa manokammassa ca ta.msampayuttakaana~nca cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m muula.m.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0120^ea^ vipallaasaa jaanitabbaa, vipallaasaana.m vatthu jaanitabba.m. ya.m vipallaasa.m siyaa, ta.m jaanitabba.m. tattha eko vipallaaso tii.ni vipallaasaani cattaari vipallaasavatthuuni. katamo eko vipallaaso ca, yena pa.tipakkhena vipallaasita.m ga.nhaati?
[03] ``anicce nicca''nti, ``dukkhe sukha''nti, ``anattani attaa''ti, ``asubhe subha''nti, aya.m eko vipallaaso.
[03] katamaani cattaari vipallaasavatthuuni?
[03] kaayo vedanaa citta.m dhammaa ca. imaani cattaari vipallaasavatthuuni.
[03] katamaani tii.ni vipallaasaani?
[03] sa~n~naa citta.m di.t.thi ca. imaani tii.ni vipallaasaani.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0249^ea^ manaapike vatthumhi indriyavatthe va.n.naayatane vaa yo nimittassa uggaaho, aya.m sa~n~naavipallaaso. tattha vipariitacittassa vatthumhi sati vi~n~natti, aya.m cittavipallaaso. tattha vipariitacittassa tamhi ruupe ``asubhe subha''nti yaa khanti ruci upekkhanaa nicchayo di.t.thi nidassana.m santiira.naa, aya.m di.t.thivipallaaso. tattha vatthubhedena kaayesu dvaadasa vipallaasaa bhavanti. tayo ^a^M0.0249^ea^ kaaye tayo vedanaaya tayo citte tayo dhamme, cattaaro sa~n~naavipallaasaa cattaaro cittavipallaasaa cattaaro di.t.thivipallaasaa, aayatanuupacayato cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasa~n~naasama"ngissa ruupesu dvaadasa vipallaasaa yaava mano sa~n~naasama"ngissa, dhammesu dvaadasa vipallaasaa cha dvaadasakaa cattaari vipallaasaa bhavanti. aaramma.nanaanattato ^a^P0.0121^ea^ hi aparimitasa"nkheyyaana.m sattaana.m {attaana.m (ka0)} aparimitamasa"nkheyyaa vipallaasaa bhavanti hiinukka.t.thamajjhimataaya.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ tattha pa~ncakkhandhaa cattaari attabhaavavatthuuni bhavanti. yo ruupakkhandho, so kaayo attabhaavavatthu. yo vedanaakkhandho, so vedanaa attabhaavavatthu. yo sa~n~naakkhandho ca sa"nkhaarakkhandho ca, te dhammaa attabhaavavatthu. yo vi~n~naa.nakkhandho, so citta.m attabhaavavatthu. iti pa~ncakkhandhaa cattaari attabhaavavatthuuni. tattha kaaye ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaaso bhavati. eva.m vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu ca attavipallaaso bhavati. tattha catunna.m vipallaasaana.m samugghaatanattha.m bhagavaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane deseti pa~n~napeti kaaye kaayaanupassii viharato ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaasa.m samugghaateti, eva.m vedanaasu, citte, dhammesu ca kaatabba.m.

[03] tattha andhakaaratimisaa appa.tivedhalakkha.naa avijjaa, tassaa vipallaasapada.t.thaana.m. ajjhosaanalakkha.naa ta.nhaa, tassaa piyaruupasaataruupa.m pada.t.thaana.m. attaasayava~ncanaalakkha.no lobho, tassa adinnaadaana.m pada.t.thaana.m. idha vivaadalakkha.no doso, tassa paa.naatipaato pada.t.thaana.m. vatthuvippa.tipattilakkha.no moho, tassa micchaapa.tipatti pada.t.thaana.m. sa"nkhataana.m dhammaana.m avinaasaggaha.nalakkha.naa niccasa~n~naa, tassaa sabbasa"nkhaaraa pada.t.thaana.m. saasavaphassopagamanalakkha.naa sukhasa~n~naa, tassaa mama"nkaaro pada.t.thaana.m. dhammesu upagamanalakkha.naa attasa~n~naa ^a^P0.0122^ea^, tassaa aha"nkaaro pada.t.thaana.m. va.n.nasa"ngaha.nalakkha.naa subhasa~n~naa, tassaa indriyaasa.mvaro pada.t.thaana.m. etehi navahi padehi uddi.t.thehi sabbo akusalapakkho niddi.t.tho bhavati, so ca kho bahussutena sakkaa jaanitu.m no appassutena, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nena, yuttena no ayuttena.

[03] nava ^a^V0.0250^ea^ ^a^M0.0250^ea^ padaani kusalaani yattha sabbo kusalapakkho sa"ngaho samosara.na.m gacchanti. katamaani nava padaani? samatho vipassanaa alobho adoso amoho aniccasa~n~naa dukkhasa~n~naa anattasa~n~naa asubhasa~n~naa ca.

[03] tattha katamo samatho? yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti .thaana.m pa.t.thaana.m upa.t.thaana.m samaadhi samaadhaana.m avikkhepo avippa.tisaaro vuupasamo maanaso ekagga.m cittassa, aya.m samatho.

[03] tattha katamaa vipassanaa? khandhesu vaa dhaatuusu vaa aayatanesu vaa naamaruupesu vaa pa.ticcasamuppaadesu vaa pa.ticcasamuppannesu vaa dhammesu dukkhesu vaa samudayesu vaa nirodhe vaa magge vaa kusalaakusalesu vaa dhammesu saavajjaanavajjesu vaa ka.nhasukkesu vaa sevitabbaasevitabbesu vaa so yathaabhuuta.m vicayo pavicayo viima.msaa paraviima.msaa gaahanaa aggaahanaa pariggaahanaa cittena paricitanaa tulanaa upaparikkhaa ~naa.na.m vijjaa vaa cakkhu buddhi medhaa pa~n~naa obhaaso aaloko aabhaa pabhaa khaggo naaraaco {naarajjo (pii0 ka0)} dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo ^a^P0.0123^ea^ sammaadi.t.thi magga"nga.m, aya.m vipassanaa. tenesaa vipassanaa iti vuccati vividhaa vaa esaa vipassanaati, tasmaa esaa vipassanaati vuccati. dvidhaa cesaa hi vipassanaa dhammavipassanaati vuccati, dvidhaa imaaya passati subha~nca asubha~nca ka.nha~nca sukka~nca sevitabba~nca asevitabba~nca kamma~nca vipaaka~nca bandha~nca vimokkha~nca aacaya~nca apacaya~nca pavatti~nca nivatti~nca sa.mkilesa~nca vodaana~nca, eva.m vipassanaati vuccati. atha vaa viiti upasaggo passanaati attho tasmaa vipassanaati vuccate, aya.m vipassanaa.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ tattha dve rogaa sattaana.m avijjaa ca bhavata.nhaa ca, etesa.m dvinna.m rogaana.m nighaataaya bhagavataa dve bhesajjaani vuttaani samatho ca vipassanaa ca. imaani dve bhesajjaani pa.tisevento dve aroge sacchikaroti raagaviraaga.m cetovimutti.m avijjaaviraaga~nca pa~n~naavimutti.m. tattha ta.nhaarogassa samatho bhesajja.m, raagaviraagaa cetovimutti aroga.m. avijjaarogassa vipassanaabhesajja.m avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti aroga.m. eva~nhi bhagavaa caaha, ``dve dhammaa pari~n~neyyaa {passa dii0 ni0 3.352} naama~nca ruupa~nca, dve dhammaa pahaatabbaa avijjaa ca bhavata.nhaa ca, dve dhammaa bhaavetabbaa samatho ca vipassanaa ^a^M0.0251^ea^ ca, dve dhammaa sacchikaatabbaa vijjaa ca vimutti caa''ti. tattha samatha.m bhaavento ruupa.m parijaanaati, ruupa.m parijaananto ta.nha.m pajahati, ta.nha.m pajahanto raagaviraagaa ^a^P0.0124^ea^ cetovimutti.m sacchikaroti, vipassana.m bhaavento naama.m parijaanaati, naama.m parijaananto avijja.m pajahati, avijja.m pajahanto avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^V0.0251^ea^ sacchikaroti. yadaa bhikkhuno dve dhammaa pari~n~naataa bhavanti naama~nca ruupa~nca, tathaassa dve dhammaa pahiinaa bhavanti avijjaa ca bhavata.nhaa ca. dve dhammaa bhaavitaa bhavanti samatho ca vipassanaa ca, dve dhammaa sacchikaatabbaa bhavanti vijjaa ca vimutti ca. ettaavataa bhikkhu katakicco bhavati. esaa sopaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu. tassa aayupariyaadaanaa jiivitindriyassa uparodhaa ida~nca dukkha.m nirujjhati, a~n~na~nca dukkha.m na uppajjati. tattha yo imesa.m khandhaana.m dhaatuaayatanaana.m nirodho vuupasamo a~n~nesa~nca khandhadhaatuaayatanaana.m appa.tisandhi apaatubhaavo, aya.m anupaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu.

[03] tattha katama.m alobho kusalamuula.m? ya.mdhaatuko alobho alubbhanaa alubbhitatta.m anicchaa apatthanaa akantaa anajjhosaana.m. aya.m alobho kusalamuula.m. kasseta.m muula.m? alobhajassa kusalassa kaayakammassa vaciikammassa manokammassa ta.msampayuttaana~nca cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m muula.m. atha vaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo kusalanti vuccati, so ti.n.na.m magga"ngaana.m muula.m. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m, sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaayaamassa sammaasamaadhissa ca imesa.m muulanti, tasmaa kusalamuulanti vuccati.

[03] tattha katama.m adoso kusalamuula.m? yaa ^a^P0.0125^ea^ sattesu vaa sa"nkhaaresu vaa anaghaato appa.tighaato abyaapatti abyaapaado adoso mettaa mettaayanaa atthakaamataa hitakaamataa cetaso pasaado, aya.m adoso kusalamuula.m. kasseta.m muula.m? adosajassa kusalassa kaayakammassa vaciikammassa manokammassa ta.msampayuttaana~nca cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m muula.m. atha vaa ti.n.na.m magga"ngaana.m muula.m. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? sammaavaacaaya sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivassa ca imesa.m ti.n.na.m magga"ngaana.m muula.m, tasmaa kusalamuulanti vuccati.

[03] tattha katama.m amoho kusalamuula.m? ya.m catuusu ariyasaccesu yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nadassana.m abhisamayo sammaa ca paccaagamo pa.tivedho amoho asammuyhanaa asammoho vijjaapakaaso aaloko anaavara.na.m ^a^M0.0252^ea^ sekkhaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, aya.m amoho kusalamuula.m. kasseta.m muula.m? amohajassa kusalassa kaayakammassa vaciikammassa manokammassa ta.msampayuttaana~nca cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m muula.m. atha vaa dvinna.m magga"ngaana.m eta.m muula.m. katamesa.m dvinna.m? sammaadi.t.thiyaa ca sammaasatiyaa ca imesa.m dvinna.m magga"ngaana.m muula.m, tasmaa kusalamuulanti vuccati. eva.m ^a^P0.0126^ea^ imesa.m tiihi kusalamuulehi a.t.tha"ngiko maggo yojetabbo.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0252^ea^ katamaa aniccasa~n~naa? ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa uppaadavayadhammino''ti ca yaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa vavatthapanaa uggaaho, aya.m aniccasa~n~naa. tassaa ko nissando? aniccasa~n~naaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya a.t.thasu lokadhammesu citta.m naanusandhati na sandhati na sa.n.thahati, upekkhaa vaa pa.tikkuulataa vaa sa.n.thahati, ayamassaa nissando.

[03] tattha katamaa dukkhasa~n~naa? ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa''ti yaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa vavatthapanaa uggaaho, aya.m dukkhasa~n~naa. tassaa ko nissando? dukkhasa~n~naaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya aalasse sa.mpamaade vimhaye ca citta.m naanusandhati na sandhati na sa.n.thahati, upekkhaa vaa pa.tikkuulataa vaa sa.n.thahati, ayamassaa nissando.

[03] tattha katamaa anattasa~n~naa? ``sabbesu dhammesu anattaa''ti yaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa vavatthapanaa uggaaho, aya.m anattasa~n~naa. tassaa ko nissando, anattasa~n~naaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya aha"nkaaro citta.m naanusandhati na sandhati, mama"nkaaro na sa.n.thahati, upekkhaa vaa pa.tikkuulataa vaa sa.n.thahati, ayamassaa nissando.

[03] tattha katamaa asubhasa~n~naa? ``satta sa"nkhaaraa ^a^P0.0127^ea^ asubhaa''ti yaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa vavatthapanaa uggaaho, aya.m asubhasa~n~naa. tassaa ko nissando? asubhasa~n~naaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya subhanimitte citta.m naanusandhati na sandhati na sa.n.thahati, upekkhaa vaa pa.tikkuulataa vaa sa.n.thahati, ayamassaa nissando.

[03] tattha pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m pari~n~naa bhagavataa desitaa, yo tattha asubhasa~n~naa ruupakkhandhassa pari~n~natta.m, dukkhasa~n~naa vedanaakkhandhassa pari~n~natta.m, anattasa~n~naa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa pari~n~natta.m, aniccasa~n~naa vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa pari~n~natta.m. tattha samathena ta.nha.m samugghaateti, vipassanaa avijja.m ^a^M0.0253^ea^ samugghaateti, adosena dosa.m samugghaateti, amohena moha.m samugghaateti, aniccasa~n~naaya niccasa~n~na.m samugghaateti, dukkhasa~n~naaya sukhasa~n~na.m samugghaateti, anattasa~n~naaya attasa~n~na.m samugghaateti, asubhasa~n~naaya subhasa~n~na.m samugghaateti.

[03] cittavikkhepapa.tisa.mhara.nalakkha.no samatho, tassa jhaanaani pada.t.thaana.m. sabbadhamma.m yathaabhuuta.m pa.tivedhalakkha.naa vipassanaa, tassaa sabbaneyya.m pada.t.thaana.m. icchaapa.tisa.mhara.nalakkha.no alobho, tassa adinnaadaanaa verama.nii pada.t.thaana.m. abyaapaadalakkha.no adoso, tassa paa.naatipaataa verama.nii ^a^V0.0253^ea^ pada.t.thaana.m. vatthuappa.tihatalakkha.no amoho, tassa sammaapa.tipatti pada.t.thaana.m. sa"nkhataana.m dhammaana.m vinaasaggaha.nalakkha.naa aniccasa~n~naa, tassaa udayabbayo pada.t.thaana.m. saasavaphassasa~njaananalakkha.naa dukkhasa~n~naa, tassaa vedanaa pada.t.thaana.m. sabbadhammaanupagamanalakkha.naa anattasa~n~naa, tassaa dhammasa~n~naa ^a^P0.0128^ea^ pada.t.thaana.m. viniilakavipubbakauddhumaatakasamuggaha.nalakkha.naa asubhasa~n~naa, tassaa nibbidaa pada.t.thaana.m. imesu navasu padesu upadi.t.thesu sabbo kusalapakkho upadi.t.tho bhavati, so ca bahussutena sakkaa jaanitu.m no appassutena, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nena, yuttena no ayuttenaati.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ tattha niccasa~n~naadhimuttassa aparaapara.m citta.m pa.naamento satimapaccavekkhato aniccasa~n~naa na upa.t.thaati, pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu sukhassaadaadhimuttassa iriyaapathassa agatimapaccavekkhato dukkhasa~n~naa na upa.t.thaati, khandhadhaatuaayatanesu attaadhimuttassa naanaadhaatuanekadhaatuvinibbhogamapaccavekkhato anattasa~n~naa na upa.t.thaati, va.n.nasa.n.thaanaabhiratassa kaaye subhaadhimuttassa ca vippa.ticchannaa asubhasa~n~naa na upa.t.thaati.

[03] avippa.tisaaralakkha.naa saddhaa, saddahanaa paccupa.t.thaana.m. tassa cattaari sotaapattiya"ngaani pada.t.thaana.m. eva~nhi vutta.m bhagavataa {passa sa.myuttanikaaye} saddhindriya.m bhikkhave, kuhi.m da.t.thabba.m, catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] suuraaapa.tikkhepanalakkha.na.m viiriyindriya.m, viiriyindriyaarambho paccupa.t.thaana.m. tassa atiitaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa pada.t.thaana.m. yathaa vutta.m bhagavataa {passa sa.myuttanikaaye} viiriyindriya.m, bhikkhave, kuhi.m da.t.thabba.m, catuusu sammappadhaanesu.

[03] sati ^a^M0.0254^ea^ sara.nalakkha.naa, asammohapaccupa.t.thaanaa. tassa atiitaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa pada.t.thaana.m. yathaa vutta.m bhagavataa ^a^P0.0129^ea^ satindriya.m bhikkhave, kuhi.m da.t.thabba.m, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu.
[03] ekaggalakkha.no samaadhi, avikkhepapaccupa.t.thaano, tassa cattaari ~naa.naani pada.t.thaana.m. yathaa vutta.m bhagavataa samaadhindriya.m, bhikkhave, kuhi.m da.t.thabba.m, catuusu jhaanesu.

[03] pajaananalakkha.naa pa~n~naa, bhuutatthasantiira.naa paccupa.t.thaanaa, tassa cattaari ariyasaccaani pada.t.thaana.m. yathaa vutta.m bhagavataa {passa sa.myuttanikaaye} pa~n~nindriya.m, bhikkhave, kuhi.m da.t.thabba.m, catuusu ariyasaccesu.

[03] cattaari ^a^V0.0254^ea^ cakkaani {passa a0 ni0 4.31} patiruupadesavaaso cakka.m, sappurisuupanissayo cakka.m, attasammaapa.nidhaana.m cakka.m, pubbe katapu~n~nataa cakka.m. tattha ariyasannissayalakkha.no patiruupadesavaaso, so sappurisuupanissayassa pada.t.thaana.m. ariyasannissayalakkha.no sappurissuupanissayo, so attasammaapa.nidhaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. sammaapa.tipattilakkha.na.m attasammaapa.nidhaana.m, ta.m pu~n~naana.m pada.t.thaana.m. kusaladhammopacayalakkha.na.m pu~n~na.m, ta.m sabbasampattiina.m pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] ekaadasasiilamuulakaa dhammaa siilavato avippa.tisaaro bhavati...pe0... so vimutti~naa.nadassana.m ``naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti pajaananaa. tattha verama.nilakkha.na.m siila.m, ta.m avippa.tisaarassa pada.t.thaana.m. na attaanuvaadalakkha.no avippa.tisaaro, so paamojjassa pada.t.thaana.m. abhippamodanalakkha.na.m paamojja.m, ta.m piitiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. attamanalakkha.naa piiti ^a^P0.0130^ea^, saa passaddhiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. kammaniyalakkha.naa passaddhi, saa sukhassa pada.t.thaana.m. abyaapaadalakkha.na.m sukha.m, ta.m samaadhino pada.t.thaana.m. avikkhepanalakkha.no samaadhi, so yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanassa pada.t.thaana.m. avipariitasantiira.nalakkha.naa pa~n~naa, saa nibbidaaya pada.t.thaana.m anaalayanalakkha.naa nibbidaa, saa viraagassa pada.t.thaana.m. asa.mkilesalakkha.no viraago, so vimuttiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. akusaladhammavivekalakkha.naa vimutti, saa vimuttino vodaanassa pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ catasso ariyabhuumiyo cattaari saama~n~naphalaani. tattha yo yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, esaa dassanabhuumi. sotaapattiphala~nca so yathaabhuuta.m ^a^M0.0255^ea^ pajaanitvaa nibbindati, ida.m tanukaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m byaapaadaana.m. sakadaagaamiphala~nca sa.nha.m virajjati, aya.m raagaviraagaa cetovimutti. anaagaamiphala~nca ya.m avijjaaviraagaa vimuccati, aya.m kataabhuumi. arahatta~nca saama~n~naphalaaniiti ko vacanattho, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo saama~n~na.m, tassetaani phalaani saama~n~naphalaaniiti vuccati. kissa brahma~n~naphalaaniiti vuccante? brahma~n~naariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, tassa taani phalaaniiti brahma~n~naphalaaniiti vuccante.

[03] tattha sotaapanno katha.m hoti? saha saccaabhisamayaa ariyasaavakassa tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiiyanti sakkaayadi.t.thi vicikicchaa siilabbataparaamaaso ca, imesa.m ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaa parikkhayaa ariyasaavako hoti sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo yaava dukkhassanta.m karoti.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0255^ea^ ^a^P0.0131^ea^ katamaa sakkaayadi.t.thi? assutavaa baalo puthujjano yaava ariyadhamme akovido, so ruupa.m attato samanupassati yaava vi~n~naa.nasmi.m attaana.m, so imesu pa~ncasu khandhesu attaggaaho vaa attaniyaggaaho vaa esohamasmi ekasmi.m vasavattiko {avattito (pii0 ka0)} pakkhitto anuggaho anusayanto a"ngama"nganti parati. yaa tathaabhuutassa khanti ruci pekkhanaa aakaaraparivitakko di.t.thinijjhaayanaa abhippasannaa, aya.m vuccate sakkaayadi.t.thiiti.

[03] tattha pa~nca di.t.thiyo uccheda.m bhajanti. katamaayo pa~nca? ruupa.m attato samanupassati, yaava vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, imaayo pa~nca uccheda.m bhajanti, avasesaayo pannarasa sassata.m bhajanti. iti sakkaayadi.t.thipahaanaa dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thigataani pahiiyanti. pahaanaa uccheda.m sassata~nca na bhajati. iti ucchedasassatappahaanaa ariyasaavakassa na ki~nci di.t.thigata.m bhavati, a~n~naa vaa lokuttaraaya sammaadi.t.thiyaa. katha.m pana sakkaayadi.t.thi na bhavati? idha ariyasaavako sutavaa hoti, sabbo sukkapakkho kaatabbo, yaava ariyadhammesu kovido ruupa.m anattato samanupassati, yaava vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evamassa samanupassantassa sakkaayadi.t.thi na bhavati.

[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0256^ea^ vicikicchaa na bhavati? idha ariyasaavako buddhe na ka"nkhati, na vicikicchati abhippasiidati, itipi so bhagavaati sabba.m. dhamme na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati sabba.m. yaava ta.nhakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaananti, iminaa dutiyena aaka"nkhiyena dhammena ^a^P0.0132^ea^ samannaagato hoti. sa"nghe na ka"nkhati...pe0... yaava puujaa devaana~nca manussaana~ncaati, iminaa tatiyena aaka"nkhiyena dhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaati na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati abhippasiidati. ta.nhaa dukkhasamudayoti na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati. ta.nhaanirodhaa dukkhanirodhoti na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati. ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati abhippasiidati. yaava buddhe vaa dhamme vaa sa"nghe vaa dukkhe vaa samudaye vaa nirodhe vaa magge vaa ka"nkhaayanaa vimati vicikicchaa dvedhaapathaa aasappanaa {appanaa (pii0 ka0) dha0 sa0 1008 nikkhepaka.n.de passitabba.m} parisappanaa anava.t.thaana.m adhi.t.thaagamana.m {ani.t.thaagamana.m (ka0)} aneka.mso aneka.msikataa, te tassa pahiinaa bhavanti pa.nunnaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ tattha siilabbataparaamaaso dvidhaa -- siilassa vaa suddhassa vaa. tattha siilassa siilabbataparaamaaso ^a^V0.0256^ea^ iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa tattha kapotapaadaahi accharaahi saddhi.m kii.lissaami ramissaami paricarissaamiiti. yathaabhuutadassananti rucivimutti raago raagaparivattakaa di.t.thiruupanaa passanaa asantussitassa siilabbataparaamaaso. tattha katamo suddhassa siilabbataparaamaaso? idhekacco siila.m paraamasati, siilena sujjhati, siilena niiyati, siilena muccati, sukha.m viitikkamati, dukkha.m viitikkamati, sukhadukkha.m ^a^P0.0133^ea^ viitikkamati anupaapu.naati uparimena. tadubhaya.m siilavata.m paraamasati tadubhayena siilavatena sujjhanti muccanti niiyanti, sukha.m viitikkamanti, dukkha.m viitikkamanti, sukhadukkha.m viitikkamanti, anupaapu.nantiiti avisucikara.m dhamma.m avimuttikara.m dhamma.m visucito vimuttito paccaagacchantassa yaa tathaabhuutassa khanti ruci mutti pekkhanaa aakaaraparivitakko di.t.thinijjhaayanaa passanaa, aya.m suddhassa siilabbataparaamaaso. ete ubho paraamaasaa ariyasaavakassa pahiinaa ^a^M0.0257^ea^ bhavanti yaava aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, so siilavaa bhavati ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato akkha.n.dehi yaava upasamasa.mvattanikehi. imesa.m ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaa sutavaa ariyasaavako bhavati sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo, sabba.m.
[03] sahasaccaabhisamayaa, iti ko vacanattho? cattaaro abhisamayaa, pari~n~naabhisamayo pahaanaabhisamayo sacchikiriyaabhisamayo bhaavanaabhisamayo.

[03] tattha ariyasaavako dukkha.m pari~n~naabhisamayena abhisameti, samudaya.m pahaanaabhisamayena abhisameti, nirodha.m sacchikiriyaabhisamayena abhisameti, magga.m bhaavanaabhisamayena abhisameti. ki.m kaara.na.m? dukkhassa pari~n~naabhisamayo, samudayassa pahaanaabhisamayo, nirodhassa sacchikiriyaabhisamayo, maggassa bhaavanaabhisamayo. samathavipassanaaya katha.m abhisameti? aaramma.ne citta.m upanibandhetvaa pa~ncakkhandhe dukkhato passati. tattha yo upanibandho, aya.m samatho. yaa pariyogaahanaa, aya.m vipassanaa. pa~ncakkhandhe ^a^P0.0134^ea^ dukkhaati passato yo pa~ncakkhandhesu aalayo nikanti upagamana.m ajjhosaanaa icchaa mucchaa pa.nidhi patthanaa pahiiyati. tattha pa~ncakkhandhaa dukkha.m. yo tattha aalayo nikanti upagamana.m ajjhosaana.m icchaa mucchaa pa.nidhi patthanaa, aya.m samudayo. ya.m tassa pahaana.m, so nirodho samatho vipassanaa ca maggo, eva.m tesa.m catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m ekakaale ekakkha.ne ekacitte apubba.m acarima.m abhisamayo bhavati. tenaaha bhagavaa ``sahasaccaabhisamayaa ariyasaavakassa tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiiyantii''ti.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0257^ea^ samathavipassanaa yuganaddhaa vattamaanaa ekakaale ekakkha.ne ekacitte cattaari kiccaani karoti, dukkha.m pari~n~naabhisamayena abhisameti, yaava magga.m bhaavanaabhisamayena abhisameti. ki.m kaara.naa? dukkha.m pari~n~naabhisamayo, yaava magga.m bhaavanaabhisamayo. eva.m di.t.thanto yathaa naavaa jala.m gacchantii cattaari kiccaani karoti, paarima.m tiira.m paapeti, orima.m tiira.m jahati, bhaara.m vahati, sota.m chindati; evameva samathavipassanaa yuganaddhaa vattamaanaa ekakaale ekakkha.ne ekacitte cattaari kiccaani karoti ^a^M0.0258^ea^, dukkha.m pari~n~naabhisamayena abhisameti, yaava magga.m bhaavanaabhisamayena abhisameti. yathaa vaa suuriyo udayanto ekakaale apubba.m acarima.m cattaari kiccaani karoti, andhakaara.m vidhamati, aaloka.m paatukaroti, ruupa.m nidassiiyati, siita.m pariyaadiyati; evameva samathavipassanaa yuganaddhaa vattamaanaa ekakaale...pe0... yathaa padiipo jalanto ekakaale apubba.m acarima.m cattaari kiccaani karoti, andhakaara.m vidhamati, aaloka.m paatukaroti, ruupa.m ^a^P0.0135^ea^ nidassiiyati, upaadaana.m pariyaadiyati; evameva samathavipassanaa yuganaddhaa vattamaanaa ekakaale...pe0....

[03] yadaa ariyasaavako sotaapanno bhavati avinipaatadhammo niyato yaava dukkhassanta.m karoti, aya.m dassanabhuumi. sotaapattiphala~nca sotaapattiphale .thito uttari samathavipassana.m bhaavento yuganaddhaa vattamaanaa kaamaraagabyaapaadaana.m yebhuyyena pahaanaa ariyasaavako hoti. sakadaagaami parini.t.thitattaa sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti, aya.m tanubhuumi.

[03] sakadaagaamiphala~nca yo sakadaagaamiphale .thito vipassana.m bhaavento kaamaraagabyaapaade saanusaye anavasesa.m pajahati, kaamaraagabyaapaadesu anavasesa.m pahiinesu pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani bhavanti sakkaayadi.t.thi siilabbataparaamaaso vicikicchaa kaamacchando byaapaado ca, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaa {pahaanaaya (pii0 ka0)} ariyasaavako hoti anaagaamii tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa, aya.m viitaraagabhuumi.

[03] anaagaamiphala~nca anaagaamiphale .thito uttari samathavipassana.m bhaavento pa~nca uddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pajahati ruuparaagaaruuparaagamaanauddhaccaavijja~nca. imesa.m pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaa ariyasaavako arahaa bhavati, khii.naasavo vusitavaa sammada~n~naa {sampaja~n~no (pii0 ka0)} vimutto parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano anuppattasadattho, aya.m kataabhuumi.

[03] arahantova ^a^V0.0258^ea^ aya.m sopaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu. tassa aayukkhayaa jiivitindriyaaparodhaa ida~nca dukkha.m nirujjhati, a~n~na~nca ^a^P0.0136^ea^ dukkha.m na uppajjati. yo imassa dukkhassa nirodho vuupasamo, a~n~nassa ca apaatubhaavo, aya.m ^a^M0.0259^ea^ anupaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu. imaa dve nibbaanadhaatuyo. iti saccaani vuttaani. saccaabhisamayo vutto, kilesavavatthaana.m vutta.m, pahaana.m vutta.m, bhuumiyo vuttaa, phalaani vuttaani, nibbaanadhaatuyo vuttaa. evamimesu vuttesu sabbabodhi vuttaa bhavati. ettha yogo kara.niiyo.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaayo nava anupubbasamaapattiyo? cattaari jhaanaani catasso ca aruupasamaapattiyo nirodhasamaapatti ca. tattha cattaari jhaanaani katamaani? idha, bhikkhave, {passa diighanikaaye} bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehiiti vitthaarena kaatabbaani. tattha katamaa cattaaro aruupasamaapattiyo? viraagino vata vattabbo, yaava nirodhasamaapatti vitthaarena kaatabbaa. imaayo nava anupubbasamaapattiyo.

[03] tattha katama.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m? pa~nca"ngavippayutta.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m. katamehi pa~ncahi a"ngehi vippayutta.m? pa~ncahi niivara.nehi. tattha katamaani pa~nca niivara.naani? kaamacchandoti vitthaaretabbo. tattha katamo kaamacchando? yo pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu chandaraago pema.m nikanti ajjhosaana.m icchaa mucchaa patthanaa apariccaago anusayo pariyu.t.thaana.m, aya.m kaamacchandaniivara.na.m. tattha ^a^P0.0137^ea^ katama.m byaapaadaniivara.na.m? yo sattesu sa"nkhaaresu ca aaghaato...pe0... yathaa dose tathaa nio.t.thaanaa, aya.m byaapaado niivara.na.m. tattha katama.m middha.m? yaa cittassa ja.lataa cittassa garutta.m cittassa akammaniiyataa cittassa nikkhepo niddaayanaa pacalikataa pacalaayanaa pacalaayana.m, ida.m middha.m. tattha katama.m thina.m {thiina.m (pii0)}? yaa kaayassa thinataa ja.lataa kaayassa garuttaa kaayassa appassaddhi, ida.m thina.m. iti ida~nca thina.m purimaka~nca middha.m tadubhaya.m thinamiddhaniivara.nanti vuccati. tattha katama.m uddhacca.m? yo avuupasamo cittassa, ida.m uddhacca.m. tattha katama.m kukkucca.m? yo cetaso vilekho ala~ncanaa vila~ncanaa hadayalekho vippa.tisaaro, ida.m kukkucca.m. iti ida~nca kukkucca.m purimaka~nca uddhacca.m tadubhaya.m uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.nanti vuccati. tattha katama.m vicikicchaaniivara.na.m? yo buddhe vaa dhamme vaa sa"nghe vaa...pe0... aya.m vicikicchaa. api ^a^P0.0138^ea^ ca kho pana pa~nca vicikicchaayo samanantaraayikaa desantaraayikaa samaapattantaraayikaa maggantaraayikaa saggantaraayikaa, imaayo pa~nca ^a^V0.0259^ea^ vicikicchaayo ^a^M0.0260^ea^. idha pana samaapattantaraayikaa vicikicchaa adhippetaa. ime pa~nca niivara.naa.

[03] tattha niivara.naaniiti ko vacanattho, kuto nivaarayantiiti? sabbato kusalapakkhikaa nivaarayanti. katha.m {ki.m ka.m (pii0 ka0)} nivaarayanti? kaamacchando asubhato nivaarayati, byaapaado mettaaya {mettato (pii0)} nivaarayati, thina.m passaddhito nivaarayati, middha.m viiriyaarambhato nivaarayati, uddhacca.m samathato nivaarayati, kukkucca.m avippa.tisaarato nivaarayati, vicikicchaa pa~n~naato pa.ticcasamuppaadato nivaarayati.

[03] aparo pariyaayo. kaamacchando alobhato kusalamuulato nivaarayati, byaapaado adosato nivaarayati, thinamiddha.m samaadhito nivaarayati, uddhaccakukkucca.m satipa.t.thaanehi nivaarayati, vicikicchaa amohato kusalamuulato nivaarayati.

[03] aparo pariyaayo. tayo vihaaraa dibbavihaaro brahmavihaaro ariyavihaaro. dibbavihaaro cattaari jhaanaani, brahmavihaaro cattaari appamaa.naani, ariyavihaaro sattati.msa bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa. tattha kaamacchando uddhacca.m kukkucca~nca dibbavihaara.m nivaarayati, byaapaado brahmavihaara.m nivaarayati, thinamiddha.m vicikicchaa ca ariyavihaara.m nivaarayati.

[03] aparo pariyaayo. kaamacchando byaapaado uddhaccakukkucca~nca samatha.m nivaarayanti, thinamiddha.m vicikicchaa ca vipassana.m nivaarayanti, ato niivara.nanti vuccante. imehi ^a^P0.0139^ea^ pa~ncahi a"ngehi vippayutta.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m.

[03] katamehi pa~ncahi a"ngehi sampayutta.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m? vitakkavicaarehi piitiyaa sukhena ca cittekaggataaya ca. imesa.m pa~ncanna.m a"ngaana.m uppaadapa.tilaabhasamannaagamo sacchikiriya.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m pa.tiladdhanti vuccati. imaani pa~nca a"ngaani uppaadetvaa viharatiiti, tena vuccate pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatiiti dibbena vihaarena.

[03] tattha dutiya.m jhaana.m catura"ngasamannaagata.m piitisukhena cittekaggataaya ajjhatta.m sampasaadanena imaani cattaari a"ngaani uppaadetvaa sampaadetvaa viharati, tena vuccati dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatiiti.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0260^ea^ ^a^M0.0261^ea^ pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m tatiya.m jhaana.m satiyaa sampaja~n~ne sukhena cittekaggataaya upekkhaaya imaani pa~nca"ngaani uppaadetvaa sampaadetvaa viharati, tena vuccati tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatiiti.

[03] tattha catuttha.m jhaana.m catura"ngasamannaagata.m upekkhaaya satipaarisuddhiyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya cittekaggataa ca, imehi catuuha"ngehi samannaagata.m catuttha.m jhaana.m. iti imesa.m catunna.m a"ngaana.m uppaado pa.tilaabho samannaagamo sacchikiriyaa catuttha.m jhaana.m pa.tiladdhanti vuccati. imaani cattaari jhaanaani uppaadetvaa sampaadetvaa upasampajja viharati, tena vuccati dibbena vihaarena viharatiiti.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0140^ea^ katamo anicca.t.tho? pii.lana.t.tho anicca.t.tho pabha"nga.t.tho sampaapana.t.tho viveka.t.tho anicca.t.tho, aya.m anicca.t.tho.
[03] tattha katamo dukkha.t.tho? pii.lana.t.tho dukkha.t.tho sampii.lana.t.tho sa.mvega.t.tho byaadhina.t.tho, aya.m dukkha.t.tho.
[03] tattha katamo su~n~na.t.tho? anupalitto su~n~na.t.tho, asambhaajana.t.tho gatapa.t.tho {appa.t.tho (pii0)} viva.t.ta.t.tho, aya.m su~n~na.t.tho.
[03] tattha katamo anatta.t.tho? anissariya.t.tho anatta.t.tho, avasavattana.t.tho, akaamakaari.t.tho parivida.t.tho, aya.m anatta.t.thoti.
[06] suttatthasamuccayo naama sa.mvattisantikaa pe.takabhuumi samattaa.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ jhaana.m ^a^V0.0261^ea^ ^a^P0.0141^ea^ viraago. cattaari jhaanaani vitthaarena kaatabbaani. taani duvidhaani; bojjha"ngavippayuttaani ca bojjha"ngasampayuttaani ca. tattha bojjha"ngavippayuttaani baahirakaani, bojjha"ngasampayuttaani ariyapuggalaani. tattha yena cha puggalamuulaani tesa.m nikkhipetvaa raagacarito, dosacarito, mohacarito, raagadosacarito, raagamohacarito, dosamohacarito, samabhaagacarito, iti imesa.m puggalaana.m jhaana.m samaapajjitaana.m pa~nca niivara.naani pa.tipakkho tesa.m pa.tighaataaya yathaa asamattho tii.ni akusalamuulaani ^a^M0.0262^ea^ nigga.nhaati. lobhena akusalamuulena abhijjhaa ca uddhacca~nca uppilavata.m alobhena kusalamuulena nigga.nhaati, kukkucca~nca vicikicchaa ca mohapakkho, ta.m amohena nigga.nhaati. doso ca thinamiddha~nca dosapakkho, ta.m adosena nigga.nhaati.

[03] tattha alobhassa paaripuuriyaa nekkhammavitakka.m vitakketi. tattha adosassa paaripuuriyaa abyaapaadavitakka.m vitakketi. tattha amohassa paaripuuriyaa avihi.msaavitakka.m vitakketi. tattha alobhassa paaripuuriyaa vivitto hoti kaamehi. tattha adosassa paaripuuriyaa amohassa paaripuuriyaa ca vivitto hoti paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi, savitakka.m ^a^P0.0142^ea^ savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] vitakkaati tayo vitakkaa -- nekkhammavitakko abyaapaadavitakko avihi.msaavitakko. tattha pa.thamaabhinipaato vitakko, pa.tiladdhassa vicara.na.m vicaaro. yathaa puriso duurato purisa.m passati aagacchanta.m, na ca taava jaanaati eso itthiiti vaa purisoti vaa yadaa tu pa.tilabhati itthiiti vaa purisoti vaa eva.m va.n.noti vaa eva.m sa.n.thaanoti vaa ime vitakkayanto uttari upaparikkhanti ki.m nu kho aya.m siilavaa udaahu dussiilo a.d.dho vaa duggatoti vaa. eva.m vicaaro vitakke appeti, vicaaro cariyati ca anuvattati ca. yathaa pakkhii pubba.m aayuuhati pacchaa naayuuhati yathaa aayuuhanaa eva.m vitakko, yathaa pakkhaana.m pasaara.na.m ^a^V0.0262^ea^ eva.m vicaaro anupaalati vitakketi vicarati vicaareti. vitakkayati vitakketi, anuvicarati vicaareti. kaamasa~n~naaya pa.tipakkho vitakko, byaapaadasa~n~naaya vihi.msasa~n~naaya ca pa.tipakkho vicaaro. vitakkaana.m kamma.m akusalassa amanasikaaro, vicaaraana.m kamma.m je.t.thaana.m sa.mvaara.naa. yathaa paliko tu.nhiko sajjhaaya.m karoti eva.m vitakko, yathaa ta.myeva anupassati eva.m vicaaro. yathaa apari~n~naa eva.m vitakko. yathaa pari~n~naa eva.m vicaaro. niruttipa.tisambhidaaya~nca pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaaya~nca vitakko, dhammapa.tisambhidaaya~nca atthapa.tisambhidaaya~nca vicaaro. kallitaa kosallatta.m cittassa vitakko, abhiniihaarakosalla.m cittassa vicaaro ^a^P0.0143^ea^. ida.m kusala.m ida.m akusala.m ida.m bhaavetabba.m ida.m pahaatabba.m ida.m sacchikaatabbanti vitakko, yathaa pahaana~nca bhaavanaa ca sacchikiriyaa ca eva.m vicaaro. imesu vitakkavicaaresu .thitassa duvidha.m dukkha.m na uppajjati kaayika~nca cetasika~nca; duvidha.m sukha.m uppajjati kaayika~nca ^a^M0.0263^ea^ cetasika~nca. iti vitakkajanita.m cetasika.m sukha.m piiti kaayika.m sukha.m kaayikoyeva. yaa tattha cittassa ekaggataa, aya.m samaadhi. iti pa.thama.m jhaana.m pa~nca"ngavippahiina.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m.

[03] tesa.myeva vitakkavicaaraana.m abhikkha.na.m aasevanaaya tassa tappo.namaanasa.m hoti. tassa vitakkavicaaraa o.laarikaa khaayanti. ya~nca piitisukha~nca nekkhamma~nca o.laarika.m bhavati. api ca samaadhijaa piiti rati ca jaayati. tassa vicaaraaramma.na.m. tesa.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m ceto sampasiidati. ye vitakkavicaaraa dve dhammaanussaritabbaa. paccuppannaa dara.nitabba.m. tesa.m vuupasamaa ekodibhaava.m cittekaggata.m hoti. tassa ekodibhaavena piiti paaripuuri.m gacchati. yaa piiti, ta.m somanassindriya.m, ya.m sukha.m, ta.m sukhindriya.m. yaa cittekaggataa, aya.m samaadhi. ta.m dutiya.m jhaana.m catura"ngasamannaagata.m. so piitiyaa viraagaa yaati ojahi jallasahagata.m.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ tattha somanassacittamupaadaananti ca so ta.m vicinanto upekkhameva manasikaroti. so piitiyaa viraagaa upekkhako viharati. yathaa ca piitiyaa sukhamaanita.m, ta.m kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti sampajaano viharati. yena satisampaja~n~nena upekkhaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. ida.m tatiya.m jhaana.m catura"ngasamannaagata.m.

[03] tathaa ^a^P0.0144^ea^ kaayikassa sukhassa pahaanaaya pa.thame jhaane somanassindriya.m nirujjhati. dutiye jhaane dukkhindriya.m nirujjhati. so sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati ^a^V0.0263^ea^. tattha catuuhi indriyehi upekkhaa pasaadaa hoti, dukkhindriyena domanassindriyena sukhindriyena somanassindriyena ca. tesa.m nirodhaa upekkhaasampaja~n~na.m hoti, tattha sukhindriyena somanassindriyena ca asati hoti, tesa.m nirodhaa satimaa hoti, dukkhindriyena domanassindriyena ca asampaja~n~na.m, tesa.m nirodhaa sampaja~n~na.m hoti, iti upekkhaaya ca sa~n~naa, sato sampajaano cittekaggataa ca ida.m vuccate ca catuttha.m jhaana.m.
[03] tattha yo raagacarito puggalo tassa sukhindriya~nca somanassindriya~nca; yo dosacarito puggalo tassa dukkhindriya~nca domanassindriya~nca; yo mohacarito puggalo tassa asati ca asampaja~n~na~nca.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0264^ea^ raagacaritassa puggalassa tatiye jhaane catutthe ca anunayo nirujjhati, dosacaritassa pa.thame jhaane dutiye ca pa.tigha.m nirujjhati, mohacaritassa puggalassa pa.thame jhaane dutiye ca asampaja~n~na.m nirujjhati. tatiye jhaane catutthe ca asati nirujjhati, evameva tesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m cattaari jhaanaani vodaana.m gamissanti.

[03] tattha raagadosacaritassa puggalassa asampaja~n~na~nca anunayo ca pa.tigha~nca, tena haanabhaagiya.m {pahaanabhaagiya.m (pii0 ka0)} jhaana.m hoti. tattha ^a^P0.0145^ea^ raagamohacaritassa puggalassa anunayatta.m ca aadiinava.m dassitaa, ta.m tassa haanabhaagiya.m jhaana.m hoti. tattha dosamohacaritassa puggalassa pa.tigho ca asati ca asampaja~n~na~nca aadiinava.m dassitaa tena tassa haanabhaagiya.m jhaana.m hoti.

[03] tattha raagadosamohasamabhaagacaritassa puggalassa visesabhaagiya.m jhaana.m hoti, imaani cattaari jhaanaani sattasu puggalesu niddisitabbaani. catuusu ca samaadhiisu chandasamaadhinaa pa.thama.m jhaana.m, viiriyasamaadhinaa dutiya.m jhaana.m, cittasamaadhinaa tatiya.m jhaana.m, viima.msaasamaadhinaa catuttha.m jhaana.m. appa.nihitena pa.thama.m jhaana.m, su~n~nataaya dutiya.m jhaana.m, animittena tatiya.m jhaana.m, aanaapaanassatiyaa catuttha.m jhaana.m. kaamavitakkabyaapaadaana~nca ta.m ta.m vuupasamena pa.thama.m jhaana.m hoti, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamena dutiya.m jhaana.m, sukhindriyasomanassindriyaana.m vuupasamena tatiya.m jhaana.m, kaayasa"nkhaaraana.m vuupasamena catuttha.m jhaana~nca. caagaadhi.t.thaanena pa.thama.m jhaana.m, saccaadhi.t.thaanena dutiya.m jhaana.m, pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanena tatiya.m jhaana.m, upasamaadhi.t.thaanena catuttha.m jhaana.m. imaani cattaari jhaanaani sa"nkhepaniddesena niddi.t.thaani, tattha samaadhindriya.m paaripuuri.m gacchati. anuvattanakaani cattaari, tattha yo pa.thama.m jhaana.m nissaaya aasavakkhaya.m paapu.naati, so sukhaaya ^a^V0.0264^ea^ pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya domanassindriyapa.tipakkhena. yo dutiya.m jhaana.m nissaaya aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati, so sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya dukkhindriyapa.tipakkhena. yo tatiya.m jhaana.m nissaaya aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati, so sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya somanassindriyapa.tipakkhena. yo catuttha.m jhaana.m ^a^P0.0146^ea^ nissaaya aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati, so sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya sukhindriyapa.tipakkhena gato.
[06] paki.n.nakaniddeso.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ yaani ^a^M0.0265^ea^ cattaari jhaanaani, tesa.m jhaanaana.m imaani a"ngaani, tesa.m a"ngaana.m samuuho {sammoho (pii0 ka0)} assa a"ngaa, aya.m jhaanabhuumi ko visesoti assa viseso. ime sambhaaraa tehi aya.m samudaagamo, tassa samudaagamassa aya.m upanisaa, taaya upanisaaya aya.m bhaavanaa. tassaa bhaavanaaya aya.m aadiinavo. tena aya.m parihaani. kassa parihaaniiti tadupagajjhaayino {tadupakajjhaayino (pii0 ka0)}. ta.m yathaa bha.nita.m paccavekkhanto aya.m viseso. tena visesena aya.m assaado, so kassa assaado ajhaaniyaa jhaayino, tassaa ajhaaniyaa jhaayino, ida.m kallitaa kosalle .thitajjhaana.m anomaddiyata.m gacchati jhaanabala.m, jhaanabale .thitassa aya.m paaramippattassa imaani jhaana"ngaani anaavilasa"nkappo pa.thame jhaane jhaana"ngaani bhaavii. so piiti tadanusaarittaava pa.thame jhaane jhaana"nga.m tassa"nguno ca dhammaa tadabhisannitaaya ca. piiti dutiye jhaane jhaana"ngadhammataa kho pana tathaa pavattassa sahagata.m jhaana"ngadhamma.m sasukhataaya ajjhatta.m sampasaado dutiye jhaane jhaana"nga.m manosampasaadanataaya ^a^P0.0147^ea^ tadabhisannitaaya ca. piiti dutiye jhaane jhaana"nga.m ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m samaadhitaa {samaadhikaa (pii0)} piiti dutiye jhaane jhaana"nga.m, cetaso ekodibhaavo dutiye jhaane jhaana"nga.m, upekkhaa phassataa tatiye jhaane jhaana"nga.m, sukha.m tassa a"nganti ca. cetaso ekodibhaavo catutthe jhaane jhaana"nga.m, upekkhaa adukkhamasukhaa catutthe jhaane jhaana"nga.m, abhinisaabhuumi upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi catutthe jhaane jhaana"nga.m. satipaarisuddhi ca anekajjhaabhuumiisu jhaana"ngasamaayuttaa piiti cetaso ekodibhaavo catutthe jhaane jhaana"nga.m.

[03] tattha katamaa jhaanabhuumi? savitakke savicaare vivekaa anugataa pa.thame jhaane jhaanabhuumi. avitakke avicaare ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m janita.m piitimanugataa dutiye jhaane jhaanabhuumi. sukhasaatasamohitaa sappiitikaa tatiye jhaane jhaanabhuumi. tassa sukhadukkhasahagataa abhiniihaarasahagataa catutthe jhaane jhaanabhuumi. appamaa.nasahagataa sattaaramma.naa pa.thame jhaane jhaanabhuumi. abhibhuumiaayatanasahagataa ruupasa~n~niisu dutiye jhaane jhaanabhuumi. vimokkhasahagataana.m ^a^V0.0265^ea^ vimokkhesu tatiye jhaane jhaanabhuumi. anupassanaasahagataa kaayasa"nkhaaraa sammaa catutthassa jhaanassa bhuumi.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0266^ea^ katame jhaanavisesaa? vivicceva kaamehi vivicca paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi cittacetasikasahagataa kaamadhaatusamatikkamanataapi, aya.m jhaanaviseso. avitakkaa ceva avicaaraa ca sappiitikaaya satisahagataaya piitisahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. aya.m ^a^P0.0148^ea^ jhaanaviseso. avitakkaaya bhuumiyaa avicaareyeva sati anugataa upekkhaasahagataa manasikaaraa samudaacaranti. tadanudhammataaya ca sati sa.n.dahati {sandahati (pii0)}. ta~nca bhuumi.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m jhaanaviseso. satipaarisuddhisahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti, ta~nca bhuumi.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m jhaanaviseso. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasahagataaya bhuumiya.m aaki~nca~n~naayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti, ta~nca bhuumi.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m jhaanaviseso.

[03] jhaanasambhaaraa nekkhammavitakko sambhaaro kaamavitakkavinodanaadhippaayataa. abyaapaadavitakko sambhaaro byaapaadavitakkapa.tivinodanaadhippaayataa. avihi.msaavitakko sambhaaro vihi.msaavitakkapa.tivinodanaadhippaayataa. indriyesu guttadvaarataa appicchataa sambhaaro parisuddhaajiivo catunna.m samaapattiina.m sambhaaro akammassa vihaaritaa. maggasambhaaro samaapattipajjanataa. phalasambhaaro jhaananibbattitaaya jhaanasamudaagamo. kusalahetu ya.m jhaana.m samudaya.m gacchanti ko ca {koci (ka0)} na kutoci nekkhammappattaa samudaagacchanti. aalambanirodhasamaadhi santo samudaagacchanti. aviitikkantaa samudaagacchanti. sukhindriya.m somanassindriya.m pahaanaaya te ca abyaapajjataaya samudaagacchanti. ta.m pana sandhaaya samudaagacchanti. aparidaahanaaya samudaagacchanti. aya.m ~naa.nasamudaagamo.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa upanisaa? kalyaa.namittataa ^a^P0.0149^ea^ jhaanassa upanisaa. kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa jhaanassa upanisaa. indriyesu guttadvaarataa jhaanassa upanisaa. asantu.t.thitaa kusalesu dhammesu jhaanassa upanisaa. saddhammassavana.m jhaanassa upanisaa. sa.mvejaniye .thaane sa.mviggassa yoniso padhaana.m. aya.m jhaanopanisaa.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0267^ea^ katamaa bhaavanaa? mettaasevanaa abyaapaadavitakkabhaavanaa. karu.naasevanaa avihi.msaavitakkabhaavanaa. muditaabhaavanaa piitisukhasampaja~n~naa kaaritaa. upekkhaabhaavanaa passavataa ^a^V0.0266^ea^ upekkhaabhaavanaa apassavataa upekkhaa ca ajjhupekkhaa ca, asubhasa~n~naabhaavanaa dukkhaapa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa bhavasandhaabhi~n~naa bhavasandhaana.m, saa chabbidhaa bhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anu.t.thitaa vatthukataa yaaniikataa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. aya.m bhaavanaa.

[03] eva.m bhaavayantassa aya.m aadiinavo. pa.thame jhaane sa"nkhaarasamannaagato eso dhammo assuto saasavo. sace esa dhammo aya.m siilo aasannapa.tipakkho ca esa dhammo kaamo paticaaro pativicaaro samaapattiina.m ca sabbo.laariko esa dhammo vitakkavicaaro ca. tattha citta.m khobhenti, kaayo cettha kilamati, kaayamhi cettha kilante citta.m viha~n~nati. anabhiniihaarakkhamova abhi~n~naana.m ime aadiinavaa pa.thame jhaane.

[03] dutiye ^a^P0.0150^ea^ jhaane ime aadiinavaa piitiphara.nasahagato ca eso dhammo, na samudaacaarasseti citta.m. asodhaya.m upagamo cesa dhammo upagamiparissayo {upagamiparicayo (pii0)} domanassapaccatthiko cesa dhammo. tattha tattha yuttiina.m piiti parajjato cesa dhammo dukkara.m hoti, avattasantaasabhuumiparivajjayanto catuusu dukkhataasu esa dhammo anuviddhaapanasaddhaaya {anuviddhaa passatiyaa (pii0)} dukkhataaya ca na palibodhadukkhataaya ca abhi~n~naadukkhataaya ca rogadukkhataaya ca, ime aadiinavaa dutiye jhaane.

[03] tattha katame aadiinavaa tatiye jhaane? upekkhaasukhasahagataaya tattha saataaviina.m pa~ncanna.m upekkhaasukha.m parivattito esa dhammo tena niccasa~n~nitaana~nca ya.m hoti. dukkhopaniya.m sukha.m cittassa sa"nkhobhata.m upaadaaya sukhadukkhaaya gato savati. sukhadukkhaanukata~nca upaadaaya anabhihaarakkhama.m citta.m hoti. abhi~n~naaya sacchikiriyaasu sabbepi cete dhammaa tiisu jhaanasamaapattiisu catuuhi ca dukkhataahi anuviddhaana.m saa bhayaa dukkhataaya palibodhadukkhataaya ca abhi~n~naaya dukkhataaya ca ime aadiinavaa tatiye jhaane.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0268^ea^ katame ^a^P0.0151^ea^ aadiinavaa catutthe jhaane? aaki~nca~n~naasamaapattikaa te dhammaanusamaapattikaa etissaa ca bhuumiya.m saataana.m baalaputhujjanaana.m anekavidhaani di.t.thigataani uppajjanti. o.laarikaa sukhumehi ca ruupasa~n~naahi anuvidhaani etaani jhaanaani sadaa anudayamettaajhaanakalaanudanukalaaya saadhaara.naa, dukkaraa ca sabbe cattaaro mahaasambhaaraa samudaagataani ca etaani jhaanaani a~n~nama~n~na.m nissaaya samudaagacchanti. ettha samudaagataa ca ete dhammaa na samattaa honti. asamuggahitanimittaa ca ete dhammaa parihaayanti. nirujjhanti ca ete dhammaa na upaadiyanti nirujjha"ngaani ca, etesa.m dhammaana.m jhaanaani nimittaani na jhaananimittasa~n~naa ^a^V0.0267^ea^ vokirati. appa.tiladdhapubbaa ca jhaayiivasena ca bhavati {jhaayii ca vasena ca bhavati (pii0 ka0)}. imehi aadiinavehi aya.m jhaanaparihaani.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ nirodhasamaapattiyaa apa.tisa"nkhaaya avasesasa~n~nino aaki~nca~n~naayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti, so nirodhasamaapattito parihaayati. aane~njasa~n~nino asa~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasahagataa manasikaaraa samudaacaranti, ta~nca bhuumi.m na pajaanaati, so tato parihaayati. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naa manasikaaraa samudaacaranti, ta~nca bhuumi.m na pajaanaati, so tato parihaayati. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa ruupasa~n~naasahagataa. vitthaarena...pe0... yaava pa.thame jhaane kaamasa~n~naasahagataa kaatabbaa. sakassa ^a^P0.0152^ea^ {saa tassa (pii0 ka0)} parihaayati, kala"nkajjhaane kala"nka.m jhaayati, parisamantato jhaayati, bhindanto jhaayati, na sajjhaayati, aayuuhanto jhaayati, ki~nci ca niparicito jhaayati. atividhaavanto jhaayati, atima~n~nanto jhaayati, kaayasa"nkhaare appa.tisambhaare jhaayati, pariyu.t.thaanassa nissara.na.m ajaananto jhaayati, niivara.naabhibhuuto jhaayati, assaapattimanasikaronto jhaanassa assaado kaamaraagapariyu.t.thaana.m pahaana.m jhaanassa assaado kaamaraagahetuuna.m dhammaana.m udayanti, nirujjha"ngaani etesa.m dhammaana.m jhaanaani uparimaa sukhupekkhaa kaamakammakilesaana.m pahaana.m assaado, eva.m kho puna jhaanassa assaado mahaasa.mvaasamappii.lite lokasa.mnivaase asambodhokaasaa vigamessamida.m jhaanappahaanaa. aya.m palirodhamappalirodhalokasannivaase esanidhamida.m jhaana.m anamataggasa.msaarasamaapannaana.m sattaana.m sa.msaarappahaananaa aanisa.mso, yamida.m jhaanassa ^a^M0.0269^ea^ assaado kaayassa ajhaaniyajhaayino bhavati. ajhaaniyajhaaniyajhaayiihi aparaamasanto ajhaaniyajhaayita.m jhaayati, yaani kala"nkajjhaayino padaani, taani anudhitaani pa.tipakkhe.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m jhaanakosalla.m? samaapattikosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, jhaanavisesakosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, jhaanantarikakosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, samaapattivu.t.thaanakosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, jhaane sabhaavakosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, jhaane aadiinavakosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, jhaane nissara.nakosalla.m jhaanakosalla.m, jhaanaphalena ^a^P0.0153^ea^ upaadaaya kosalla.m, jhaanaphalena pa.tisa"nkhaanaphale aparihaanadhammataa nibbattijhaane ca kii.litaapi visesabhaagiya.m jhaana.m pa.tilabbhati. ida.m panassaati bhavahaaritaa ca aaramma.naanimittaggaaho anabhiniihaarabala.m, cittekaggataa nimittaasu gatisahitaa samathabalena asa.msiidana~nca jhaane maggaphala.m samatha.m pavatte samaadhino upekkhaapalipubbaaparanimittaasayo paggaahino {maggaahino (pii0)} satibala.m ta.m pavattitaana~nca vipassanaana.m sama~n~naabale.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0268^ea^ katamaa jhaanapaaramitaa? supaaramitaa mettaa kaamesu sattaa kaamasa"ngasattaati {udaa0 63 udaane passitabba.m} yamhi sutte desanaaya vohaarena dve saccaani niddi.t.thaani, dukkha~nca samudayo ca, vicayena haarena ye sa.myojaniiyesu dhammesu vajja.m na passanti, te ogha.m tarissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. na tarissantiiti atthi esaa yutti ca vicayo ca ida.m nu kissa pada.t.thaana.m, kaamesu sattaati pa~nca kaamagu.naa, ta.m kaamata.nhaaya pada.t.thaana.m. sa.myojane vajjamapassamaanaati avijjaaya pada.t.thaana.m, na hi jaatu sa.myojanasa"ngasattaa ogha.m tareyyu.m vipula.m mahantanti upaadaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. kaamesu sattaati kaamaa dvidhaa -- vatthukaamaa ca kilesakaamaa ca, tattha ^a^P0.0154^ea^ kilesakaamaa kaamata.nhaa kaamata.nhaaya yuttaa bhavanti ruupata.nhaa bhavata.nhaa lakkha.nena haarena, sa.myojane vajjamapassamaanaati sa.myojanassa. yo tattha chandaraago tassa ki.m pada.t.thaana.m? sukhaa vedanaa dve ca indriyaani -- sukhindriya~nca somanassindriya~nca. iti sukhaaya vedanaaya gahitaaya tayopi vedanaa gahitaa honti. vedanaakkhandhe gahite sabbe pa~ncakkhandhaa gahitaa honti. ruupasaddagandharasapho.t.thabbaa gahitaa, vatthukaamesu ^a^M0.0270^ea^ gahitesu sabbaani cha baahiraani aayatanaani gahitaani honti. ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu yo sato, aya.m vuccate lakkha.no haaro, tattha yo o.laarikamhi kilese ajjhaavasito sabbakilesesu yo na tato sukhumataresu na viitaraago bhavati. tattha baahirasa.myojana.m mamanti ajjhattasa.myojana.m ahanti. tattha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye ogha.m taritukaamaa te sa.myojaniiyesu dhammesu aadiinavaanupassino viharissantiiti ayamettha bhagavato adhippaayo. kaamesu sattaati yesu ca sattaa yena ca sattaa yesa~nca sattaa aya.m catubbidho aakaaro sabbesa.m haarabhaagiyo.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani tii.ni vipallaasaani pada.t.thaanaani ca? cittavipallaasassa di.t.thivipallaasassa sa~n~naavipallaasassa tayo vipallaasaa tii.ni akusalamuulaani pada.t.thaana.m. tii.ni akusalamuulaani ^a^P0.0155^ea^ hiinappa.niitakaariyakammassa pada.t.thaana.m. catunna~nca upaadaanaana.m doso akusalamuula.m dissati. hiinappa.niitakaariyakammassa pada.t.thaana.m. yathaa maatuyaa vaa pituno vaa a~n~natarassa vaa puna u.laarassa bhikkhuno abhaya.m deti. tattha a~n~no micchaa pa.tipajjeyya kaayena vaa vaacaaya vaa. tattha so byaapaadamupaadaaya tesa.m u.laaraana.m rakkhaavara.naguttiyaa anupaalayanto yo u.laaraana.m abhaya.m deti. tesa.m abhaye dinne yo tattha micchaa pa.tipajjeyya. tattha so byaapaada.m upaadaayanto dosaja.m kamma.m karoti. yo tattha asaadhu indriyaa niivara.na.m ya.m tesa.m abhaya.m dakkhi.nato sa~n~na.m ida.m pa.niita.m kaara.na.m mayaa puna tattha micchaapa.tipatti aya.m byaapaado hiinagamivakamma.m lobho moho ca imaani niivara.naani vacanaani taani cattaari upaadaanaani ^a^V0.0269^ea^ tehi catuuhi upaadaanehi yo so upaadaano itthii vaa puriso vaa tesa.m pa~ncakkhandhaana.m teyeva upaadaano samudayo ida.m dukkha~nca samudayo ca soyeva desanaahaaro.

[03] tattha kaamesu ye na pajjanti, te aadiinavaanupassanaaya pajjanti. itissaa kaamadhaatuyaa nikkhamitukaamataa, aya.m vuccati nekkhammacchando. yo tattha anabhisa"nkhaaraana.m ki~nci visodheti tassa dhaavaraa vaa, aya.m abyaapaadacchando. ki~nci vihi.msati, aya.m vihi.msaachando. iti nekkhammaabhiniihataa tayo chandaa -- nekkhammacchando abyaapaadacchando avihi.msaachando. tattha ^a^M0.0271^ea^ ^a^P0.0156^ea^ nekkhammacchando alobho; abyaapaadacchando adoso; avihi.msaachando amoho. imaani tii.ni kusalamuulaani a.t.thasu sampattesu parahitaani, tesa.myeva catunna.m upaadaanaana.m nirodhaaya sa.mvattanti. sace vaa puna kamma.m kareyya ka.nha.m vaa sukka.m vaa tassa vipaakahaanaaya sa.mvattanti. ida.m kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattati. tattha yo ti.n.na.m akusalamuulaana.m nirodho, aya.m nirodho. soyeva maggo tattha pa.tipadaani imaani dve saccaani imaani cattaari saccaani aava.t.to haaro.

[03] kaamesu sattaati ye sekkhaa, te ekenevaakaarena sattaa. ye puthujjanaa, te dviihaakaarehi sattaa, tassaaya.m pa~nho vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo vattabbo. ki~ncaapi sotaapanno pa.tisevanaaya, no ca kho abhinivese satto yo hi apacayaaya padahati, na upacayaaya. sekkho hi kilesavasena kaame pa.tisevati. puthujjano pana kilesasamu.t.thaanaaya kaame pa.tisevati. tattha kaamesu sattaana.m catuogha.m tarissatiiti vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo, aya.m vibhatti.
[03] 80^b^.^eb^ parivattanoti kaame ye neva sajjanti na ca sa.myojanehi sa.myuttaa, te ogha.m tarissanti vipula.m mahantanti. aya.m suttassa pa.tipakkho.

[03] vevacananti yo kaamesu satto yo ca tattha kaamaana.m gu.no, tattha viso satto. yepi kaamaana.m aahaaraa dhammaa, tattha viso satto. tatthima.m kaamaana.m vevacana.m paako rajo salla.m ga.n.do iiti upaddavoti. yaani vaa pana a~n~naani ^a^P0.0157^ea^ vevacanaani tattha viso sattoti vevacana.m. satto bandho mucchito gadhito ajjhosito kaame ajjhaapannaa parimutto tabbahulavihaariiti. yaani vaa pana a~n~naani vevacanaani, aya.m vevacano naama. kaamappacaarapa~n~nattiyaa kilesagocarapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~nattaa cittanti vevacana.m. satto tabbahulavihaariiti yaani vaa pana a~n~naani. ime kaamappacaarapa~n~nattiyaa kilesagocara pa~n~nattiyaa ^a^V0.0270^ea^ pa~n~nattaa, biijapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~nattaa, sa"nkhaaraa sa.myojanapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~nattaa, upaadaana.m hetupa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m, puggalo puthupa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natto.

[03] otara.noti imaaya pa.ticcasamuppaado dukkha~nca samudayo ca. ye kilesaa ye sa"nkhaaraa sa.myojanaani ca pa~ncasu khandhesu sa"nkhaarakkhandho dhammaayatanesu ^a^M0.0272^ea^ akusalaa dhammaayatanaani indriyesu sukhindriya~nca, somanassindriya~nca, aya.m indriyotara.no.
[03] sodhanoti ettako. eseva aarambho niddisitabbo suttattho.

[03] adhi.t.thaanoti ime dhammaa atthi ekattataaya pa~n~nattaa atthi vemattataaya. ye sa~n~naa baahiro kaame, te vemattataaya pa~n~nattaa. pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu sattaati pariyu.t.thaanavipallaasaa vemattataaya pa~n~nattaa ogha.m tareyyu.m. vipula.m mahantanti avijjaa ekattataaya pa~n~nattaa.

[03] parikkhaaroti tassa ko hetu ko paccayo? aaramma.napaccayataaya paccayo. ayoniso ca manasikaaro sannissayassa paccayataaya paccayo. avijjaa samanantarapaccayataaya paccayo. raagaanusayo hetupaccayataaya paccayo. aya.m hetu, aya.m paccayo.

[03] samaaropano ^a^P0.0158^ea^ paccayoti ye kaamesu sattaa sugataa suruupaati aya.m kaamadhaatuyaa chando raago te apu~n~namayaa sa"nkhaaraa. te ki.m paccayaa? avijjaa paccayaa. te kissa paccayaa? vi~n~naa.nassa paccayaa. iti avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa. sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m yaava jaraamara.na.m evametassa kevalassa mahato dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti eka.m sutta.m gata.m. pa~ncaniivara.nika.m sutta.m kaatabba.m.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo desanaahaaro naama? yaa ca abhijjhaa yo ca byaapaado ya~nca uddhacca.m, aya.m ta.nhaa. ya~nca thinamiddha.m, ya~nca kukkucca.m yaa ca vicikicchaa, aya.m di.t.thi. yaa pana kaayassa akammaniyataa ki~ncaapi ta.m middha.m no tu sabhaavakilesataaya kileso, iti yaa ca cittasalliiyanaa yaa ca kaayaakammaniyataa, aya.m pakkhopakileso na tu sabhaavakileso. tattha attasa~n~naanupacitta.m kilamatho kukkuccaanupacitta.m thina.m yaa cittassa liiyanaa, iti ime pa~nca niivara.naa cattaari niivara.naani sabhaavakilesaa thinamiddha.m niivara.napakkhopakileso. yathaa cattaaro aasavaa sabhaavaaasavataaya aasavaa no tu cittasaasavataaya ^a^V0.0271^ea^ aasavaa. sabhaavataaya aasavaa. pakkhe aasavataaya aasavaa. atha panaaha suttanta.m yena te sampayuttaa vaa vippayuttaa vaa aasavaa, teyeva ete vattabbaa saasavaa vaa anaasavaa vaa.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0159^ea^ ^a^M0.0273^ea^ katamo vicayo. abhijjhaa kaamata.nhaa ruupata.nhaa bhavata.nhaa. ya.m vaa pana ki~nci ajjhosaanagata.m saasavaa abhijjhitassa mettaanupassiya yo anattha.m carati. tattha yo byaapaada.m uppaadeti, acari carissatiiti. eva.m nava aaghaatavatthuuni kattabbaani, tasseva.m byaapaadaanupassissa kileso yo paridaaho kaayakilamatho akammaniyataa middha.m. cittaanupassissa pa.tighaatena khiyanaa, ida.m thinamiddha.m. tattha adhikara.naavuupasamo, ida.m uddhacca.m. ya.m ki.m kasathamiiti {karathamiiti (pii0 ka0)} ida.m kukkucca.m. ya.m yathaa ida.m santiira.na.m, aya.m vicikicchaa. tattha avijjaa ca ta.nhaa ca atthi, ida.m pariyu.t.thaana.m. aavara.na.m niivara.na.m chadana.m upakkileso ca atthi, ida.m kaamacchando kaamaraagapariyu.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. byaapaado byaapaadapariyu.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. thinamiddha.m thinamiddhapariyu.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. uddhaccakukkucca.m avijjaapariyu.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. vicikicchaa vicikicchaapariyu.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. kaamaraagapariyu.t.thaana.m anusayasa.myojanassa pada.t.thaana.m. byaapaadapariyu.t.thaana.m pa.tighasa.myojanassa pada.t.thaana.m. thinamiddhapariyu.t.thaana.m maanasa.myojanassa pada.t.thaana.m. avijjaapariyu.t.thaana~nca vicikicchaapariyu.t.thaana~nca di.t.thisa.myojanassa pada.t.thaana.m.
[03] tattha katamo lakkha.no haaro? kaamaraagapariyu.t.thaane vutte sabbaani pariyu.t.thaanaani vuttaani hontiiti. sa.myojanesu vuttesu sabbasa.myojanaani vuttaani honti. aya.m lakkha.no haaro.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo catubyuuho haaro? ye ime pa~nca niivara.naa jhaanapa.tipakkho so dukkhasamudayo. ya.m phala.m, ida.m dukkha.m. tattha kaamacchandassa ^a^P0.0160^ea^ nekkhammavitakko pa.tipakkho; byaapaadassa abyaapaadavitakko pa.tipakkho; ti.n.na.m niivara.naana.m avihi.msaavitakko pa.tipakkho. iti ime tayo vitakkaa. nekkhammavitakko samaadhikkhandha.m bhajati. abyaapaadavitakko siilakkhandha.m bhajati. avihi.msaavitakko pa~n~naakkhandha.m bhajati. ime tayo khandhaa. ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo niivara.nappahaanaaya sa.mvattati. ya.m niivara.nappahaana.m, aya.m nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. aya.m catubyuuho haaro.

[03] tattha katamo aava.t.to haaro? pa~nca niivara.naani dasa bhavanti. yadapi ajjhatta.m saarajjati ^a^V0.0272^ea^, tadapi niivara.na.m. yadapi bahiddhaa saarajjati, tadapi niivara.na.m, eva.m ^a^M0.0274^ea^ yaava vicikicchaa ime dasa niivara.naa. ajjhattabahiddhaa kilesaa imaani dve sa.myojanaani ajjhattasa.myojana~nca bahiddhaasa.myojana~nca. tattha ahanti ajjhatta.m, mamanti bahiddhaa. sakkaayadi.t.thi ajjhatta.m, ekasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani bahiddhaa. yo ajjhatta.m chandaraago ruupesu aviitaraago bhavati aviitacchando. eva.m yaava vi~n~naa.ne, aya.m ajjhattaa ta.nhaa. ya.m chasu baahiresu aayatanesu tiisu ca bhavesu ajjhosaana.m, aya.m bahiddhaa ta.nhaa. imaani dve saccaani sa.myojanaani sa.myojaniiyaa ca dhammaa. tattha sa.myojanesu dhammesu yaa nibbidaanupassanaa ca, aya.m maggo. ya.m sa.myojanappahaana.m, aya.m nirodho. aya.m aava.t.to haaro.

[03] tattha katamo vibhattihaaro? sa.myojananti na eta.m eka.msena. maanasa.myojana.m di.t.thibhaagiyanti na ta.m eka.msena adi.t.thamaana.m nissaayamaana.m ^a^P0.0161^ea^ na pajahati. yo pa~nca uddhambhaagiyo maano ki~ncaapi so di.t.thipakkhe siyaa. na tu orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m tassa pahaanaaya sa.mvattatiiti. yo ca aha.mkaaro na paviddhoya.m panassa eva.m hoti. kadaasu naamaaha.m ta.m santa.m aayatana.m sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaami, ya.m ariyaa santa.m aayatana.m upasampajja viharissantiiti, aya.m abhijjhaa na ca ta.m niivara.na.m. atthi pana arahato kaayakilesamiddha~nca okkamati na ca ta.m niivara.na.m tassa thinamiddha.m niivara.nanti. na eka.msena. aya.m vibhattihaaro.

[03] parivattanoti pa~nca niivara.naa pa~nca"ngikena jhaanena pahaana.m gacchanti. aya.m tesa.m pa.tipakkho niivara.no asukassa pahiinaati na a~n~naanuminitabba.m, paramatthamajjhatta.m, aya.m parivattanaa.
[03] tattha katamo vevacano? kaamacchando chandaraago pema.m nikantiiti vevacana.m. niivara.na.m chadana.m upakkileso pariyu.t.thaananti vevacana.m.

[03] pa~n~nattiiti avijjaapaccayaa kiccapa~n~nattiyaa {paccaapa~n~nattiyaa (ka0)} pa~n~natti, byaapaado vikkhepapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natti, thinamiddha.m asamugghaatapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natti. eva.m sabbepi ete pa~nca niivara.naa imamhi sutte vikkhepapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natti.

[03] tattha katamo otara.no? ime pa~nca niivara.naa avijjaa ca ta.nhaa ca tattha avijjaamuulaa ^a^V0.0273^ea^ niivara.naa. yaa ta.nhaa ime sa"nkhaaraa, te avijjaapaccayaa ^a^P0.0162^ea^ ime ^a^M0.0275^ea^ dve dhammaa pa~ncasu khandhesu sa"nkhaarakkhandhapariyaapannaa, aayatanesu dhammaayatana.m, dhaatuusu dhammadhaatu, indriyesu imesa.m dhammaana.m pada.t.thaana.m sukhindriyassa ca somanassindriyassa ca itthindriyassa ca purisindriyassa ca.
[03] tattha katamo sodhano haaro? ida.m sutta.m yathaa aarabbha nikkhitta.m so attho bhaasito imehi pa~ncahi padehi.
[03] tattha kaamacchando ca byaapaado ca vicikicchaa ca na ekattataaya pa~n~nattaa, kaamaati na ekattataaya pa~n~nattaa, atha khalu vemattataaya pa~n~nattaa. aya.m adhi.t.thaano haaro.

[03] tattha katamo parikkhaaro? kaamacchandassa ayoniso manasikaaro subhaaramma.napaccayo; subhanimitta~nca hetu. byaapaadassa ayoniso manasikaaro aaghaatavatthuuni ca paccayo; pa.tighaanusayo hetu. thinamiddhassa pa.tisa.mhaaro paccayo; pavattiyaa kilamathaa calanaa ta~nca hetu. uddhaccakukkuccassa rajaniiya.m aaramma.niya.m assaadiyaakindriya.m taava aparipu.n.na~nca ~naa.na.m paccayo; kaamasa~n~naa ca di.t.thianusayo ca hetu. vicikicchaaya nava maanavidhaa aaramma.na.m maanaanusayo, sova paccayo; vicikicchaanusayo hetu. ete pa~nca dhammaa sahetu sappaccayaa uppajjanti.

[03] tattha katamo samaaropano haaro? ime pa~nca niivara.naa cattaaropi ete aasavaa ga.n.daapi {ta.nhaapi (pii0)} ete sallaapi ete upaadaanaani ete. tesu eva baahiresu dhammesu sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m suttanti pa~n~natti.m gacchati. aya.m samaaropano haaro.
[06] niddi.t.tha.m ^a^P0.0163^ea^ sa.mkilesikabhaagiya.m sutta.m.
[03] 83^b^.^eb^ manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati gaathaa.

[03] tattha katamo desanaa haaro? imamhi sutte ko attho khandhavavatthaanena vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m deseti, dhaatuvavatthaanena manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.m, aayatanavavatthaanena manaayatana.m, indriyavavatthaanena manindriya.m. tassa ki.m pubba"ngamaa dhammaa? sa.mkhittena cha dhammaa pubba"ngamaa dhammaa kusalamuulaani ca ^a^V0.0274^ea^ akusalamuulaani ca animitta.m imamhi sutte kusalamuula.m desita.m. tattha katamaa manopubba"ngamaa dhammaa? mano tesa.m pubba"ngama.m, yathaapi balassa raajaa pubba"ngamo, evameva ^a^M0.0276^ea^ dhammaana.m manopubba"ngamaa. tattha tividhaana.m pubba"ngamaana.m nekkhammacchandena abyaapaadacchandena avihi.msaachandena. alobhassa nekkhammacchandena pubba"ngamaa. adosassa abyaapaadacchandena pubba"ngamaa. amohassa avihi.msaachandena pubba"ngamaa. tattha ^b^manose.t.thaa^eb^ti manasaa ime dhammaa ussa.taa manena vaa nimmitaa. manova imesa.m dhammaana.m se.t.thoti manova imesa.m dhammaana.m se.t.thaje.t.thoti manova imesa.m dhammaana.m aadhipacca.m karotiiti manose.t.thaa. ^b^manojavaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0164^ea^ yattha mano gacchati. tattha ime dhammaa gacchantiiti manojavaa. yathaa vaato siigha.m gacchati a~n~no vaa koci siigha.m gaamako vuccate vaatajavoti pakkhigaamikoti, evameva ime dhammaa manena sampajaayamaanaa gacchanti, tattha ime dhammaa gacchantiiti manojavaati. te tividhaa chandasamudaanitaa anaavilataa ca sa"nkappo. sattavidhaa ca kaayika.m sucarita.m vaacasika.m sucarita.m, te dasa kusalakammapathaa. tattha ^b^manasaa ce pasannenaa^eb^ti manokamma.m. ^b^bhaasati vaa^eb^ti vaciikamma.m. ^b^karoti vaa^eb^ti kaayakamma.m. imehi imasmi.m sutte dasa kusalakammapathaa paramaapi santaa siilavataa paramaa. so bhavati vivattiya.m na lokaniyyaanaaya vaasanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m bhavati. aya.m desanaa.
[03] tattha katamo vicayo haaro? manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati kusalamuulaani ca a.t.tha"ngasammattaani. ida.m sutta.m.
[03] yuttiiti dasanna.m kusalakammapathaana.m yo vipaako, so sukhavedaniiyo abyaapaadassa"ngamaano. ^b^chaayaava anapaayinii^eb^ti anugacchati atthi esaa yutti.

[03] pada.t.thaananti a.t.thaarasanna.m manopavicaaraana.m pada.t.thaana.m. manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati sabbakusalapakkhassa ime dhammaa pada.t.thaana.m. ^b^manasaa ce pasannenaa^eb^ti yo cetaso pasaado, ida.m saddhindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. ^b^bhaasati vaa^eb^ti sammaavaacaaya. ^b^karoti vaa^eb^ti sammaakammantassa ca sammaavaayaamassa ca pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] lakkha.noti ^a^P0.0165^ea^ iti pubba"ngamaa dhammaati vedanaapubba"ngamaapi ete, sa~n~naapubba"ngamaapi ete, sa"nkhaarapubba"ngamaapi ete. ye keci dhammaa sahajaataa sabbe pubba"ngamaa etesa.m dhammaana.m. ^b^tato na.m sukhamanvetii^eb^ti somanassamapi na.m anveti ya.m susukhacchaayaa tadaapi na.m sukha.m tadapi anveti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0275^ea^ ^a^M0.0277^ea^ katamo catubyuuho haaro? manopubba"ngamaati na ida.m ekaadivacana.m. ki.m kaara.naa? sabbe yeva ime chavi~n~naa.nakaayaa, imamhi bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye sukhena atthikaa, te mana.m pasaadentiiti aya.m imamhi sutte bhagavato adhippaayo. attho pubbeyeva niddi.t.tho.

[03] yaani hi kusalamuulaani, taani a.t.thaanisa.msamattaa hetu, aya.m a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. dasa .thaanaani desanaahetuuni desanaapaccayaa niddesanaa ca. tattha ya.m ma~n~ne dukkhena saha naamaruupa.m vi~n~naa.nasaccanti a"ngena kusalamuula.m pahiiyati, aya.m appahiinabhuumiya.m samudayo. ya.m tesa.m pahaanaa, aya.m nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. aya.m aava.t.to haaro.
[03] vibhattiiti --
[21] manopubba"ngamaa dhammaa, manose.t.thaa manomayaa.
[27] manasaa ce pasannena, bhaasati vaa karoti vaa.
[22] tato na.m sukhamanveti, chaayaava anapaayiniiti..

[03] ta.m ^a^P0.0166^ea^ na eka.msena sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa pana hoti. tassa vaa micchaadi.t.thikassa sakasatthe citta.m pasaadeti, tena ca pasannena cittena bhaasati byaakaroti na ta.m sukhamanveti na chaayaava anugaaminii, dukkhameva ta.m anveti. yathaa vahanta.m cakka.m padamanveti, ida.m ta.m vibhajjabyaakara.niiya.m. manasaa ce pasannena kaayakamma.m vaciikamma.m sukhavedaniiyanti samaggate sukhavedaniiya.m micchaggate dukkhavedaniiya.m, aya.m vibhatti.

[03] tattha katamo parivattano haaro? manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati ya.m manasaa padu.t.thena bhaasati vaa karoti vaa dukkhamassaanugaaminii, etaaniyeva dve suttaani bhaasitaani esa eva ca pa.tipakkho. vevacananti yadida.m manocitta.m vi~n~naa.na.m manindriya.m manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.

[03] pa~n~nattiiti manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati aya.m mano ki~nci pa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. dhammaati kusalakammapathapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. manose.t.thaati visi.t.thapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. manojavaati sahapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. cittanti nekkhammapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. manasaa ce pasannenaati saddhindriyapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. manasaa ce pasannenaati anaavilasa"nkappadutiyajjhaanapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m ^a^V0.0276^ea^. manasaa ce pasannenaati ^a^M0.0278^ea^ assaddhaana.m pa.tipakkhapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. bhaasati vaati sammaavaacaapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. karoti vaati sammaakammantapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. tato ^a^P0.0167^ea^ na.m sukhamanvetiiti jhaanasamaadhaana.m. indriyesu manindriya.m. pa.ticcasamuppaade vi~n~naa.na.m. manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati mettaa ca mudutaa ca jhaanesu dutiya.m jhaana.m tatiya~nca. khandhesu sa"nkhaarakkhandhapariyaapanno. dhaatuusu dhammadhaatu, aayatanesu dhammaayatana.m. ya.m kusala.m indriyesu sukhindriya~nca somanassindriya~nca pada.t.thaana.m. imesa.m dhammaana.m pa.ticcasamuppannaana.m phassapaccayaa sukhavedaniiyo phasso sukhavedanaa manopavicaaresu somanassavicaaro chatti.msesu pa.thamapadesu cha somanassanekkhammassitaa. iti aya.m otara.no haaro.
[03] tattha katamo sodhano haaro? ya.m attha.m aarabbha ida.m sutta.m bhaasita.m. so attho niyutto etamattha.m aarabbha sutta.m. aya.m sodhano haaro.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo adhi.t.thaano haaro? manopubba"ngamaa dhammaati vevacanapa~n~natti, na ekattapa~n~natti. dhammaati ekato na vevacanapa~n~natti. manasaa ce pasannenaati so pasaado dvidho ajjhatta~nca abyaapaadaavikkhambhanabahiddhaa ca okappanato. so ajjhattapasaado dvidho. samugghaatapasaado ca vikkhambhanapasaado ca byaapaadapariyu.t.thaana.m. vighaato na muulapasaado jaatamuulampi vaa. pasaado sabyaapaada.m vighaatena. tato na.m sukhamanvetiiti sukha.m kaayika~nca cetasika~nca appiyavippayogopi piyasampayogopi nekkhammasukhampi puthujjanasukhampi piitisambojjha"ngampi cetasika.m sukha.m ^a^P0.0168^ea^. yampi passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, tampi kaayika.m sukha.m bojjha"ngaa ca cetasika.m sukha.m. yampi passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedesi, tampi ta~nca sukhapada.t.thaana.m pa~n~nattiyaa yathaavutta.m ta.m aparaama.t.tha.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m. anvetiiti appanaa sandissati na caaya.m vaa pattabhuuto anveti. tadida.m sutta.m dviihi aakaarehi adhi.t.thaatabba.m. hetunaa ca yo pasannamaanaso vipaakena ca yo dukkhavedaniiyo.

[03] parikkhaaroti bhagavaa pa~ncasatena bhikkhusa"nghena nagara.m pavisati raajagaha.m. tattha manusso puggalo bhagavanta.m parivisati, tassa pasaado uppanno kusalamuulapubbayogaavacaropi. so a~n~nesa~nca akkhaati, ida.m vaaca.m bhaasati ^a^M0.0279^ea^ laabhaa tesa.m, yesa.m nivesana.m bhagavaa pavisati, amhaakampi yadi bhaveyya mayampi bhagavato sa.mpasaada.m lacchamhaati. yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ``namo bhagavato namo bhagavato''ti abyaapaadamaano ekamante a.t.thaasi. tadanantare bhagavaa ima.m sutta.m abhaasittha ``manopubba"ngamaa dhammaa''ti. sabba.m sutta.m tathaa ya.m paresa.m bhaasati ida.m ^a^V0.0277^ea^ vaacaakamma.m. ya.m a~njali.m pa.naameti, ida.m kaayakamma.m. yo manopasaado, ida.m manokamma.m. tattha ya.m paresa.m pakaaseti bhaasati va.n.na.m. yesa.m bhagavaa nivesana.m gacchatiiti. sabba.m tassa alobho kusalamuula.m. ya.m bhagavati mettacitto, tassa adoso kusalamuula.m ^a^P0.0169^ea^. ya.m a~njali.m pa.naameti maana~nca nigga.nhaati, tatthassa amoho kusalamuula.m paatubhavati. ya.m u.laarapa~n~na.m pa.tilabhati, idamassa di.t.thivipallaasappahaana.m. ya.m tathaayeva sa.mvaro hoti, idamassa sa~n~naavipallaasappahaana.m. ya.m manassa pasaadana.m, idamassa cittavipallaasappahaananti akusalavipallaasaana.m vikkhambhana.m pahaana.m paccayo. tii.ni kusalamuulaani yo anaavilacittasa"nkappo, so tassa manasikaaroti vuccati. ya.m kilesehi vikkhambhana.m iti vipallaasaa ca aaramma.naa sappaccayataaya paccayo kusalamuulaani ca sandissayataaya paccayo, so ca manasikaaro hetunaa iminaa paccayena citta.m uppanna.m. tattha ya.m sasatthaaramma.na.m citta.m pavatta.m aya.m buddhaanussati. yampi bhagavato gu.ne manasi karoti, ayamassa dhammaanussati. tattha satisampaja~n~na.m hetu, aya~nca paccayo. vaacaa pa~n~naa hetu vitakkavicaaraa paccayo. kaayasa"nkhaaraa kammassa abhisa"nkhaaro naama hetu vaa appaccayo sukhavedaniiyassa kammassa upacayo hetukaa kammassa paccayo.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo samaaropano haaro? manasaayeva pasannena satoyevettha pasanno api ca cittavodaanaa sattaa vimuccantiiti tena sattaa cittapubba"ngamaa cittena pasannena cetanaapi tattha cittabhuutaa bhavantiiti pa.tighaa aya.m cetanaana.m pasaadena kaayo cassa pasaado ^a^P0.0170^ea^, so ca aarabhati pasaadena pasanno sa~n~naananti cassa avipariitaa, so pa~ncavidho vikkhambhanaa, kaayapassambhanaayevaa pasaado cittasito citta.m pana pubba.myeva pasanna.m. aya.m samaaropanaa. eva.m pa~ncannampi pasaado. tato na.m sukhamanvetiiti katama.m bhagavaa niddisati? na hi attasacca.m tassa kammassa vipaako anveti. tassa upaayo anugacchati yadaa sitapaccayaa uppajjate ^a^M0.0280^ea^ somanassa.m avippa.tisaaropi anveti. aya.m samaaropano haaro.

[03] mahaanaama sakkassa sutta.m {passa sa.m0 ni0 5.1017}. tasmi.m ce samaye assato asampajaano kaala.m kareyya kaame bhavati. assato abhisamaahaaro yo maa bhaayi, mahaanaama, ya.m ta.m citta.m diigharatta.m saddhaaparibhaavita.m siilaparibhaavita.m sutacaagaparibhaavitanti vitthaarena kaatabba.m. caagena ca pa~n~naaya ca ki.m dasseti? yaa saddhaa, saa cetaso pasaado. yaa anaavilasa"nkappitaa, saa saddhaa. ki.m kaara.naa? anaavilalakkha.naa. anaavilalakkha.naa hi saddhaa. apare ^a^P0.0171^ea^ aahu gu.naparisuddhini.t.thaagamanalakkha.naa, ya~nca apare vaa vacanapa.tiggahalakkha.naa saddhaa. aparo pariyaayo ^a^V0.0278^ea^ attaana.m yadi eva.m okappeti ``naaha.m ki~nci jaanaamiiti esaa aha.m tattha anu~n~nattaa ana~n~nataa''ti. aya.m saddhaati. aparo pariyaayo ekasa.t.thiyaa di.t.thigataana.m aadiinavaanupassanaa anicca.m dukkhamanattaati. tena ca padi.t.tha.m bhavati yathaa gambhiire udapaane udaka.m cakkhunaa passati na ca kaayena abhisambhunaati. evamassa ariyaa nijjhaanakkhantiyaa di.t.thi bhavati, na ca sacchikataa. aya.m vuccati saddhaa. saa ca lokikaa. aparo pariyaayo khamati puthujjanabhuutassa viisati caati ko sakkaayaadhiinaa na niveso. na eta.m ekanti nayasa~n~naa yathaabhuuta.m di.t.thiyaa tu khalu muduuhi pa~ncahi indriyehi dassanamaggena pahiinaa bhavanti. di.t.theka.t.thaa ca kilesaa, aya.m saddhaa.

[03] sotaapatta"ngamadukkhaaya.m bhuumiya.m paripu.n.naa vuccati. tasmi.myeva bhuumiya.m sekkhasiila.m ariyaa dhaaranti vuccati. tasmi.myeva bhuumiya.m mudupa~n~naa pa~n~nindriyanti vuccati. tasmi.myeva bhuumiya.m khandhehi anatthikataa, aya.m caago. tasmaa saddhaa caagaadhi.t.thaanena niddisitabbaa. yatikena {tena (ka0)} bhiyyo manena saa hissa vipariitaa di.t.thikaa assaddhaa, saa nayanaupadhiisu pamattaa samaadinnaa. tattha saddhindriya.m yo kaama.m parivissanti iti santapaapapa.tinissaggaa na caagaadhi.t.thaana.m pa~n~nindriyena pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m, siilena upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m. ime cattaaro ^a^P0.0172^ea^ dhammaa siila.m paribhaavayanti saddhaa siila.m caago ca pa~n~naati. tattha saddhaaya ogha.m tarati. ya.m siila.m, aya.m appamaado. yo caago, ida.m pa~n~naaya kamma.m. yaa pa~n~naa, ida.m pa~n~nindriya.m, tattha ya.m saddhindriya.m. ta.m tiisu aveccappasaadesu. ya.m siila.m, ta.m saddhindriyesu. yo caago, so catuusu ^a^M0.0281^ea^ jhaanesu. yaa pa~n~naa, saa saccesu, sati sabbatthagaaminii. tassa sekkhassa bhaddikaa bhati, bhaddiko abhisamparaayo. tassa sammu.t.thassatikassa siila.m karontassa na kaayasammu.t.thassatitaaya taani vaa indriyaani ta.m vaa kusalamuula.m kammavipaaka.m bhavati. tassa tikassa atthaniddeso. tattha saddhaa siila.m caago pa~n~naa cattaaro dhammaa. yaa saddhaa yaa ca pa~n~naa, ida.m manosucarita.m. ya.m siila.m, ida.m kaayika.m vaacasika.m sucarita.m. yo caago, ida.m cetasika.m alobho sucarita.m. iti citte gahite pa~ncakkhandhaa gahitaa bhavanti. imehi dhammehi sucarita.m ida.m dukkha~nca ariyasacca.m pada.t.thaana.m maggassa.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vicayo haaro? yaa ca saddhaa ya~nca siila.m. ta.m kissa karoti? yaa saddhaa taaya bhagavanta.m anussarati mattenapi hatthinaa samaagataa, assa bho kukkuraa sabba.m siilena nappa.tipajjati kaayena vaa vaacaaya vaa .thaana.m visaarado bhavatiiti avippa.tisaarii pa~n~naa yassa pa~n~natta.m upa.t.thapeti. tassa akha.n.dassa ^a^P0.0173^ea^ siila.m ya.m na pacchi tassa.m mohassa akusalacitta.m ^a^V0.0279^ea^ uppajjati micchaadi.t.thisahagata.m vaa, aya.m vicayo haaro. dhammavaadino bhaddikaaraati bhavissati atthi esaa yutti.

[03] tattha katamo pada.t.thaano haaro? yamida.m citta.m diigharatta.m paribhaavita.m saddhaaya siilena caagena pa~n~naaya samaadhinaa pa.thamajjhaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. yaa saddhaa assa anaavilasa"nkappo, ta.m dutiyajjhaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. tii.ni ca aveccappasaadaa ya.m siila.m, ta.m ariyakanta.m, ta.m siilakkhandhassa pada.t.thaana.m. yaa pa~n~naa, saa pa~n~naakkhandhassa pada.t.thaana.m. ime ca dhammaa ida~nca citta.m ekodibhuutasamaadhissa pada.t.thaana.m. saddhaa saddhindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. caago samaadhindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. saddhaa ca pa~n~naa ca vipassanaa pada.t.thaana.m. siila~nca caago ca samathassa pada.t.thaana.m. saddhaa ca pa~n~naa ca avijjaa viraagaaya pa~n~naavimuttiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. siila~nca caago ca raagaviraagaaya cetovimuttiyaa pada.t.thaana.m.
