[03] 114^b^.^eb^ pa~ncaanisa.msaa sotaanugataana.m dhammaana.m {passa a0 ni0 4.191} yaava di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaana.m sutta.m vitthaarena kaatabba.m. yu~njato gha.tentassa vaayamato gilaano mara.nakaale devabhuuto paccekabodhi.m paapu.naati. sotaanugataati saddhammassavanena kata.m hoti. na ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya tassa citta.m tasita.m hoti, na ca anibbiddhatta.m, ida.m ca sutta.m pa~ncanna.m puggalaana.m desita.m, saddhaanusaarino mudindriyassa tikkhindriyassa ca dhammaanusaarino tikkhindriyassa mudindriyassa ca. yo pana mohacarito puggalo na sakkoti yu~njitu.m gha.titu.m vaayamitu.m yathaabhuuta.m yathaasamaadhikaa vimutti ta.m kha.na.m ta.m laya.m ta.m muhutta.m phala.m dasseti. saadhu parihaayati paro ta.m duyhati, no tu sukhaavipaakinii bhavati ^a^P0.0232^ea^. tassa di.t.the yeva ca dhamme upapajjaaparaapariyavedaniiya.m. tattha yo puggalo dhammaanusaarii tassa yadi sotaanugataa dhammaa honti so yu~njanto paapu.naati. yo dhammaanusaarii mudindriyo, so gilaano paapu.naati. yo saddhaanusaarii tikkhindriyo, so mara.nakaalasamaye paapu.naati. yo mudindriyo, so devabhuuto paapu.naati. yadaa devabhuuto na paapu.naati, na so teneva dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa paccekabodhi.m paapu.naati. yo sotaanugatesu yu~njati gha.teti vaayamati, so pubbaapannena visesa.m sa~njaanaati, sa~njaananto paapu.naati. sace pana gilaanassa manasikaaro hoti, tattha yu~njanto paapu.naati. sace panassa mara.nakaale sa.mviggo hoti, tattha ^a^M0.0321^ea^ yu~njanto paapu.naati. sace pana na katthaci {kattha (pii0 ka0), tattha (ka0)} sa.mvego hoti, tassa devabhuutassa sukhino dhammabhuutaa paadaa eva.m avilapati. so eva.m jaanaati ``aya.m so dhammavinayo yattha maya.m pubbe manussabhuutaa brahmacariya.m carimhaa''ti. atha devabhuuto paapu.naati. dibbesu vaa pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu ajjhosito hoti pamaadavihaarii, so tena kusalamuulena paccekabodhi.m paapu.naati.

[03] yaa paratoghosena vacasaa suparicitaa, aya.m sutamayii pa~n~naa. ye pana dhammaa honti manasaa anupekkhitaa, aya.m cintaamayii pa~n~naa. ya.m di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, aya.m bhaavanaamayii pa~n~naa ^a^V0.0316^ea^. ya.m sotaanugataa vacasaa paricitaa honti, so ca di.t.the yeva dhamme parinibbaayii, aya.m araha.m puggalo. yo upapajjati devabhuuto paapu.naati, tattha ca parinibbaayati, aya.m anaagaamii. yo tena kusalamuulena paccekabodhi.m paapu.naati, aya.m pubbayogasambhaarasambhuuto puggalo.

[03] sotaanugataa ^a^P0.0233^ea^ dhammaati pa.thama.m vimuttaayatana.m, vacasaa paricitaati dutiya.m tatiya~nca vimuttaayatana.m, manasaa anupekkhitaati catuttha.m vimuttaayatana.m di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaati pa~ncama.m vimuttaayatana.m.

[03] sotaanugataaya vimuttiyaa vacasaa yaa vaacaa suppa.tividdhaa anupubbadhammassa sotena sutvaa siilakkhandhe paripuureti, manasaa anupekkhitaa samaadhikkhandha.m paripuureti, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuureti.

[03] sotaanugataa dhammaa bahussutaa hontiiti vitthaarena kaatabba.m. ida.m pa.thama.m saddhaapadaana.m manasaa anupekkhitaati pa.tisallaanabahulo viharati, vitthaarena kaatabba.m. ida.m dutiya.m saddhaapadaana.m di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaati anaasavaa cetovimuttiyaa naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatiiti. ida.m tatiya.m saddhaapadaana.m.
[03] sotaanugataa dhammaati sekkha.m satthaa dasseti. manasaa anupekkhitaati arahatta.m satthaa dasseti. di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaati tathaagata.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m satthaa dasseti.

[03] sotaanugataa ^a^M0.0322^ea^ dhammaati kaamaana.m nissara.na.m dasseti. manasaa anupekkhitaati ruupadhaatuyaa nissara.na.m dasseti. di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaati tedhaatukaana.m nissara.na.m dasseti. aya.m suttattho.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo desanaahaaro? imamhi sutte tayo esanaa desitaa sotaanugatehi dhammehi vacasaa paricitehi kaamesanaaya samathamaggo. di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhehi brahmacariyesanaaya samathamaggo.

[03] vicayoti yathaa sutta.m manasikaronto vicinanto sutamayipa~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. yathaa ca so ^a^V0.0317^ea^ manasikarotiiti yathaa sutadhammaa tadaa cintaamayipa~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. yathaa di.t.theva ^a^P0.0234^ea^ dhamme manasikaroti tadaa bhaavanaamayipa~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. aya.m vicayo.
[03] sutena sutamayipa~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. cintaaya cintaamayipa~n~na.m bhaavanaaya bhaavanaamayipa~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. atthi esaa yutti.

[03] pada.t.thaanoti sotaanugataa dhammaati dhammassavanassa pada.t.thaana.m. vacasaa paricitaati yu~njanaaya pada.t.thaana.m. manasaa anupekkhitaati dhammaanudhammaaya vipassanaaya pada.t.thaana.m. di.t.thiyaa anupekkhitaati pa~n~naayapi anupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaapi anupekkhitaa.
[03] catubyuuhoti imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye imaahi dviihi pa~n~naahi samannaagataa tehi....

[03] sa nibbutoti maggaphala.m anupaadisesa~nca nibbaanadhaatu.m manteti, daanena o.laarikaana.m kilesaana.m pahaana.m manteti. siilena majjhimaana.m, pa~n~naaya sukhumakilesaana.m manteti, raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti kataa ca bhuumi.
[21] dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati.
[27] kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti maggo vutto.
[22] raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti maggaphalamaaha..
[03] dadato ^a^M0.0323^ea^ pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamatoti tiihi padehi lokika.m kusalamuula.m vutta.m. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti lokuttara.m kusalamuula.m vutta.m.

[03] dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti puthujjanabhuumi.m manteti. kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti sekkhabhuumi.m manteti. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti asekkhabhuumi vuttaa.

[03] dadato ^a^P0.0235^ea^ pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti magganiyaa pa.tipadaa vuttaa. kusalo ^a^V0.0318^ea^ ca jahaati paapakanti sekkhavimutti. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti asekkhavimutti.

[03] dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti daanakatha.m siilakatha.m maggakatha.m lokikaana.m dhammaana.m desanamaaha. kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti loke aadiinavaanupassanaa. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti saamukka.msikaaya dhammadesanaayapi pa.tividdhaa.

[03] dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti paa.naana.m abhayadaanena paa.naatipaataa verama.nisattaana.m abhaya.m deti. eva.m sabbaani sikkhaapadaani kaatabbaani. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti siile pati.t.thaaya citta.m sa.myameti, tassa sa.myamato paaripuuri.m gacchati. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti dve vimuttiyo. aya.m suttaniddeso.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa desanaa? imamhi sutte ki.m desita.m? dve sugatiyo devaa ca manussaa ca, dibbaa ca pa~ncakaamagu.naa, maanussakaa ca. dviihi padehi niddeso. dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati, kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti maggo vutto. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti dve nibbaanadhaatuyo desitaa sopaadisesaa ca anupaadisesaa ca. aya.m desanaa.

[03] vicayoti dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti iminaa pa.thamena padena daanamayikapu~n~nakiriyavatthu vutta.m. tenassa aanantariyaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m. dutiyena padena... yanti, niyyaanika.m saasananti, aya.m adhippaayo. assavanena ^a^P0.0236^ea^ ca amanasikaarena ca appa.tivedhena ca sakkaayasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa vuttaa. savanena ^a^M0.0324^ea^ ca manasikaarena ca pa.tivedhena ca sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa vuttaa. aya.m aava.t.to.

[03] vibhattiiti eka.msabyaakara.niiyo. natthi tattha vibhattiyaa bhuumi. parivattanaati ye pa~ncaanisa.msaa, te pa~ncaadinaa pa.tipakkhena teneva di.t.theva dhamme paapu.naati, ta.m upapajjamaanaa aparo pariyaayo.
[03] vevacananti sotaanugataa dhammaati ya.m sutta.m di.t.thampi pa~n~nindriya.m vi~n~nattampi di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhampi vibhaavitampi.
[03] pa~n~nattiiti ^a^V0.0319^ea^ sotaanugataadhammaati desanaa avijjaapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. manasikaaro paamojjapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natto, di.t.thadhammaapi aanisa.msapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~nattaa.

[03] otara.noti tisso pa~n~naa vacasaa paricitesu sutamayiipa~n~naa manasaa anupekkhitesu cintaamayiipa~n~naa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaasu bhaavanaamayiipa~n~naa. imaani ariyasaccaani indriyaani vijjuppaadaa avijjaanirodho pa.ticcasamuppaado indriyesu tii.ni indriyaani, aayatanesu dhammaayatanapariyaapannaa dhaatuusu dhammadhaatupariyaapannaati. sodhanoti yo aarambho suttassa paveso niyutto.
[03] adhi.t.thaanoti pa~ncaanisa.msaati vemattataaya pa~n~nattaa aanisa.msaa sotaa anugataati vemattataaya ariyavohaaro pa~n~natto, dhamme ca savananti ekattataaya pa~n~natta.m.

[03] parikkhaaroti dhammassavanassa payirupaasanaa paccayo, saddhaa hetu. manasaa anupekkhitaati atthappa.tisa.mveditaa paccayo, dhammappa.tisa.mveditaa hetu, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaati ^a^P0.0237^ea^ saddhammassavana~nca manasikaaro ca paccayo, sutamayii cintaamayii pa~n~naa hetu. samaaropanoti vibhatta.m sutta.m aparo pariyaayo nibbatti bale natthi. tattha samaaropanaaya bhuumi.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m? dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti gaathaa. dadatoti daanamayikapu~n~nakiriyavatthu vutta.m. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti siilamayikapu~n~nakiriyavatthu vutta.m. kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byaapaadassa ca pahaanamaaha. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byaapaadassa ^a^M0.0325^ea^ ca chandaraagavinayamaahaati. dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti gaathaa alobho kusalamuula.m bhavati. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti adoso kusalamuula.m bhavati. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti averaa asapattaa abyaapaadataaya sadaa. kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti ~naa.nuppaadaa a~n~naa.nanirodho. catutthapadena raagadosamohakkhayena raagaviraagaa cetovimuttimohakkhayena avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti, aya.m vicayo.
[03] yuttiiti daane .thito ubhaya.m hi paripuureti. macchariya~nca pajahati. pu~n~na~nca pava.d.dhati. atthi esaa yutti.

[03] pada.t.thaananti ^a^V0.0320^ea^ dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti caagaadhi.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti saccaadhi.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti upasamaadhi.t.thaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. aya.m pada.t.thaano.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0238^ea^ katamo lakkha.no? dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati. dadatopi vera.m na kariyaati kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbuto ruupakkhayaapi vedanakkhayaapi, yena ruupena di.t.tha.m, tena tathaagato pa~n~napento pa~n~napeyya ruupassa khayaa viraaganirodhaati eva.m pa~ncakkhandhaa.

[03] catubyuuho idha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye mahaabhogaana.m patthayissanti? te daana.m dassanti parissayapahaanaaya, ye averaabhichandakaa, te pa~nca veraani pajahissanti, ye kusalaabhichandakaa, te a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessanti a.t.thanna.m micchattaana.m pahaanaaya. ye nibbaayitukaamaa, te raagadosamoha.m pajahissantiiti aya.m bhagavato adhippaayo.

[03] aava.t.toti ya~nca adadato macchariya.m ya~nca asa.myamato vera.m ya~nca akusalassa paapassa appahaana.m, aya.m dukkhaniddeso na samudayo. alobhena ca adosena ca amohena ca kusalena imaani tii.ni kusalamuulaani. tesa.m paccayo a.t.tha sammattaani, aya.m maggo. tesa.m raagadosamohaana.m khayaa, aya.m nirodho.

[03] vibhattiiti dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti na eka.msena yo raajada.n.dabhayena deti, yo ca akappiyassa paribhogena siilavantesu deti, na tassa pu~n~na.m ^a^M0.0326^ea^ pava.d.dhatiiti so ceta.m daana.m akusalena deti, da.n.dadaana.m satthadaana.m apu~n~namaya.m pava.d.dhati, na pu~n~na.m. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti na eka.msena ki.m kaara.na.m ya~nca yo pada.m di.t.thadhammika.m passati yadi mama raajaano gahetvaa hattha.m vaa chindeyya...pe0... na tena sa.myamena vera.m na karoti. yo tu eva.m samaadiyati paa.naatipaatassa ^a^P0.0239^ea^ paapako vipaakoti, di.t.the yeva dhamme abhisamparaaye ca eva.m sabbassa akusalassa hetuto aarati. iminaa sa.myamena vera.m na ciiyati.

[03] parivattanaati dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti adadato pu~n~na.m na pava.d.dhati. ya.m daanamaya.m, ta.m sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati, asa.myamato vera.m kariiyati. kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m akusalo na jahaati. raagadosamohakkhayaa sanibbutoti duuta.m pesetvaa pa.niita.m pesetvaapi na pakkosaami, so ^a^V0.0321^ea^ sayameva pana mahaabhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro amhaaka.m vasana.t.thaana.m sampatto amhehi ca santhaagaarasaalaa {sandhaagaarasaalaa (ka0)} kaaritaa, ettha maya.m dasabala.m aanetvaa ma"ngala.m bha.naapemaati cintetvaa upasa"nkami.msu. yena santhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.msuuti ta.m divasa.m kira santhaagaare cittakamma.m ni.t.thaapetvaa a.t.takaa muttamattaa honti. buddhaa naama ara~n~najjhaasayaa ara~n~naaraamaa antogaame vaseyyu.m vaa no vaati tasmaa bhagavato mana.m jaanitvaava pa.tijaggissaamaati cintetvaa te bhagavanta.m upasa"nkami.msu. idaani pana mana.m labhitvaa pa.tijaggitukaamaa yena santhaagaara.m, tenupasa"nkami.msu. sabbasantharinti yathaa sabba.m santhata.m hoti eva.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msuuti. ettha pana te mallaraajaano santhaagaara.m pa.tijaggitvaa nagaraviithiyopi sammajjaapetvaa dhaje ussaapetvaa suva.n.nagha.tikadaliyo ca .thapaapetvaa sakalanagara.m diipamaalaahi vippaki.n.nataaraka.m viya katvaa khiirapake {khiirupake (pii0 ka0)} daarake khiira.m paayetha, dahare kumaare lahu.m lahu.m bhojaapetvaa sayaapetha, uccaasadda.m maakari, ajja ekaratti.m satthaa antogaameva vasissati, buddhaa naama appasaddakaamaa hontiiti bheri.m caraapetvaa saya.m da.n.dakadiipikaa aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. bhagavanta.m yeva purakkhatvaati bhagavanta.m purato ^a^P0.0240^ea^ katvaa, tattha bhagavaa bhikkhuuna~nceva upaasakaana~nca majjhe nisinno ativiya virocati. samantapaasaadiko suva.n.nava.n.no abhiruupo dassaniiyo puratthimakaayato ^a^M0.0327^ea^ suva.n.nava.n.naa rasmi u.t.thahitvaa gaganatale asiitihattha.m .thaana.m ga.nhaati. pacchimakaayato dakkhi.nahatthato vaamahatthato suva.n.nava.n.naa he.t.thaa paadatalehi pavaa.lava.n.narasmi u.t.thahitvaa ghanapathaviya.m asiitihattha.m .thaana.m ga.nhaati, eva.m samantaa asiitihatthamatta.m .thaana.m chabba.n.nabuddharasmiyo vijjotamaanaa vita.n.damaanaa vidhaavanti, sabbe disaabhaagaa suva.n.nacampakapupphehi vikiriyamaanaa viya suva.n.nagha.tato nikkhantasuva.n.narasadhaaraahi si~ncamaanaa viya pasaaritasuva.n.napa.taparikkhittaa vviya verambhavaatasamu.t.thitaki.msukaki.msukaaraka.nikaarapupphacu.n.nasamoki.n.naa viya vippakasanta.m asiitianubya~njanabyaamappabhaa dvatti.msavaralakkha.nasamujjala.m sariira.m samuggatataaraka.m viya gaganatala.m vikasitamiva padumavana.m sabbaphaaliphullo viya yojanasatiko paaricchattako pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thapitaana.m dvatti.msacandaana.m dvatti.msasuuriyaana.m dvatti.msacakkavattiina.m dvatti.msadevaraajaana.m dvatti.msamahaabrahmaana.m nibbuto asekkhassa natthi nibbuti.
[03] vevacananti dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, anumodatopi pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati. cittassa samaadahatopi veyyaavaccakiriyaayapi pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti.

[03] pa~n~nattiiti dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, alobhassa pa.tinissayaghaatapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. sa.myamato ^a^V0.0322^ea^ vera.m na ciiyatiiti adosassa pa.tinissayaghaatapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti amohassa pa.tinissayaghaatapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m.

[03] otara.noti ^a^P0.0241^ea^ pa~ncasu indriyesu dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati, sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati sa.myamena siilakkhandho. oti.n.no chasu indriyesu sa.mvaro, aya.m samaadhikkhandho, ya.m kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m, aya.m pa~n~naakkhandho, raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti vimuttikkhandho. dhaatuusu dhammadhaatu, aayatanesu manaayatana.m.
[03] sodhanoti yenaarambhena ida.m sutta.m desita.m so aarambho suddho.

[03] adhi.t.thaano daananti ekattataaya pa~n~natta.m. caago pariccaago dhammadaana.m aamisadaana.m, a.t.tha daanaani vitthaarena kaatabbaani, aya.m vemattataa. na ca dadato ^a^M0.0328^ea^ ekattapa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. khantii anavajjanti pa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natta.m. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti rodhaviiriyapa~n~nattiyaa {yodha viiriyapa~n~nattiyaa (pii0 ka0)} pa~n~nattaa.

[03] parikkhaaroti daanassa paamojja.m paccayo, alobho hetu. sa.myamato yoniso manasikaaro hetu, pariccaago paccayo. kusalo ca jahaati paapakanti yathaabhuutadassana.m paccayo, ~naa.nappa.tilaabho hetu. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti parato ca ghoso ajjhatta~nca yoniso manasikaaro maggo ca hetu ca paccayo ca.

[03] samaaropanoti dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatiiti gaathaa tassa siilampi va.d.dhati. sa.myamopi va.d.dhati. sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyatiiti. a~n~nepi kilesaa na ciiyanti yepissa tappaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaataa, tepissa na uppajjanti. raagadosamohakkhayaa sa nibbutoti raagadosassaapi khayaa raagaanusayassapi khayaa dosassa mohassaapi sa nibbutoti sopaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu anupaadisesaapi. aya.m samaaropano.
[06] therassa mahaakaccaayanassa pe.takopadese
[06] haarassa sampaatabhuumi samattaa.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ pubbaa ^a^V0.0323^ea^ ^a^P0.0242^ea^ ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaya ca bhavata.nhaaya ca. tattha avijjaaniivara.naana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sattaana.m pubbako.ti na pa~n~naayati. tattha ye sattaa ta.nhaasa.myojanaa, te ajjhosaanabahulaa mandavipassakaa. ye pana ussannadi.t.thikaa sattaa, te vipassanaabahulaa mandajjhosaanaa.

[03] tattha ta.nhaacaritaa sattaa sattasa~n~naabhinivi.t.thaa anuppaadavayadassino. te pa~ncasu khandhesu attaana.m samanupassanti ``ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana''nti. eva.m pa~ncakkhandhaa. a~n~nehi khandhehi attaana.m samanupassanti tassa ussannadi.t.thikaa sattaa vipassamaanaa khandhe uju.m attato samanupassanti. te ruupa.m attako samanupassanti. ya.m ruupa.m, so attaa. yo aha.m, ta.m ruupa.m. so ruupavinaasa.m passati, aya.m ucchedavaadii ^a^M0.0329^ea^. iti pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m pa.thamaabhinipaataa sakkaayadi.t.thiyo pa~nca uccheda.m bhajanti ``ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira''nti. ekamekamhi khandhe tiihi padehi pacchimakehi sassata.m bhajati ``a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira''nti. ito bahiddhaate pabbajitaa ta.nhaacaritaa kaamasukhallikaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti. tena ye ca nissandena di.t.thicaritaa attakilamathaanuyogamanuyuttaa ^a^P0.0243^ea^ viharanti. tena yeva di.t.thisukhena ettaavataa baahirako payogo.
[03] tattha di.t.thicaritaa sattaa ye ariyadhammavinaya.m otaranti, te dhammaanusaarino honti. ye ta.nhaacaritaa sattaa ariya.m dhammavinaya.m otaranti, te saddhaanusaarino honti.

[03] tattha ye di.t.thicaritaa sattaa, te kaamesu dosadi.t.thii, na ca ye kaamesu anusayaa samuuhataa, te attakilamathaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti. tesa.m satthaa dhamma.m deseti. a~n~no vaa saavako kaamehi natthi atthoti te ca pubbeyeva kaamehi anatthikaa iti kaame appakasirena pa.tinissajjanti. te cetasikena dukkhena anajjhositaa. tena vuccati ``sukhaa pa.tipadaa''ti ^a^V0.0324^ea^. ye pana ta.nhaacaritaa sattaa, te kaamesu ajjhositaa, tesa.m satthaa vaa dhamma.m deseti. a~n~nataro vaa bhikkhu kaamehi natthi atthoti, te piyaruupa.m dukkhena pa.tinissajjanti. tena vuccati ``dukkhaa pa.tipadaa''ti. iti ime sabbasattaa dviisu pa.tipadaasu samosara.na.m gacchanti dukkhaaya~nca sukhaaya~nca.

[03] tattha ye di.t.thicaritaa sattaa, te dvidhaa mudindriyaa ca tikkhindriyaa ca. tattha ye di.t.thicaritaa sattaa tikkhindriyaa sukhena pa.tinissajjanti, khippa~nca abhisamenti, tena vuccati ``khippaabhi~n~naa sukhaa pa.tipadaa''ti. tattha ye di.t.thicaritaa sattaa mudindriyaa pa.thama.m tikkhindriya.m upaadaaya dandhatara.m abhisamenti, te sukhena pa.tinissajjanti, dandha~nca abhisamenti. tena vuccati ``sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa''ti. tattha ta.nhaacaritaa sattaa dvidhaa tikkhindriyaa ca mudindriyaa ca. tattha ^a^P0.0244^ea^ ye ta.nhaacaritaa sattaa tikkhindriyaa dukkhena pa.tinissajjanti, khippa~nca abhisamenti. tena vuccati ``dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa''ti. tattha ye ta.nhaacaritaa sattaa mudindriyaa pa.thama.m tikkhindriya.m upaadaaya dandhatara.m abhisamenti, te dukkhena pa.tinissajjanti, dandha~nca abhisamenti. tena vuccati ``dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa''ti. imaa catasso pa.tipadaayo apa~ncamaa acha.t.thaa. ye hi keci nibbutaa nibbaayissanti ^a^M0.0330^ea^ vaa imaahi catuuhi pa.tipadaahi ana~n~naahi aya.m pa.tipadaacatukkena kilese niddisati. yaa catukkamaggena ariyadhammesu niddisitabbaa, aya.m vuccati siihavikkii.lito naama nayo.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ tatrime cattaaro aahaaraa. cattaaro vipallaasaa upaadaanaa yogaa ganthaa aasavaa oghaa sallaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo agatigamanaati, eva.m imaani sabbaani dasa padaani. aya.m suttassa sa.msandanaa.

[03] cattaaro aahaaraa. tattha yo ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro yo ca phasso aahaaro, ime ta.nhaacaritena pahaatabbaa. tattha yo ca manosa~ncetanaahaaro yo ca vi~n~naa.naahaaro, ime di.t.thicaritena pahaatabbaa.

[03] pa.thamo aahaaro pa.thamo vipallaaso, dutiyo aahaaro dutiyo vipallaaso, tatiyo aahaaro tatiyo vipallaaso, catuttho aahaaro catuttho vipallaaso. ime cattaaro vipallaasaa apa~ncamaa acha.t.thaa. ida~nca pamaa.naa cattaaro aahaaraa.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0325^ea^ pa.thame vipallaase .thito kaame upaadiyati, ida.m kaamupaadaana.m. dutiye vipallaase .thito anaagata.m bhava.m upaadiyati, ida.m siilabbatupaadaana.m. tatiye vipallaase .thito vipariito di.t.thi.m upaadiyati, ida.m di.t.thupaadaana.m. catutthe ^a^P0.0245^ea^ vipallaase .thito khandhe attato upaadiyati, ida.m attavaadupaadaana.m.

[03] tattha kaamupaadaane .thito kaame abhijjhaayati ganthati, aya.m abhijjhaakaayagantho. siilabbatupaadaane .thito byaapaada.m ganthati, aya.m byaapaadakaayagantho. di.t.thupaadaane .thito paraamaasa.m ganthati, aya.m paraamaasakaayagantho. attavaadupaadaane .thito papa~ncanto ganthati, aya.m ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho.

[03] tassa ganthitaa kilesaa aasavanti. ki~nci pana vuccati vippa.tisaaro. ye vippa.tisaaraa {yo vippa.tisaaro (pii0 ka0)} te anusayaa. tattha abhijjhaakaayaganthena kaamaasavo, byaapaadakaayaganthena bhavaasavo, paraamaasakaayaganthena di.t.thaasavo, ida.m saccaabhinivesakaayaganthena avijjaasavo.

[03] te ^a^M0.0331^ea^ cattaaro aasavaa vepullabhaava.m gataa oghaa honti, tena vuccanti ``oghaa''ti. tattha kaamaasavo kaamogho, bhavaasavo bhavogho, avijjaasavo avijjogho, di.t.thaasavo di.t.thogho.

[03] te cattaaro oghaa aasayamanupavi.t.thaa anusayasahagataa vuccanti. sallaati hadayamaahacca ti.t.thantaa. tattha kaamogho raagasalla.m, bhavogho dosasalla.m, avijjogho mohasalla.m, di.t.thogho di.t.thisalla.m.

[03] imehi catuuhi sallehi pariyaadinna.m vi~n~naa.na.m catuusu dhammesu ti.t.thati ruupe vedanaaya sa~n~naaya sa"nkhaaresu. imaa catasso vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo. tattha raagasallena nanduupasecana.m ruupuupaga.m vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thati. dosasallena vedanuupaga.m mohasallena sa~n~nuupaga.m ^a^P0.0246^ea^ di.t.thisallena nanduupasecana.m sa"nkhaaruupaga.m vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thati.

[03] catuuhi vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiihi catubbidha.m agati.m gacchanti chandaa dosaa bhayaa mohaa. raagena chandaa agati.m gacchati, dosena dosaa agati.m gacchati, mohena mohaa agati.m gacchati, di.t.thiyaa bhayaa agati.m gacchati. iti ida~nca kamma.m ime ca kilesaa. aya.m sa.msaarassa hetu.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ tatthimaa ^a^V0.0326^ea^ catasso disaa kaba.liikaaraahaaro ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaaso kaamupaadaana.m kaamayogo abhijjhaakaayagantho kaamaasavo kaamogho raagasalla.m ruupuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti chandaa agatigamana.m. aya.m pa.thamaa disaa.

[03] phasso aahaaro ``dukkhe sukha''nti vipallaaso siilabbatupaadaana.m bhavayogobyaapaado kaayagantho bhavaasavo bhavogho dosasalla.m vedanuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti dosaa agatigamana.m, aya.m dutiyaa disaa.

[03] manosa~ncetanaahaaro ``anattani attaa''ti vipallaaso di.t.thupaadaana.m di.t.thiyogo paraamaasakaayagantho di.t.thaasavo di.t.thogho di.t.thisalla.m sa~n~nuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti bhayaa agatigamana.m. aya.m tatiyaa disaa.

[03] vi~n~naa.naahaaro ``anicce nicca''nti vipallaaso attavaadupaadaana.m avijjaayogo ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho avijjaasavo avijjogho mohasalla.m sa"nkhaaruupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti mohaa agatigamana.m, aya.m ^a^M0.0332^ea^ catutthii disaa. iti imesa.m dasanna.m suttaana.m pa.thamena padena pa.thamaaya disaaya aalokana.m. aya.m vuccati disaalokanaa.

[03] catuuhi ^a^P0.0247^ea^ vipallaasehi akusalapakkhe disaavilokanaa kilesa.m sa.myojetvaa aya.m akusalapakkhe disaavilokanaaya bhuumi pa~ncanna.m dasanna.m suttaana.m yaani pa.thamaani padaani imesa.m dhammaana.m ko attho? eko attho, bya~njanameva naana.m. eva.m dutiyaa eva.m tatiyaa eva.m catutthii. aya.m pa.thamaa sa.msandanaa.

[03] iminaa peyyaalena sabbe kilesaa catuusu padesu pakkhipitabbaa. tato kusalapakkhe catasso pa.tipadaa cattaari jhaanaani cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro vihaaraa dibbo brahmaa ariyo aane~njo cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutadhammaa cattaaro adhi.t.thaanaa cattaaro samaadhayo chandasamaadhi viiriyasamaadhi cittasamaadhi viima.msaasamaadhi. cattaaro dhammaa sukhabhaagiyaa naa~n~natra bojjha"ngaa naa~n~natra tapasaa naa~n~natindriyasa.mvaraa naa~n~natra sabbanissaggaa cattaari appamaa.naani.

[03] tattha dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa bhaaviyamaanaa bahuliikariyamaanaa pa.thama.m jhaana.m paripuureti, pa.thama.m jhaana.m paripu.n.na.m pa.thama.m satipa.t.thaana.m paripuureti ^a^V0.0327^ea^, pa.thama.m satipa.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m pa.thama.m vihaara.m paripuureti, pa.thamo vihaaro paripu.n.no pa.thama.m sammappadhaana.m paripuureti, pa.thama.m sammappadhaana.m paripu.n.na.m pa.thama.m acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m paripuureti, pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paripu.n.no pa.thama.m adhi.t.thaana.m paripuureti, pa.thama.m adhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m chandasamaadhi.m paripuureti, chandasamaadhi paripu.n.no indriyasa.mvara.m paripuureti, indriyasa.mvaro paripu.n.no pa.thama.m mettaaappamaa.na.m paripuureti. eva.m yaava sabbanissaggo catuttha.m appamaa.na.m paripuureti.

[03] tattha pa.thamaa ca pa.tipadaa pa.thama~nca jhaana.m pa.thama~nca satipa.t.thaana.m pa.thamo ca vihaaro pa.thama~nca sammappadhaana.m ^a^P0.0248^ea^ pa.thamo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccaadhi.t.thaana~nca chandasamaadhi ca indriyasa.mvaro ca mettaa ca appamaa.na.m. aya.m pa.thamaa disaa.

[03] dukkhaa ca {dutiyaa ca (ka0)} pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa dutiya.m jhaana.m dutiya~nca satipa.t.thaana.m dutiyo ca vihaaro dutiya~nca sammappadhaana.m dutiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto ^a^M0.0333^ea^ dhammo caagaadhi.t.thaana.m cittasamaadhi cattaaro iddhipaadaa karu.naa ca appamaa.na.m, aya.m dutiyaa disaa.

[03] sukhaa ca {tatiyaa ca (ka0)} pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa tatiya~nca jhaana.m tatiya~nca satipa.t.thaana.m tatiyo ca vihaaro tatiya~nca sammappadhaana.m tatiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana~nca viiriyasamaadhi ca bojjha"ngaa ca muditaa ca appamaa.na.m. aya.m tatiyaa disaa.

[03] sukhaa ca {catutthii ca (ka0)} pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa catuttha.m jhaana.m catuttha~nca satipa.t.thaana.m catuttho ca vihaaro catuttha~nca sammappadhaana.m catuttho ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamaadhi.t.thaana~nca viima.msaasamaadhi ca sabbanissaggo ca upekkhaa appamaa.na~nca. aya.m catutthii disaa. imaasa.m catassanna.m disaana.m aalokanaa. aya.m vuccati disaalokano naama nayo.

[03] tatthaaya.m yojanaa. cattaaro ca aahaaraa catasso ca pa.tipadaa, cattaaro ca vipallaasaa cattaaro ca satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaari ca upaadaanaani cattaari ca jhaanaani cattaaro ca yogaa vihaaraa ca, ganthaa ca sammappadhaanaa ca, aasavaa ca acchariyaa abbhutadhammaa ca, oghaa ca adhi.t.thaanaani ca, sallaa ca samaadhayo, vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo ^a^P0.0249^ea^ cattaaro ca sukhabhaagiyaa dhammaa, cattaari ca agatigamanaani cattaari ca appamaa.naani iti kusalaakusalaana.m pa.tipakkhavasena yojanaa, aya.m vuccati disaalokano nayo.

[03] tassa ^a^V0.0328^ea^ cattaari saama~n~naphalaani pariyosaana.m, yo ca dhammo kusalaakusalaniddese pa.thamo disaaniddeso, imassa sotaapattiphala.m pariyosaana.m dutiya.m sakadaagaamiphala.m, tatiya.m anaagaamiphala.m, catuttha.m arahattaphala.m.

[03] tattha katamo tipukkhalo nayo? ye ca dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya khippaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyanti dve puggalaa, ye ca sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya khippaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyanti dve puggalaa.

[03] imesa.m catunna.m puggalaana.m yo puggalo sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya niyyaati, yo ca puggalo dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya niyyaati. ime dve puggalaa bhavanti. tattha yo sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya niyyaati ^a^M0.0334^ea^, aya.m uggha.tita~n~nuu. yo pacchimo puggalo saadhaara.no, aya.m vipa~ncita~n~nuu. yo puggalo dandhaabhi~n~naaya dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya niyyaati, aya.m neyyo. ime cattaaro bhavitvaa tii.ni honti, tattha uggha.tita~n~nussa samathapubba"ngamaa vipassanaa, neyyassa vipassanaapubba"ngamo samatho, vipa~ncita~n~nussa samathavipassanaa yuganaddhaa. uggha.tita~n~nussa mudukaa desanaa, neyyassa tikkhaa desanaa, vipa~ncita~n~nussa tikkhamudukaa desanaa.
[03] uggha.tita~n~nussa adhipa~n~naasikkhaa, neyyassa adhicittasikkhaa, vipa~ncita~n~nussa adhisiilasikkhaa. iti imesa.m puggalaana.m catuuhi pa.tipadaahi niyyaana.m.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0250^ea^ aya.m sa.mkileso, tii.ni akusalamuulaani tayo phassaa tisso vedanaa tayo upavicaaraa tayo sa.mkilesaa tayo vitakkaa tayo pari.laahaa tii.ni sa"nkhatalakkha.naani tisso dukkhataati.

[03] tii.ni akusalamuulaaniiti lobho akusalamuula.m, doso akusalamuula.m, moho akusalamuula.m. tayo phassaati sukhavedaniiyo phasso, dukkhavedaniiyo phasso, adukkhamasukhavedaniiyo phasso. tisso vedanaati sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. tayo upavicaaraati somanassopavicaaro domanassopavicaaro upekkhopavicaaro. tayo sa.mkilesaati raago doso moho. tayo vitakkaati kaamavitakko byaapaadavitakko vihi.msaavitakko. tayo pari.laahaati ^a^V0.0329^ea^ raagajo dosajo mohajo. tii.ni sa"nkhatalakkha.naaniiti uppaado .thiti vayo. tisso dukkhataati dukkhadukkhataa vipari.naamadukkhataa sa"nkhatadukkhataa.

[03] tattha lobho akusalamuula.m kuto samu.t.thita.m? tividha.m aaramma.na.m manaapika.m amanaapika.m upekkhaa.thaaniya~nca. tattha manaapikena aaramma.nena lobho akusalamuula.m samu.t.thahati. iti manaapikaa aaramma.naa sukhavedaniiyo phasso, sukhavedaniiya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjate sukhavedanaa, sukhavedana.m pa.ticca uppajjate somanassuupavicaaro, somanassuupavicaara.m pa.ticca uppajjate raago, raaga.m pa.ticca uppajjate kaamavitakko, kaamavitakka.m pa.ticca uppajjate raagajo pari.laaho ^a^P0.0251^ea^ raagaja.m pari.laaha.m pa.ticca uppajjate uppaado sa"nkhatalakkha.no, uppaada.m sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m pa.ticca uppajjate vipari.naamadukkhataa.

[03] doso ^a^M0.0335^ea^ akusalamuula.m kuto samu.t.thita.m? amanaapikena aaramma.nena doso akusalamuula.m samu.t.thita.m. iti amanaapikaa aaramma.naa dukkhavedaniiyo phasso, dukkhavedaniiya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjate dukkhavedanaa, dukkhavedana.m pa.ticca uppajjate domanassuupavicaaro, domanassuupavicaara.m pa.ticca uppajjate doso, dosa.m pa.ticca uppajjate byaapaadavitakko, byaapaadavitakka.m pa.ticca uppajjate dosajo pari.laaho, dosaja.m pari.laaha.m pa.ticca uppajjate .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m pa.ticca uppajjate dukkhadukkhataa vedanaa.

[03] moho akusalamuula.m kuto samu.t.thita.m? upekkhaa.thaaniyena aaramma.nena moho akusalamuula.m samu.t.thita.m. iti upekkhaa.thaaniyaa aaramma.naa adukkhamasukhavedaniiyo phasso, adukkhamasukhavedaniiya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjate adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhavedana.m pa.ticca uppajjate upekkhuupavicaaro, upekkhuupavicaara.m pa.ticca uppajjate moho, moha.m pa.ticca uppajjate vihi.msaavitakko, vihi.msaavitakka.m pa.ticca uppajjate mohajo pari.laaho, mohaja.m pari.laaha.m pa.ticca uppajjate vayo sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, vaya.m sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m pa.ticca uppajjate sa"nkhatadukkhataa, iti aya.m ti.n.na.m kilesaana.m niddeso, aya.m vuccate kusalapakkhe tipukkhalo nayo.
[03] iti tii.ni akusalamuulaani na catutthaani na pa~ncamaani, tayo phassaati tisso vedanaa yaava sa"nkhatadukkhataati, yo ^a^P0.0252^ea^ koci akusalapakkho, sabbo so tiisu akusalamuulesu samosarati.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0330^ea^ katamo kusalapakkho? tii.ni kusalamuulaani, tisso pa~n~naa sutamayii pa~n~naa cintaamayii pa~n~naa bhaavanaamayii pa~n~naa. tayo samaadhii savitakkasavicaaro...pe0... tisso sikkhaa adhisiilasikkhaa...pe0... sikkhaa. tii.ni nimittaani samathanimitta.m paggahanimitta.m upekkhaanimitta.m. tayo vitakkaa nekkhammavitakko...pe0... avihi.msaavitakko. tii.ni indriyaani ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyanti vitthaaro. tayo upavicaaraa nekkhammuupavicaaro abyaapaaduupavicaaro avihi.msuupavicaaro. tisso esanaa kaamesanaa bhavesanaa brahmacariyesanaa. tayo khandhaa siilakkhandho samaadhikkhandho pa~n~naakkhandho.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0336^ea^ ya.m alobho kusalamuula.m, ta.m sutamayipa~n~na.m paripuureti, sutamayii pa~n~naa paripu.n.naa savitakka.m savicaara.m samaadhi.m paripuureti, savitakko savicaaro samaadhi paripu.n.no adhicittasikkha.m paripuureti, adhicittasikkhaa paripu.n.naa samathanimitta.m paripuureti, samathanimitta.m paripu.n.na.m nekkhammavitakka.m paripuureti, nekkhammavitakko paripu.n.no ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m paripuureti, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m paripu.n.na.m nekkhammuupavicaara.m paripuureti, nekkhammuupavicaaro paripu.n.no kaamesana.m pajahati, kaamesanappahaana.m samaadhikkhandha.m paripuureti.

[03] adoso kusalamuula.m cintaamayipa~n~na.m paripuureti, cintaamayii pa~n~naa paripu.n.naa avitakkavicaaramatta.m samaadhi.m paripuureti ^a^P0.0253^ea^. avitakkavicaaramatto samaadhi paripu.n.no adhisiilasikkha.m paripuureti, adhisiilasikkhaa paripu.n.naa upekkhaanimitta.m paripuureti, upekkhaanimitta.m paripu.n.na.m abyaapaadavitakka.m paripuureti, abyaapaadavitakko paripu.n.no a~n~nindriya.m paripuureti, a~n~nindriya.m paripu.n.na.m abyaapaaduupavicaara.m paripuureti, abyaapaaduupavicaaro paripu.n.no bhavesana.m pajahati, bhavesanappahaana.m siilakkhandha.m paripuureti.

[03] amoho kusalamuula.m bhaavanaamayipa~n~na.m paripuureti, bhaavanaamayiipa~n~naa paripu.n.naa avitakkaavicaara.m samaadhi.m paripuureti, avitakko avicaaro samaadhi paripu.n.no adhipa~n~naasikkha.m paripuureti, adhipa~n~naasikkhaa paripu.n.naa paggahanimitta.m paripuureti, paggahanimitta.m paripu.n.na.m a~n~naataavino indriya.m paripuureti, a~n~naataavino indriya.m paripu.n.na.m avihi.msuupavicaara.m paripuureti, avihi.msuupavicaaro paripu.n.no brahmacariyesana.m paripuureti, brahmacariyesanaa paripu.n.naa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuureti.

[03] iti ime tayo dhammaa kusalapakkhikaa sabbe kusalaa dhammaa tiihi tikaniddesehi niddisiyanti ^a^V0.0331^ea^ tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani tassa pariyosaana.m. tattha pa.thamena appa.nihita.m, dutiyena su~n~nata.m, tatiyena animitta.m. aya.m vuccati dutiyo tipukkhalo naama nayo.

[03] tattha ye ime tayo puggalaa uggha.tita~n~nuu vipa~ncita~n~nuu neyyoti. imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m ye ca puggalaa sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya, sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyanti, te dve puggalaa. ye ca dve puggalaa dukkhaaya ^a^P0.0254^ea^ pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya, dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyanti ^a^M0.0337^ea^, ime cattaaro tena visesena dve bhavanti di.t.thicarito ca ta.nhaacarito ca. ime cattaaro bhavitvaa tayo bhavanti, tayo bhavitvaa dve bhavanti. imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m aya.m sa.mkileso, avijjaa ca ta.nhaa ca, ahirika~nca anottappa~nca, assati ca asampaja~n~na~nca, niivara.naani ca sa.myojanaani ca, ajjhosaana~nca abhiniveso ca, aha.mkaaro ca mama.mkaaro ca, assaddhiya~nca dovacassa~nca, kosajja~nca ayoniso ca manasikaaro, vicikicchaa ca abhijjhaa ca, asaddhammassavana~nca asamaapatti ca.
[03] tattha avijjaa ca ahirika~nca assati ca niivara.naani ca ajjhosaana~nca aha.mkaaro ca assaddhiya~nca kosajja~nca vicikicchaa ca asaddhammassavana~nca, aya.m ekaa disaa.

[03] ta.nhaa ca anottappa~nca asampaja~n~na~nca sa.myojanaani ca abhiniveso ca mama.mkaaro ca dovacassataa ca ayoniso manasikaaro ca abhijjhaa ca asamaapatti ca, aya.m dutiyaa disaa. dasanna.m dukaana.m dasa padaani pa.thamaani kaatabbaani. sa.mkhittena attha.m ~naapenti pa.tipakkhe ka.nhapakkhassa sabbesa.m dukaana.m dasa padaani dutiyakaani, aya.m dutiyaa disaa.

[03] iti akusalaana.m dhammaana.m dukkhaniddeso, aya.m samudayo. ya.m ta.m dhamma.m ajjhaavasati naama~nca ruupa~nca ida.m dukkha.m iti aya~nca samudayo, ida~nca dukkha.m, imaani dve saccaani dukkha~nca samudayo ca nandiyaava.t.tassa nayassa pa.thamaniddeso.

[03] tattha katamo kusalapakkho? samatho ca vipassanaa ca, vijjaa ca cara.na~nca, sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca, hirii ca ottappa~nca, aha.mkaarappahaana~nca ^a^P0.0255^ea^ mama.mkaarappahaana~nca, sammaavaayaamo ca yoniso ca manasikaaro, sammaasati ca sammaasamaadhi ca, pa~n~naa ca nibbidaa ca, samaapatti ca saddhammassavana~nca, somanassa~nca dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti ca.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0332^ea^ samatho ca vijjaa ca sati ca hirii ca aha.mkaarappahaana~nca sammaavaayaamo ca sammaasati ca pa~n~naa ca samaapatti ca somanassa~nca, ime dhammaa ekaa disaa. vipassanaa ca cara.na~nca sampaja~n~na~nc ottappa~nca mama.mkaarappahaana~nca yoniso manasikaaro ca sammaasamaadhi ca nibbidaa ca saddhammassavana~nca dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti ca, aya.m dutiyaa disaa. iti kusalapakkhe ca akusalapakkhe ca nandiyaava.t.tassa pana nayassa catasso disaa.

[03] taasu ^a^M0.0338^ea^ yaani akusalapakkhassa pa.thamaani padaani akusalaani kusalehi pahaana.m gacchanti, taani kusalapakkhe dutiyehi padehi pahaana.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa raagaviraagaa cetovimutti yaani akusalapakkhassa dutiyaani akusalapadaani pahaana.m gacchanti, taani kusalapakkhassa pa.thamehi padehi pahaana.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti pariyosaana.m. imesa.m ti.n.na.m nayaana.m pa.thamo nayo siihavikkii.lito naama. a.t.tha padaani cattaari ca kusalaani cattaari ca akusalaani imaani a.t.tha padaani muulapadaani, atthanayena dutiyo tipukkhalo. so chahi dhammehi neti kusalamuulaani ca neti akusalamuulaani ca, iti imaani cha padaani purimakaani ca a.t.tha muulapadaani imaani cuddasa padaani a.t.thaarasanna.m muulapadaana.m. tattha ^a^P0.0256^ea^ yo pacchimako nayo nandiyaava.t.to, so catuuhi dhammehi neti. avijjaaya ca ta.nhaaya ca samathena ca vipassanaaya ca, ime cattaaro dhammaa imaani a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani tiisu nayesu niddi.t.thaani.

[03] tattha yaani nava padaani kusalaani, tattha sabba.m kusala.m samosarati. tesa~nca navanna.m muulaana.m cattaari padaani siihavikkii.litanaye tii.ni tipukkhale dve nandiyaava.t.te, iccete kusalassa pakkhaa. tattha yaani nava padaani kusalaani, tattha sabba.m kusala.m yujjati. tattha siihavikkii.lite naye cattaari padaani tii.ni tipukkhale dve nandiyaava.t.te imaani nava padaani kusalaani niddi.t.thaani.

[03] tattha yaani nandiyaava.t.te naye cattaari padaani, tattha a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani samosaranti. yathaa katha.m, samatho ca alobho ca adoso ca asubhasa~n~naa ca dukkhasa~n~naa ca imaani kusalapakkhe pa~nca padaani samatha.m bhajanti. vipassanaa ca amoho ca aniccasa~n~naa ca anattasa~n~naa ca imaani cattaari padaani vipassana.m bhajanti. imaani nava padaani kusalaani dviisu padesu yojitaani, tattha akusalapakkhe navanna.m akusalamuulapadaana.m yaa ca ta.nhaa yo ca lobho yo ca doso yaa ca subhasa~n~naa yaa ca sukhasa~n~naa, imaani pa~nca padaani ta.nha.m bhajanti ^a^V0.0333^ea^. yaa ca avijjaa yo ca moho yaa ca niccasa~n~naa yaa ca attasa~n~naa, imaani cattaari padaani avijja.m bhajanti. etaani nava padaani akusalaani susa.mkhittaani. iti tayo nayaa eka.m naya.m na pavi.t.thaa. eva.m a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani nandiyaava.t.tanaye niddisitabbaani.

[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0339^ea^ a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani, tipukkhale ^a^P0.0257^ea^ naye yujjanti? navanna.m padaana.m kusalaana.m, vipassanaa ca amoho ca aniccasa~n~naa ca anattasa~n~naa ca, imaani cattaari padaani; amoho ca samatho ca alobho ca asubhasa~n~naa ca, imaani cattaari padaani; lobho ca doso ca, eva.m imaani nava padaani tiisu kusalesu yojetabbaani. tattha navanna.m padaana.m akusalaana.m ta.nhaa ca lobho ca subhasa~n~naa ca sukhasa~n~naa ca, imaani cattaari padaani lobho akusalamuula.m; avijjaa ca moho ca niccasa~n~naa ca attasa~n~naa ca aya.m moho aya.m doso, ye ca imaani nava padaani tiisu akusalesu yojitaani. eva.m a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani kusalamuulesu ca yojetvaa tipukkhalena nayena niddisitabbaani.

[03] katha.m a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani siihavikkii.lite naye yujjanti? ta.nhaa ca subhasa~n~naa ca, aya.m pa.thamo vipallaaso. lobho ca sukhasa~n~naa ca, aya.m dutiyo vipallaaso. avijjaa ca niccasa~n~naa ca, aya.m tatiyo vipallaaso. moho ca attasa~n~naa ca, aya.m catuttho vipallaaso. iti nava padaani akusalamuulaani catuusu padesu yojitaani. tattha navanna.m muulapadaana.m kusalaana.m samatho ca asubhasa~n~naa ca, ida.m pa.thama.m satipa.t.thaana.m. alobho ca dukkhasa~n~naa ca, ida.m dutiya.m satipa.t.thaana.m. vipassanaa ca aniccasa~n~naa ca, ida.m tatiya.m satipa.t.thaana.m. amoho ca anattasa~n~naa ca, ida.m catuttha.m satipa.t.thaana.m. imaani a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani siihavikkii.litanaya.m anupavi.t.thaani. imesa.m ti.n.na.m nayaana.m yaa bhuumi ca yo raago ca yo doso ca eka.m naya.m pavisati. ekassa nayassa akusale vaa dhamme kusale vaa dhamme vi~n~naate pa.tipakkho anvesitabbo, pa.tipakkhe anvesitvaa so nayo niddisitabbo, tamhi naye ^a^P0.0258^ea^ niddi.t.tho. yathaa ekamhi naye sabbe nayaa pavi.t.thaa tathaa niddisitabbaa. ekamhi ca naye a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani pavi.t.thaani, tamhi dhamme vi~n~naate sabbe dhammaa vi~n~naataa honti. imesa.m ti.n.na.m nayaana.m siihavikkii.litanayassa cattaari phalaani pariyosaana.m. pa.thamaaya disaaya pa.thama.m phala.m, dutiyaaya disaaya dutiya.m phala.m, tatiyaaya disaaya tatiya.m phala.m, catutthaaya disaaya catuttha.m phala.m. tipukkhalassa nayassa tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani pariyosaana.m. pa.thamaaya disaaya appa.nihita.m, dutiyaaya disaaya su~n~nata.m, tatiyaaya disaaya animitta.m. nandiyaava.t.tassa nayassa raagaviraagaa cetovimutti avijjaaviraagaa ca pa~n~naavimutti pariyosaana.m ^a^M0.0340^ea^. pa.thamaaya disaaya raagaviraagaa ^a^V0.0334^ea^ cetovimutti, dutiyaaya disaaya avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti. ime tayo nayaa imesa.m ti.n.na.m nayaana.m a.t.thaarasanna.m muulapadaana.m aalokanaa, aya.m vuccati disaalokano {disaalocano (ka0)} nayo. aaloketvaana jaanaati ``aya.m dhammo ima.m dhamma.m bhajatii''ti sammaa yojanaa. kusalapakkhe akusalapakkhe ca aya.m nayo a"nkuso naama. ime pa~nca nayaa.

[22] cattaaro ca vipallaasaa, kilesabhuumii nava padaani..
[21] ye ^a^P0.0259^ea^ ca satipa.t.thaanaa, samatho ca vipassanaa kusalamuulaa.
[22] eta.m sabba.m kusala.m, indriyabhuumii nava padaani..
